title: Finch: Self-Care Pet
description:
Meet your new self-care best friend! Finch is a self-care pet app that helps you feel prepared and positive, one day at a time. Take care of your pet by taking care of yourself! Choose from a wide variety of daily self-care exercises personalized for you.

BEST DAILY SELF-CARE TRACKER ‚ú®
Is self-care a chore? Struggling with habits, self-love, or depression? Self-care finally feels rewarding, lightweight, and fun with Finch. Complete quick self-care exercises to grow your pet, earn rewards, and improve mental health! People who struggle with mood journaling, habits, and depression found it easier to be mindful with their self-care pet in Finch!

EASY DAILY CHECK INS ‚úèÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ Start mornings with quick mood checks and energize your pet to go exploring! Choose from various mindful habits from goal tracking and mood journaling to mindful breathing exercises and quizzes!
‚Ä¢ End days in moments of gratitude with your self-care pet where they'll return from adventures to share stories with you! Recognize positive moments and grow your self-love.

MINDFUL HABITS üßòüèª
Finch is the fun self-care tracker to hit goals and sustain healthy habits! Build mental resilience against stress, anxiety, and depression. Strengthen your mental health by increasing self-love and gratitude.

‚Ä¢ Habit Tracker: set goals and celebrate wins for healthy habits.
‚Ä¢ Mood Journal: guided mood journal to clear the mind, track important moments, and practice self-love.
‚Ä¢ Breathing: guided breathing to calm nerves, increase focus, energize your mind, and sleep better.
‚Ä¢ Quizzes: understand your mental health with quizzes for anxiety, depression, body image appreciation, and more.
‚Ä¢ Mood Tracker: quick mood checks with mood trends to understand what has been lifting you up or bringing you down.
‚Ä¢ Quotes: motivational quotes to lift your mood and gain new perspective.
‚Ä¢ Insights: get insights on your mental health from combined analytics on your mood journaling, tags, goal tracker, and quizzes.

SAY HI üëãüèº
‚Ä¢ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@finchcare
‚Ä¢ Discord: https://discord.gg/finchfam
‚Ä¢ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/finchcare/
‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://facebook.com/groups/finchfam
‚Ä¢ Email: support@befinch.com

scraped_reviews.content: this used to be a lot more self-care focused, but lately the updates have been a lot more focused on cosmetics and gamifying features. The self care activites are hidden behind more menus than before. Mood Tracking isn't automatic (used to ask ask how you were feeling as soon as you logged in, now it's a silent bubble at the top that you have to remember to click) the "add a new goal" button is all the way at the bottom instead of the top like it used to be. Idk why they'd change this.

This is a great game to keep you positive and productive and it's fun customizing your character and seeing your family and friends characters. Now my 1 BIG COMPLAINT! Please fix the shop, I see items I want but not in the color I want so I have to wait for another one to come up and it NEVER happens! I have one item I'm still waiting to find again in a color I like and it's been almost a year ü§Ø make it like the rest of the shop where when we tap an item we can choose the color we buy üôè

I love this app. It's so cute. but there are some bugs like the items you can buy. some are randomized, and at the bottom, the rest stay the same. there's an option to pick things when you go to this part of the shop called the Catalog it has alot of clothes you wouldnt normally see and they are all so cute and it tells you how much the item costs. but you aren't able to find and buy it anywhere even if you click on it and its kinda sad. but overall, I love the app. It's great and motivating.

Absolutely the best self care app there is. No questions asked. It has everything you need! It's adorable, inclusive, you can get so many items without having to purchase the Plus subscription, and there are NO ADS! It's so helpful, too! There is also a streak pause feature you can access through your streak info. It will let you pause your streak for up to 7 days if you need a break. Y'all did really well with this one. üíï

This app has really helped get me moving after post partum depression. It keeps me organized and helps me remember tasks that I want or need to do. I use it to remind me of daily tasks and habits. I also use it to remind me of fun things I like do to because sometimes depression doesn't let you remember that you like coloring, reading books or listening to music. I love the pet aspect of it and learning things about places you travel with your birb. Definitely recommend!

Finch has honestly changed my life, and, unlike a lot of others, is actually free and not super limited. I have found that I tend to try and set too high of goals for myself at times, so setting smaller goals using the goal suggestions has been a huge help in letting me celebrate my small wins as well as create new ones I didn't think of before. And it feels so rewarding to raise a little pet that gains a more and more complex set of unique traits the more I do for myself.

I wish there was a bit more motivation for after your finch returns from their daily adventure, but the app is still great. It's a good place to keep a list of all the things I need to do as well as motivating to do them so my finch can adventure and return sooner, as well as earning stones for furniture and outfits. The micropets attaching to a specific goal is really nice too, I don't think I would've been doing the goal I chose for it as consistently if it weren't for the pet.

This is not the kind of app I usually try, but I am a little obsessed with Finch. This is a really cute app that makes my self care a little more attainable for me, because I know that when I do, I have an excuse to see little Arlo. Most of this apps features have been free: so far, so good. Give it a try. If you don't like it you can always delete it. I'm finding it motivating and have hit my goals on an 8-day streak.

What a fun, gentle way to help me take care of myself and my mental health on a daily basis. The free version provides all you need, allowing you to set your own self-care goals; for hard days, it may be just getting out of bed. I chose to subscribe to Plus for the additional tools: more breathing exercises, soundscapes, and even physical exercises. I highly recommend this app.

This app is awesome. I used the free version for a while before getting Finch Plus. Over the past few months, this app has helped me build healthy habits and routines, become more productive, and has even been instrumental in helping me lose 40lbs so far (and counting.) I would recommend this app to anyone looking to become more organized and healthy.

Once I got into a rhythm I started really enjoying this app. I did buy the full membership, but it's a year at a time, not monthly payments and it's not too much. I find that the little suggestions and goals really motivate me to actually do them. you can make your own, but the suggested options are short and perfect to start with. I even bought a stuffed birp of my little birp.

I love this app, it's cute and it does really help me. But I don't understand the thing with the game currency, why every thing costs so much and it's hard to acquire a decent amount of without selling your stuff. And why does sending gifts have to cost an extra 200? Please make the gems either easier to acquire, or make accessories cheaper. And consider removing that extra 200 to send gifts thing, I genuinely can't imagine a single reason to back that up.

Awesome app that I didn't even know I needed. Do it with a friend if possible, or match with one in game. Really cute and fun to use, gets you motivated to do more of whatever it is you want or need to do more of. Lots of ways to use it, good mental health tools available. I'm sure the paid version is awesome, but the free version is great too, and there are no commercials! It's a real public service that they provide all they do for free. I'm really grateful to them for doing this ‚ù§Ô∏è

Finch has been a SURPRISING lifesaver. I did leave my little birb with the default name, but they couldn't be a better fit. I love getting to interact with them, and the goals & activities you can do on the app aren't overwhelming to me. I am SO glad that it has so many features that are accessible without a paywall and that anything you WOULD have to pay for is completely optional. I really look forward to seeing the progress I make with the help of my new birb friend. ‚ù§Ô∏èüê•

I would rate this higher as I love the app, but since the recent update (6/26/25) the app keeps forcing closed and I cannot complete anything. I have gone through all the steps to fix it and it just keeps forcing closed. Every time I open it, it freezes and then forced close. It was not like this before the recent update. If I could fix this, I would rate it higher.

Couldn't be better. I've used it for 2 weeks now and have been more productive than I've been in months. Interacting with your bird is fun and gives you an incentive to keep opening the app. The free version has limitations, but is still extremely helpful and doesn't pressure you into paying. If you have bad days, you're not pressured into completing tasks, but you can vent your frustrations for a reward instead. So well thought out and helpful for mental health!

Updating my review. I've been using daily this for 3 or 4 years now. I don't really use any of the mindfulness features, I use it as a journaling app mostly, but I get a huge amount of value out of that. I love the events and micropets, and they've made some tree town improvements. I appreciate that they're also releasing new travel locations. There is just so much care put into this app. Please put different color floors in the store though!!

Overall I really enjoy this app, and I've found it very useful in my day-to-day life. However, several times in the past months I've tried to send my friends in the app gifts, and it will take my rainbow stones but not actually send them a gift and still say it's sold, whether I'm on wifi/data or not. At this point I've lost about 5,000 stones due to this and it's getting really frustrating, and starting to discourage me from getting on at times.

I can't rave about this enough, and it's only day three. This is adorable and actually helpful in little everyday challenges. The goals are fun and the graphics are so cute! As someone who has anxiety and depression in colder seasons, I think this will serve me and anyone else using it well. Plus, I got to make my pet non binary like me! On top of mental struggles like depression, anxiety, et cetera, this is great for neurodivergent folks too. Enjoy!

I was very skeptical I would get anything outta this cutesy lil thing a friend invited me to. but I'm actually really enjoying it! it's definitely cute, I enjoy decorating the birdhouse and dressing him up, and especially the little pets you collect! but there's actually a lot of helpful things too... it's a great way to build new habits, remind you to do things, and even encourage you to connect to ppl... I just wish the plus wasn't so expensive...

I really like the app, it has helped me a lot. Honestly, a few times it has kept me from bad habits, with the breathing exercises, sharing goals, and getting pets for completing goals, its helped me change my life for the better I feel like. I also like how you can find friends and share quests with the new update, as well as put together outfits without buying them, even if you cant keep them, its fun to dress up my little birb ^^

I love the idea of this app, but despise the end product. The more basic tasks (the ones I would like motivation to do) are locked behind a paywall. A $10 a month subscription! That's crazy expensive! I tried to go the free route for a few days, but found that the reminders for the few free tasks I could get wasn't really helping me in the end. I wish the paywall wasn't there, or maybe if it was a one time purchase, I would do that. I feel like the makers of this app are too greedy

It's super cute and actually helpful!!! I love all the extra features. But I don't like that you have to get finch plus (subscription) to get all of the daily furniture and clothing, it made me less motivated to play since most of the good items were locked. That's not very necessary to the app but it was a part that made it funner and more encouraging to do self-care. I still very much appreciate finch though!!! :3

It's been a really nice way to keep up with a routine, something I've never really been able to do before, but... I don't understand why IOS users are allowed to only have to pay 14.99 for a year's subscription, as where Android users have to pay 69.99 for a year. That's an incredible difference in pricing, and an extremely unfair one at that. It's a cute app, but, I can't support something that rips it's users off so badly depending on their device.

At first I thought this app wouldn't help me with my anxiety, and my procrastination during the day, but when I get nervous, I can journal with my finch, or do breathing exercises with him, dress him up, fall asleep to sound scapes, rant without judgement, and I do t have to be bothered with all of the adds and payments, it's nearly free, there are only a few things you can't access like outfits and exercises when you don't pay, but there is a wide variety even still! I highly recommend üòå

Finch is an adorable self care app! I love tending to my birb. While I did stop using the app for a while, I recently got back into it. It's nice to have a fun way to make a to-do list. I also love seeing my birb explore the world and getting to know their environment more. The only complaint I would have is that I wish there was less stuff behind the Finch Plus paywall, mainly the emoji part for your custom tasks. Would be nice if we had some free options for our tasks. But I still like Finch.

I love this app! I adore how you can have your own companion. And you can dress them and name them! Like a personalized little helper. This app has really helped me with all the little tasks my depression has kept me from completing. Lately, I have improved a lot by using Finch. Very very cute. Very helpful overall to encourage me to get out of bed and drink water more. Absolutely having a blast with this. :)

I was hesitant to get another app that has 100 different currencies with 100 different ways to get me to spend money. I'm SO happy with Finch for being the opposite of that. The app's interface and overall gameplay loop are perfectly balanced to encourage self-care without turning the app itself into yet another chore. There is one option to subscribe and spend money, but otherwise, they don't inundate you with popups encouraging you to pull out your wallet. I can't wait to see how Finch grows!

I have been using it for two days and I love it so far. There are some things that I wish they would add. 1: a calendar view of the tracker thats also cute 2: to-do list 3: I wish you could communicate or talk to your pet bird. 4: I wish they made the app more functional and accessible; it takes a time to get used to the lay out, but it's not a big deal. 5: you can't cmplete task one at a time in a category for example if i need to drink water 5 time I could only do it all at once or not at all

Genuinely did not expect this app to be as impactful as it has been. Whether you need an app that rewards you for just getting out of bed, or each chore done, or breathing exercises for each time of day (stressed or not)... it is all in this app. I tried the free trial and while it was nice, I didn't get the subscription and you don't need to. No ads. I love it and definitely recommend it. My sister sent me her friend code and I thought I would only use it for a few days, I'm months in.

At first I was hesitant. I really suck at keeping habits and schedules. I've seen all kinds of cute pets and how to to help with habits and adhd. But this has so many different things to do, you can travel with your pet, it has mindfulness, you dress it up, create a home, tiny pets for your pet. it keeps you motivated and you can change your goals for how you see fit. I wish I could afford the Finch Plus.

this is a really great & simple way to make sure you're taking care of yourself each day. If you deal with anxiety, depression or adhd & find yourself in those down times where the basics feel difficult, it helps keep you accountable for taking care of you. it comes with preset task & you can customize to add your own, including basic exercises & stretches to keep yourself moving (even if it's minimal!). cannot recommend enough.

This app has been very helpful. I like being able to choose different goals. And the game like aspect of it is a good motivator for me. The one thing I might suggest is maybe having options of what rewards we want from the event as some of them I don't like as much and then I'm not as motivated to open the app every day. I really liked the cutesy ones like the autumn and the cottage themed ones but not so much the more fun ones like the zoo or the superhero ones.

I was pretty skeptical - I've never been that into video games because I can never get the characters to go where I want. My son would be taking over the Halo universe while I'm back at the space ship walking into walls instead of down the ramp. Self care is tough for me- I've always struggled to form habits & this looked fun -I decided to try it. =) It's been just over a month. I am having so much fun. You go at your pace, it's gentle & sweet and 0 guilt trips! Highly recommend.

wonderful self-care app to journal, make and track goals, do different activities for "money", decorate the bird house, get clothes, etc and send to others! It's all private, and there are NO PURCHASES except getting plus. Regular version of the app has TONS of usability, and paid version is mostly rewards, and extra prompts for the different activities (writing/reflections, breathing exercises, quizzes, etc) I've had this app for 3 years and it has been great! the devs listen to users!

Great self care and task app. Makes it so much fun and so easy to get things done. Even when you have 0 motivation. Some tasks are as simple as getting out of bed. You can also add your own. Your animal grows as you complete tasks, and goes on adventures learning things as it goes. It can have its own pet, clothes and room. It's so darn cute. It literally took me from activity to trying to get everything planned done. It makes it so much fun for even mundane things. You can also add friends. Ty‚ô•

My favorite self care app ever! They've put so much work & thought into Finch. There are regular updates & all of them make it even better. There are unlimited goals; daily & special quests; monthly event; outfit, decoration, & color stores; add friends; explore new places; soundscapes; diary; and more! I got a Finch Plus sponsor, but the free version wasn't limited. I'm amazed by how good this app is & I'm not going to uninstall Finch anytime soon. Thank you so much for an outstanding app!

I tried this app a couple years ago, but I just wasn't in the right headspace for it to be effective. I downloaded it again last week, and wow!! Mundane, everyday, tasks have become little hits of dopamine as I check them off via the app. This cute little bird app makes mandatory adulting kinda fun. Taking out the trash twice a week? You got it. Grocery shopping? Check! Picking my kids up from school? An easy win for the day. 100% recommend!

Used to be good, but now it's hard to earn gems. I liked it because I worked a variable shift and you can change your sleep and wake times every day if needed (which was typically the case with my last job), and it has helped me train some good habits. Whatever tweak they did recently made earning gems nearly impossible, which makes saving up for wanted items tedious and frustrating. Since I no longer need the variable shift accommodation, I'm looking for a different app.

What I hate most about all the "self care" apps is how they essentially give up on you if you don't log on in awhile, like stopping notifications. Not Finch! My bird gives me constant, daily support through notifications even if I haven't been online in a month! I love my bird, and this seriously helps me with keeping track of my mental and sometimes physical health. I recommend this app to anyone who will listen to me. Friends, family, people I've just met. Easily the best self care app.‚ù§Ô∏è

Love this app! You can make your own goals, you get gems which can be used to buy in app items- like outfits, decorations for your birdhouse, traveling, changing your birds colors, and gifting others. You can get a free version or plus version (monthly or yearly) - plus unlocks more features but the free version is nice too. Gems are bought but unearned based on your goals. Suggested goals are available to get you started. I highly recommend this app.

I've tried mental health & mindfulness apps before and could never stick with them so I was skeptical that Finch would be any different. I was wrong. This app is easy to stick with. It's fun and habit forming in a healthy way. Actually using real CBT skills in your everyday life is not easy at first but this app kept me organized and motivated. It has journals, quizzes, breathing exercises, guided meditations. I even use it w/ my therapist. The pet game is just icing on the cake

it is a great app but if you miss any of the theme things for outfits and room decorations you don't get them for free ever again like the goth one and if you press the catalog it tells u the prices but u can't buy anything (it's in game money) which is sad but overall it's a good app (besides beating yourself up for missing an event) hope this helps<3 (I didn't actually physically beat myself up, just a note for anyone wondering)

At first it felt silly, but after a week of consistent use I saw that it was slowly changing my perspective. I started giving myself more credit for the little things I had been doing, but didn't regularly track. I have started to be a little nicer to myself despite the depression episodes. It has lots of useful tools tucked in there. It is even more useful using it with friends. I used it for free the first few months. The subscription adds a few more options, but isn't necessary.

I LOVE Finch!! such a fun and adorable way to keep track of your goals and daily activities, without the punishment/shame aspect of certain other apps! It's slightly bittersweet, though, as I'll get on sometimes, just to remind myself what my next task in my busy day, and get excited to check off activities, that I end up distracted from the one I *should* be doing at the moment! üòÇ At least I'm being productive in those moments, but it can definitely be a distraction, even if self-limiting.

Fun and helpful. Super happy with Finchie! My only qualm is that there are so many items available to buy at the Finchie shops and new items added every month due to monthly events, but only a few items available at a time to pick from at the shops, with a couple of refreshes available. It would be nice if we could click on an item when it shows up at the shop and be able to choose any of the color options, with only one of that item bought at a time as per usual.

My wife has been using this for quite a while, and finally convinced me to install it as well. I'm pretty attuned to the "dark patterns" that a lot of games and websites use to get you addicted to them. This takes those same methods and turns them around to help you be a better you. Some parts are behind a subscription, but they are very much not necessary to get the most out of it. I probably will get the subscription, just because I feel that I get much more from this free, (and ad free!) app.

I really like this app, it's cute, I got many friends and family on it, keeps me focused on little wins and adding more to work on to get gems to outfit and decorate my birdhouse. Love little check ins it lets you do with friends, I tell everyone about it. Very simple but offers a lot. Working towards goals daily, thinking about mood and what influences it, and there are analytics you can see and also can use it as a kind of mini journal. Built in breathing exercises. Altogether fantastic!

Where has this app been my whole life!? It's highly interactive and motivating. I put in my goals for the day and can set them to repeat. The goals can be personalized. Specifically for me, I have a hard time with self-care and making time for myself. I can set goals for that and watch my birdie grow while I accomplish them! It also helps me to be more social, more organized, and more attuned to my emotions.

Fun (mostly). Helpful (mostly). I just wish it didn't punish you for being forgetful. Didn't log in exactly on New Year's, even though you've been using the app for over a year? No exclusive item for you! Logged in but forgot to send Noodle on his adventure *every*single*day! Congrats, you've been booted out of the seasonal location! And so on. Extremely frustrating, and honestly ruins it a little. Also, I wish there was a way to revisit past adventures. The adventure stories are the best part.

title: ABC Kids - Tracing & Phonics
description:
Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.

ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!

ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.

Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.

Features:
- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.
- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.
- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.
- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.
- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!

Note to Parents:
When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

scraped_reviews.content: I rated a 3 star because my four year old is practicing handwriting skills and using her fingers doesn't really help with strengthening the muscles in her fingers like using a writing tool will. If she was able to use my stylus it would be great and I would give a 5 star rating. Please fix it where children are able to use a stylus. That would be fantastic!

As much as I appreciate this app, I can't give this app 5 stars until a few things are fixed. 1. The arrows need to go away (they distract my 2 year old into thinking that's where to start). 2. The start of each stroke needs to be defined and highlighted (maybe needs a pencil or marker to drag). 3. There needs to be a way to trace the letters in a continuous motion where you don't have to lift your finger for each corner. Example: the letter W I shouldn't have to lift my finger off the screen four times... Please address these issues and I would love to give 5 stars! It's a cute app with great incentives for littles. I love when my child wants to play educational games like this.

üåüüåüüåü Absolutely Wonderful Learning Apps for Kids! I'm so impressed with ABC-Kids and the quality of their free educational apps! These apps are not only fun and engaging, but also incredibly effective in helping kids learn. The visuals are bright and cheerful, the content is age-appropriate, and the interface is easy for little ones to navigate. It's clear that a lot of thought and care goes into making these apps, and best of all‚Äîmany of them are free! Thank you, ABC-Kids, for creating such

It's really a very helpful app , developed specifically for children. One of the good thing is that this app lets children engage in studies, as they being interested in mobile mostly without sidetracking towards games or reels. Really great work by the Developer.

Appreciate the developers for providing such beautiful app for free and without the adds. I will also suggest a small improvement in the animation for showing how and where to draw the line while writing the alphabet.. it is now, draws only one time. if it is made to repeat it unless the kid complete that line. this will be very useful for small kids.
I love this app so much. Ad free no charge to use it and it's great for kids. Very easy to use, very interactive. Excited for my baby to use this app
The collection stickers goes blank after one game if not I would have given it 5 stars even after updating it. it still goes white blank after one section please fix it
Good for educational learning for toddlers...I really like this app, it is also interactive for kids they enjoy while they learn.
Just Wonderful! It's the perfect learning or teaching app for kids. Merci beaucoup.

we started using this app less than a week ago. it has my 4 year old wanting to learn letters when he had no desire before. I want to thank the creator of this app formating it free and without ads. it has been an amazing tool for my child to learn. and it kept him busy on a long car ride
love this app simple to use and dont need a subscription!! Love it for early learning for babies
Wow! Best learning app üòäthis helps me trace letters all the time Update: RV AppStudios replied to my review... by the way this game so helpful
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are happy to know that you found our app helpful for kids. üëçüôè

scraped_reviews.content: Hi, I'm a third-year student major in Special Needs Education from Butuan City, Philippines. I am currently looking for free application that can be use for our study which is all about for students who has Learning Disability, like Dyslexia and Dysgraphia, and I see this application in Play Store. I just want to ask if we can use this application to conduct our study, we explore this application and it fits in what we are looking for.

my daughter love it and she's 2 and 1month old , it's really good no adds and fees it's free ,more learning and knowledge .. my daughter know draw a letter because of these apps and it's really recomended to all mommies out their
very good app for children. my son daily using it and it is very useful for learning ABC 123
I don't remember this being in my library, to my knowledge I have never used this app, BUT, that's not saying that my kids did lol ? I don't no ! I can't rate this.
It has no annoying ADS. sooooo fun for my 6 year old
Probably the best kids app on the Play Store. No ads, and it doesn't collect data. Can I shout you a coffee?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would love the coffee üòÄ. However, what we would love more is if your little one benefited from the app then just pay it forward by sharing what you are good with someone near by and do some good. That will make us even happier. Thanks again for the kind words and for the appreciation. Best wishes.

scraped_reviews.content: love that it's free learning fun and has different languages ü§©Best app I have ever found very thankful for this app.
this is an awesome app to help kids learn and recognize letters

amazing ,this app is worth to download for kids,even my lil brother takin interest to learn, one thing I think is lack is the section for writing the first one lacks images,like u r sayin A is for Apple so what is apple looks like it should shows images it would be then best ever app if developer reading this then pls work on it ,i like to see that update plz but although its amazing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words and helpful feedback! We're thrilled your little brother is enjoying the app. You're absolutely right‚Äîadding images to the writing section would make learning even more engaging. We'll definitely consider this for future updates! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: by far the best children's app that I've ever played as well as my children although ABCmouse is really nice but this one seems to be more user-friendly and not that complicated so I highly recommend to all children that are beginning
helps in educating our little ones and.makes learning fun
great app, but app has stopped working now üò≠ please help app won't open on Tecno Spark 10
Absolutely love it, I can't thank you enough for making this app, my kid enjoys playing with it
The app is very extraordinary helpful to my toddler and it is 100% Ads free. Thanks to the RV App studios developers.
good and easy to learn for kids
no ads and it's good for kids to learn
This app helps children to learn the alphabets and recognize the alphabets and helps kids to learn letters sounds and makes children vocabulary skills better.

Very cute, love that it's ad-free without cost! However, it's a little too simple for my learner. I was hoping for something like an interactive worsheet where they can practice the letter over and over with a bit of fun injected into it. Here, you trace the letter once. You can retrace it, but the character's response doesn't change, nor does anything incentiving happen. My learner needs something with constant engagement when it comes to repetitive tasks, so this isn't a good fit for them.
The app is amazing, the best for kid learn.
Kids and toddler can learn easily
The game is very good, kids can enjoy it and there is an update in it, retraining option keep to left,next page is right side ok this is my suggestion only
This app is a favorite of my 4yo. The fact that the app is free and doesn't have ads is amazing!
One of the most awesome educational app there is. My children love all it's content. Really grateful. Bless üôèüèæ
this is a very good and usefull app for children im using it in afghanistan were there are no kindergarten thanks to who made it very much

I am from India. I just want to thank you for this app. my uncle children age is 5 they just don't want to study after playing this again they eager to play this game and also learning through this app so thank you very much.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Glad you like it! :) Be sure to share with friends and family, it's support from parents that has helped us reach more kids üëçü§©üôè

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent app. My son reallt ikes it. Extremely kid friendlybecause no ads. Most of the other apps are running ads and my kid always hit them. This one has given all the features for free... I would like to recommend small words combining three letters for writing. Best if we cam define our own words.. Eg:- Kid's name.. etc.. Thank you very much again for making it free. I'll definately buy it if it comes with above features.
wonderful app for kids... very interesting and productive.... recommended

Just let my little man have a go at doing some letters on this app, and he did really good. It's free and they get little rewards too so it helps keep little minds interested in a learning app rather than a games one. I just need to find one that allows you to use a 'smart' pen now so he can increase his dexterity - otherwise this would be a 5***** app! Thanks for making a great free app!

My heart is so full. Another absolute home run for RV. I put this app on my phone for my 2.5 and in only a few minutes she was breezing through the match game ("find the letter G") and pressing the red arrow to advance all by herself. She loves collecting the stickers and getting the surprise presents! Her first time she played 15 minutes and got a perfect score! That's a lot of letters! We love the colorful certificate! I'm out of space to write but that's fine, can't see through these tears.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: From the bottom of our hearts ‚ù§Ô∏è, thank you for the wonderful review! Reviews from parents truly inspire us beyond words I can express here. We love to read how our apps are helping kids, gives us a purpose, and continues to inspire us to create more free for kids. üòÄ

scraped_reviews.content: This app is easy to use (my 3 yr old does everything on the app himself) and is great for teaching letters. The only thing I wish was different was that the s pen stylus would work with the game so that my son can hold it like a pencil to trace the letters and learn to write instead of just tracing with his finger. but he really enjoys the game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for offering a suggestion, which still reviewing it a 5 star!  We really want to make awesome educational apps that kids truly love, and we truly try to listen.  We absolutely will look into adding s pen stylus support to our apps where possible.  Thank you for using our apps!

scraped_reviews.content: I adore this app! I spent a lot of time reviewing a lot of other apps, and this one is super kid-friendly, and also serves as a learning game for my son, 3 years old. We'd been trying to teach him to recognize the letters of the alphabet for several months when I found this game. He barely recognized "A" and "B". I suspect the way we were teaching him just wasn't engaging enough, so he wasn't able to remember. He started playing this game, and after a WEEK he could recognize "A-E"! Amazing!<3
scraped_reviews.replyContent: From the bottom of our hearts ‚ù§Ô∏è, thank you for the wonderful review! Reviews from parents truly inspire us beyond words I can express here. We love to read how our apps are helping kids, gives us a purpose, and continues to inspire us to create more free for kids. üòÄ

scraped_reviews.content: I believe this app is an amazing learning tool for toddlers "including mine".. my little one learns the letters both upper case and lower case while learning how to write them as well. I would definitely recommend this app to other parents looking for other ways to teach their children the basics before and after pre school.. I do have one suggestion, maybe adding the option to trace the lower case letters (side by side) with the upper case letters so that the children can see the difference.

I have had this app a while now and I really love it for my child, but I do have one wish that you will please include a German language to this Abc app as well, since we are sending our child to a German school. It hinders children if they only learn it in English. Don't get me wrong I LOVE the English part but since my 4 year will be going to a german school it will be a great help and good start.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for asking nicely üôè üòÄ . We are planning to add additional languages in the next few months, but we have to prioritize - this is a free app with no ads.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a friend of several immigrant families who are new to the US. I've been looking for apps both for the parents and the school age children. This app is wonderful. I'm thankful that there are no ads or other links. I wish there was more tracking of what had been learned and a progression. Tracking, would repeat the difficult letters automatically so they are practiced and reinforced. Progression, would include going from following the dots to writing it without prompts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at app_support@rvappstudios.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Having American pronunciation this can't be used for learning English in the UK, I need my grandson to learn 'zed' instead of 'zee'. It's a shame because it looks like a great app and free! Perfect for people who can't afford to pay for the privilege of an app like this. If it had the option for English pronunciation it would be perfect. Unfortunately I'll have to find a different app- which might not be as good. Please update this, then many more people could benefit from your app worldwide.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Adding other languages cost lots of time and money, this is free with no ads or in-app purchases. So I hope you will consider updating your review if you like the app üò•.

scraped_reviews.content: Free & No Ads. My kids love this. My 5 year old completed all the tasks within a week. And now my 3 year old is playing it and she is very excited. I love that you can adjust the home screen in settings to hide buttons for the shop and video. So they can only play the 6 mini games on it. Highly recommend for little learners. Wish they could unlock new games after the certificates have all been completed though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Shadow, thank you for your positive feedback! We're thrilled that your kids love our app. You can adjust the home screen button in the settings and reach us at app_support@rvappstudios.com for any assistance. We'll consider your suggestion for new games too. Happy learning and playing!

scraped_reviews.content: Such a fantastic app for kids! We tried teaching our newly 3 year old how to write her letters with a dry erase book but it just wasn't working this app has helped so much! I just downloaded your drawing numbers app and your spelling app and I am very excited to try them out! Oh, also, it is such a blessing to have kids apps that don't have ads! Kids and ads do not go well!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review, we hope you will support us by sharing the app, tagging a celebrity parent on social media, sharing it with schools etc. We just want to reach more kids. Reviews from parents truly inspires us to keep creating more kids apps. üôèüôèüôè

scraped_reviews.content: Mostly good however the letters are inconsistent and it bothers me enough that I won't use the app for my preschooler. The lower case "a" is written in two different ways and as a teacher I believe that it needs to be consistent throughout (the way it teaches to trace it is the way it should be). The upper case "I" I prefer to be written with a bar at the top and bottom so it's not the exact same as the lower case "L". Just my opinion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We will recommend them to the related department. This app is free, with no ads, no in app purchases, is a passion project and free. If you like app then I hope you will increase rating? Every review matters to us üôè

title: Fotor‚ÄìAI Photo Editor&Enhancer
description:
Photo editing used to be a task. Now it's just a talk.
With Fotor, editing is easier than ever.
Fotor is your all-in-one AI photo editing toolbox, now featuring the new AI Agent. Just upload a photo and say or type what you want‚ÄîFotor's smart Agent understands your commands and applies multiple edits at once, saving you time and effort.
Whether you're a creator, a photo enthusiast, or just having fun, Fotor makes editing smarter, faster, and more creative than ever.

In the Fotor App, you can:
 ‚Äí Use the AI Photo Enhancer to instantly sharpen blurry photos, fix grainy or low-resolution images, and bring back lost details automatically. This powerful photo enhancer tool boosts image quality and makes every shot look sharp, vivid, and professional‚Äîno manual editing required. The photo enhancer makes it easy to get stunning results with just one tap. 
 ‚Äí Effortlessly remove unwanted elements from photos and videos‚Äîlike bystanders, watermarks, or buildings‚Äîusing the Magic Eraser for photos and Video Eraser for videos, all without sacrificing quality. Perfect for anyone with no editing experience.
‚Äí Use the BG Remover to extract subjects from your images with one click, allowing you to replace the background and create highly personalized photos. The AI background eraser makes it easy to achieve professional-looking results. 
‚Äí Use AI Retouch to achieve flawless skin. Enjoy natural and delicate skin smoothing and blemish removal to effortlessly create a refined appearance. 
‚Äí Use the AI Headshot Generator to create PFPs and avatars for LinkedIn and other social media platforms. The headshot generator ensures high-quality results that rival professional studios. 
‚Äí Turn text into stunning images! Just describe what you want, like ‚Äúa magician baking bread in the kitchen‚Äù or ‚ÄúSpider-Man at a bar,‚Äù then choose a style, and transform your ideas into reality in seconds. 
‚Äí Instantly convert your text prompts into videos with an AI video generator, creating studio-quality videos without any watermarks. Just enter your text or upload an image, choose a style, and get a polished video.
‚Äí Curious about what your future baby with your partner might look like? Just try our Baby Generator, and let AI show you the results. 
‚Äí Use trendy 3D Cartoon and AI art effects to easily transform your selfies into vibrant cartoon comics. 

Explore more features of Fotor and unleash your creativity with this AI photo editor. 

AI Tools: 
‚Äí Instantly change outfits, hairstyles, and colors with AI Replace to find your best style.
‚Äí Extend photo subjects and backgrounds with AI Expand to fit different sizes and achieve a balanced effect. 
‚Äí Generate unique AI avatars from selfies, add luxurious backgrounds, or place yourself in iconic destinations. 
‚Äí Restore and colorize old family photos, turning them into vibrant, high-definition images. 
‚Äí Use face swap templates for movie characters or 80s styles to create memorable moments. 

Photo Editor: 
‚Äí Use unique photo filters to set the mood and captivate. 
‚Äí Adjust brightness, clarity, contrast, saturation, curves, hue, and grain. 

The Fotor Pro subscription fee is charged monthly or yearly. The fees for the Fotor Pro plan are paid following purchase confirmation. The subscription will automatically renew on expiry unless the automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiry of the current subscription period. Once the subscription is confirmed, your iTunes account will be charged according to the plan you chose. After purchase, you may go to the iTunes Settings to manage your subscription and turn the automatic renewal off. A canceled subscription becomes effective after one month.

Terms of Service:
https://www.fotor.com/service.html?f=iphoneapp&v=1
Privacy Policy:
https://www.fotor.com/privacy.html
