scraped_reviews.content: My last two reviews of this app were not pretty. I had issues with AI generated pics changing my eye color to blue (some options still do) and an update that left me in limbo and on the web only for a few months. Well, I'm glad to say that a year later, the developers have fixed almost every issue I've had. I've been using the app on both mobile and web and I genuinely like the end products. I haven't figured out the coins situation yet and would like more storage options. No more room to commen
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologize for the issues you've encountered with the AI-generated pictures and the app's functionality. We're actively working to improve our AI features to better match user preferences, including eye color and hair color. Regarding the app not opening after the latest update, please ensure you have the most recent version installed(7.6.14.3.).

scraped_reviews.content: Hi, there! I've just downloaded Fotor. After I've been using it for a few days, I've recognized that my credit points are the same as my Goart, another app developed by your company, 47 credit points. In order to get more points in Fotor, I decided to sign in with my other gmail and check in daily. After I got one point in Fotor, it turned out to be that my Goart points became '0'(ZERO). I don't know what I've done wrong, please give me a suggestion to solve this problem instantly!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience you‚Äôve experienced. To assist you better, we‚Äôll need to check your account details. Could you please contact us directly at support@fotor.com with your registered email and related info? Our team will be happy to look into this issue and help resolve it.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a clever app. It does some things well. I tried animating one photo just to see what the app does. When I tried a second photo, I found out that credits were needed. The app requires ten credits to do another short video. Free credits are hard to get. By the time I accumulated 10 credits, the price to make a short video was 20 credits. This is ridiculous. And some of the credits expire the day after they're earned. Using the free version of this app is near impossible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Please note that using different video generation settings consumes different amounts of credits, and credits do have an expiration period‚Äîunused credits will expire after a certain time. We understand this can be frustrating and appreciate your patience, please contact us via Feedback if have any trouble.

scraped_reviews.content: I signed up for a trial and was sure I had cancelled it the same day, but was charged their annual subscription fee anyway. I brought it to their attention after searching their app and websites for ways to cancel and was told there are no refunds, the whole setup is kind of predatory if you ask me and the service is not worth paying for. The AI editing is awful, it's definitely not something I'll use, regardless of the fact that I've now been forced into paying for it.

No one should be using this company or app. I forgot that I had a yearly subscription with them and noticed a charge on my credit card. The same day as the charge, I canceled and sent a refund request to them, and they denied it. Moreover, the product is mid quality at best. I've had much better results using other apps from companies with reputable practices. There is simply no reason for this other than them being predatory.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. We strive to provide a quality product and transparent service. Could you please specify which features you found unsatisfactory? Your feedback will help us understand the issue better and work on improvements. If you have any further suggestions, please feel free to reach out via Feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: App is Trash - Slickly trap you into a yearly plan by making it non-refundable within 24 hrs of the end of the trial. and the cancelation is a bit unclear even after it is done. With the yearly trial, you don't even get great options unless they get to milk you for more cash. you can get 1 or 2 other apps that you will pay less and get way more options for your money. The only reason I'm even using it is because I paid for it. I do not recommend this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. We sincerely apologize if there was any misunderstanding for the subscription and unable to meet your expectation. Could you tell us what issue you encountered while using Fotor? Or tell us what result you'd like to achieve? Feel free to contact us via Feedback. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Just another money grab scam program. Sure it has many cool features. You literally can access most basic features in the native software on Android to edit photos that this program wants you to pay for. Sure AI, AI, Pay credits for voice commands. 7 day trial, NOPE. I spent more time writing this than I could get any use of of the software; without it trying to make me to pay for everything under the sun. Stupid bait switch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with the application. We value your feedback and are committed to continuous improvement. If there are specific issues or features that did not meet your expectations, please let us know at support@fotor.com. We‚Äôre here to help and improve your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Subscribed but never got access to anything special. The app kept asking me if I wanted a free trial, even though I already Subscribed. I went throughout a month trying to unsubscribe, unsuccessfully, only to get charged again. Reaching out to them is no help, they send you a link to a chat bot that doesn nothing. still waiting for them to cancel, and im guessing a refund is out of the question.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Armando, we‚Äôre very sorry to hear about your frustrating experience. It sounds like there may have been a technical issue. We completely understand how upsetting it is to be charged without getting the benefits. Please allow us to help make things right. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@fotor.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I AM DEVESTATED!! Being a photographer for 10 years I have used FOTOR faithfully. I tried other software but loved loved the ease of use and the many different choices that were given for each photograph. I bought a new computer and downloaded FOTOR to edit pictures only to find out it is now a pay app and my favorite scenes are all gone! I'm super disappointed and very likely to have to find something else. What happened to, "If it's not broke, don't fix it!"
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, sorry for the inconvenience.Our membership is available for different devices and ports, please make sure you have logged in with the same account. As for the scenes you not found, please do not hesitate to approach us by sending an email to support@fotor.com with more details. we will spare no efforts to help.

scraped_reviews.content: It is difficult to navigate to that you pay for. I paid for a pack of 20 pictures that were separate from the subscription, It was taking a long time to generate the images ( over 30 min) I went back to try to see tge progress and couldn't find them. The app seems centered around pushing you to areas to make more money instead of letting you see what you bought. Don't see the value of the subscription so I canceled. Also there are not very many AI options. I was hoping for more options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations. You can find the AI headshots result under "My creation">>AI Avatars. If you need more assistance or have any concerns please do not hesitate to get in touch with us at support@fotor.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Not worth the subscription. The AI features are wonky. My main reason to use this was to get my headshot but all my pictures were rejected even though they were a very clear photo with clean background and all, then it asks for even more photos and rejects them all again whether it's because the picture size rate or something else. Then you need to pay more to get the photos generated?!!! Are you kidding me?! As I said, not worth it, just another cash-grab app with the word "AI" in it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the issues you encountered with our AI features and headshot generation. Your feedback is important to us, and we understand your frustration. Please contact our support team at support@fotor.com with more details about the problems you faced. We're committed to improving our services and ensuring a better experience for our users.

scraped_reviews.content: I finally found an app that unblurs my photo! However, there is a reason for my 3 star rating. I was unable to use the 3 day trial. The app immediately wanted payment with no option for a monthly payment. Not everyone can afford to pay almost $50 on an app. I was given an option to share the app on my social media for a free download, but I'm no one's personal advertising agency either. Let people be able to pay by the month, and you'll have a loyal subscriber.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and for highlighting what you liked about our app. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the trial and payment options. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we hope to improve our services to better meet your needs. Please contact our support team at support@fotor.com if you need any assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Congrats developers! You've managed to get me write a review. Unfortunately it's for all the wrong reasons. I have been using this app for a over a year, maybe even two. The most recent decision to change the GUI was annoying, but not impossible to overcome. However the VIDEO ads after every edit were not. It took forever to edit a handful of photos, some ads were unskippable and wasting my time and data. I suggest anyone considering the app to move on. Not worth paying for Pro. Sorry!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Jeff, 
sorry for the inconvenience.
I will report your comments to our product team, please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. 
Wish you a happy day!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall I enjoy the app for phone & computer, but you NEED to fix whatever the heck is wrong w/the website! On the computer, your downloaded app is not the same as doing work off the website, so I'm always needing to jump around. Problem is, your website crashes multiple times during edits, so I need to save after EVERY tweak to be sure I don't lose everything!!!!! It's beyond frustrating. I'm done recommending you to friends. And I won't upgrade my subscription again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Kristi, 

Sorry for the inconvenience. 

I have reported your advice to our product team and we will keep improving all the time.

As for the online version, we will issue a new version soon. 

Please change your browser to the latest version of Chrome, which is perfectly compatible with Fotor.com.

Have a nice day

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this for YEARS and love it for enhancing my photos. It turns my darkest photos into beautiful, realistically-toned, legible photos. But suddenly I have to pay to use the "enhance" feature!!! Such a bummer. And, while I love it and would pay a one time fee for it, I'm not paying a monthly fee of $5 for it. Time to find a different free app that will likely be able to do the same thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brittany, there are many free features and paid features in Fotor. You can use all free features and you do not need to upgrade your account. If you have any other advice or suggestions, please contact us at any time. Please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't rely on this app, they keep making features that were included in the free version (e.g. enhance) part of the pro version. You go to open it one day and suddenly a feature you used is no longer available. And if it was just a matter of purchasing the pro version with a one time fee, I would do it, but I refuse to pay a monthly fee that can go up or get messed up in billing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please tell us more details about your question so that we can better understand and help you? Please contact us at support@fotor.com or our Facebook: Fotor. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for a couple of years. Very convenient to touch up pictures especially on vacation. However, everything was free and without ads. I wouldn't mind watching some ads in order to keep it free like before. But I won't pay a fee just to keep the ads away. Very disappointed Fotor. I'm going to the next free photoshopping app. Bye!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, 
There are many free features and paid features in Fotor. 
You can use all free features and you do not need to upgrade your account. 

Also, if you apply any Pro features, you need to upgrade your account. 
Also, you can restore your purchase now. 

If you have any other questions, please contact us at any time.

scraped_reviews.content: They have a button for 2 free daily credits, eventually that button stops working. When they are notified of the issue a message saying they are working on it is received. That was a couple weeks ago. I have missed out on over 30 of these "free" credits and still the button does not work. At least let people know that you can only get so many "free" credits before you have to pay or something but in the mean time where are my credits? False advertising there...

A scam. You cannot login on the desktop version to access your premium account you paid for, and the whole reason I bought a subscription was to access editing tools that are only available on the downloaded desktop version (defogging tool). When you try to login the pop-up loads endlessly. When you try to save the pop-up loads endlessly. When you click the Fotor Pro button it loads endlessly. I tried it on multiple computers. Version 3.4.1 on windows 10. Customer service wont contact me back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Kaitlyn, 

Sorry for the inconvenience. 

In order to solve this problem, could you please provide the following information to support@fotor.com

1. The type of device you're using
2. The device OS
3. The version of your Fotor

Meanwhile, I suggest that you could reinstall Fotor, and please be sure that you have given network permission.

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded this for the professional headshot option. Signed up for the free trial and then paid after that. So I had the paid version. I upload my photos for the headshots then I'm asked to pay $14.99 for them. At first I wlstartes not to but figured that's still less than a professional photographer - after all, the images on the add on IG looked FANTASTIC!! So I paid it (even though I was using a paid version already of the app). I got my images after some time and they look NOTHING like me!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry that we weren't able to meet your expectations. We will continue to optimize our app in order to bring users a better experience in the future, so stay tuned. If you have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us, we will do our best to solve it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: The functionality of this is great. It's very easy to use it's pretty self-explanatory although there were times where I cant get it to do what I think it should do and it takes a bit to figure out why thats happening. So, standard stuff. It is just one of those apps that has scummy pricing and account management, including it being extremely hard to figure out where your subscription is, and u lose access to tokens if u dont renew so u have to re-subscribe to use things u already bought.

I signed up for a year of pro and was never given access on my computer. Every time I tried to log-in, I was greeted with an ad trying to get me to upgrade AGAIN to pro. At first, I could access pro on my phone, but soon enough that access was revoked as well. Messaged the company and never heard back. The silver lining is the program isn't much to begin with, so I'm not missing much. Horrible product, worse customer service, would not recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry that we were not able to meet your expectations. After reviewing, you had an issue of not accessing to membership, which is under a tourist account, our support team responded to you on Dec 21 and provided the solution that transferred the membership to your email, now you use it on different devices and ports by logging in same account.

scraped_reviews.content: SO many features locked behind paywalls and constant reminds to buy their hot garbage. It would be one thing if the utilities were actually good. Most of them can't even be adjusted. It just kind of "does things" when you select an option and it makes a lot of assumptions. At least on the free version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Your satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us, and we would like to learn more about your specific concerns to better understand and improve our services. So please feel free to let us know if you have any concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: There is no free anything on this app. You must pay to save anything. It even blocks screenshots! Result for the photo I couldn't even keep was kind of cute, but for a charge of $7 to $20 PER WEEK!? Are you out of your ever lovin minds?! Barbie me is cool & all, but that is way too expensive. That's even expensive as a monthly fee for a photo editing app of this caliber. You know what they say about opinions. Well, there's mine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we really appreciate you share your feedback. We're glad to hear you liked the result, but we're sorry the pricing felt too high. Our team works hard to deliver high-quality, creative tools. Your input is truly valuable, Please feel free to reach out at support@fotor.com if you have anything else want to share.

scraped_reviews.content: I purchased this app to utilize the "colorize" feature. Now, I have had to push the colorize button up to 20 times in order for the app to colorize my picture. I keep getting a "network error - please try again" message. And even after colorize finally works, I have had to push the "save" button also up to 20 times in order for my picture to finally save. I've contacted support over two weeks ago, and so far, they've done nothing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. There are network fluctuations on the server since high-frequency requests during peak hours. Suggest trying a few more times, or waiting for a while before trying again. Meanwhile, we will also report this issue to our R&D department, and we will continue to optimize our products and strive to improve user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Fotor is the ultimate photo editor! I've experimented with around 10 other options, and none of them even come close. I'm no expert when it comes to photo editing, but that's why Fotor is perfect for me. It's user-friendly, intuitive, and delivers exceptional results every time. Especially the AI Gace Unblur and AI Enlarger for old pictures! Try it out. It's a game-changer!

I tried the free 3 day trial, and boy oh boy you really want to read the fine print with this one. I had intended on canceling before the free trial is over. 1st off you need to understand that you actually have to cancel 24 hours before the 3 day trial is over or you're totally screwed and you're getting charged and now you are subscribed to fotor. I tried cancelling within the 1st 48 hours but haven't been able to find where the subscription is located and still can't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi~ To avoid further payment if you do not need it, please cancel the subscription, you can unsubscribe in the personal center--subscription management. Also, hereby attach the link of how to cancel on different devices for your reference: https://support.fotor.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006589106-How-to-Cancel-the-Subscription-

scraped_reviews.content: I tried the "free" trial to fix a blurry photo as advertised. It did not work as advertised so I followed the poor directions within the app to cancel the subscription within one day of downloading. I didn't hear from customer service until 3 days later and was subsequently charged for the app. The customer service responses have been vague and seemed automated. Poor app, worse customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry that we weren't able to meet your expectations.If you cancel the free trial in time during the trial period, we will not charge you any fees. If you have any questions about your payment, please provide relevant information, and we will help you to check the specific situation.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for close to 5 years, since I got my first smartphone. it's not too complicated nor too simple. my only complaint would be that the effects menu is sort of clunky to navigate. I'd love to have the ability to save presets of edits I commonly use so I could quickly add them to my photos! I only use Fotor for personal photo editing & don't use any of the sharing/community features, so I can't comment on those.

Uninstalled for one simple reason. Greed. It's apparent by: 1 - the massive amount of ads (far more than other apps). 2 - locking (with every update) previously free features. 3 - all behind a pricey monthly fee (you can get Adobe lightroom & photoshop for the same price) that this company sees only money. 4 - They aren't willing to be straightforward enough with it and lose large amounts of users with a completely paid service. Yeah no thank you ... it's pretty manipulative.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, sorry for the inconvenience. I will report your comments to our product team, please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. 
Wish you a happy day!

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried every single free trial for photo edit apps over 4 stars and this is by far my favorite & has the most capacious toolbox. I forget about it a lot because of the intentionally incorrect mostly phonetical spelling of the name, but that's just a personal issue. Don't worry, I'm in therapy. Seriously though, if you just downloaded 83 apps hoping to find the right photo editor, try Fotor. I've tried all 83 (17, it's always the inverse) and THIS one is legend wait-fotor-it dary; Legendary.

Filters & features that once came included, plus ones I downloaded are suddenly no longer free. Why? I love this app! We can try them out , but can't save pictures using the suddenly-pro features until we accept the *3*DAY trial. I'll give 5 stars once things go back to the way it was, or once the pro version becomes more affordable (like $5-$10 a year. $30 a year is ridiculous for an app that doesn't have extra-advanced features). I want to use filters I downloaded but they are no longer free
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, 

If you want to get your paid features, please turn to Pro Shop in Fotor App. You can click the "Need help?" symbol at the upper right corner. 
Then you can get the features you paid before. 
If you still have any other questions, please contact us at support@fotor.com.
Our apologies again to this inconvenience. 
Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Okay, I use the free version. I have all the "free" options downloaded for backgrounds, frames, etc. However... the options are pretty limited and basic. The app is pretty good and meets the needs that I have for it. I just have to reuse the same frames/backgrounds over again often. Not much variety.

You want my data to share to spammers and want to get paid without making the cancelation simple? No thanks, uninstalled. Those tricks don't work on me. If it's really supposed to be that good then you wouldn't be forced to sign up with a payment just to try it and for only 3 days! Lol good try. There are plenty of other competitors that give you plenty of models a month for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, For new users, we have a 3-day free trial to access premium features, user can cancel the subscription at any time to avoid charges. Users can also earn credits in our task center to generate AI images. We will continue to update more valuable features. We value our users, and never and ever share their data to any other third parties.

scraped_reviews.content: I use the Windows desktop .exe version on Windows 11 x64 and on Android 11.. and 10 I'm very impressed to the filter array and the ease of using everything. This program has evolved immensely and quickly, with precision. It's cost is higher than my capability , I never took the 3-day trial , I used it a few times, couple of years ago and once you changed into a 3-day trial and then a paywall , I stopped using it and uninstalled , and now no matter what I do it trys to install on all my devices

the newer updates have introduced a paywall to use basic features. was decent enough to make a quick collage or something before. formats, shapes, stickers, text, etc are limited. if the special features and tools behind the paywall had been more versatile or professional looking, I would've purchased it. but putting previously free basic features behind a paywall just made me look for a different app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your interest in our App and continues attention. Based on our strategy, a few features were adjusted to be premium. As a token of our gratitude for your loyalty to our product, we can apply for some benefits, especially for you, please feel free to get in touch with us at support@fotor.com, We looking forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: It is soo epic. It's really easy to use and it makes great pictures. You don't even need to pay anything to make a good picture. But if u wanted to go beyond, u could pay and get extra and it constantly adds new effects. Over a year I've had this app, I've made over 70 awesome pics. I have a ton of editing apps, but this one is best by far. I would recommend this to ANYONE who wants to design or edit pictures.

Well, here we are 11-4-23 and the app crashes. Won't open at all. Going to see what to do about my pro version if it can be troubleshoot. Disappointing that out of the blue it just quit. One of the best free editing programs for smart phones. Love the font selection for copyright images and all the variable ways to edit my photos for social media or professional preview use. An excellent choice for me, and I keep many programs available on my phone but this is my go to one most often.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. We have fixed this crash in the latest version. Now you can upgrade to the latest version (v7.4.7.12) to use Fotor. Thank you for your feedback and support of Fotor.

scraped_reviews.content: Never found an app so bad I've had to write a review. I understand an app having ads and having users pay for a "pro" version, lots of apps do that, but at least they offer a free version, this app DOES NOT. It's nothing but a app with a massive paywall keeping you from doing ANYTHING until you pay for it. Time to find a free app that will do the same exact thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for this inconvenience.In order to ensure the operation of our R&D team, some of our features need to be paid,hope you can understand. We also have a lot of free features which you can use without paying. If you only need use the free features,then you won't need to pay.We will also continue to update more valuable features.

scraped_reviews.content: Updated. I took advantage of the black Friday pro subscription for $17.99. Even Google play shows I bought it. But Fotor tells me I need to upgrade both on phone app and website to even save things. I opened a support request and totally useless. Didn't even answer my basic question. Total scam. I'll continue to use for basic stuff... because that's all I can use it for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please tell us more details about your question? Fotor online and Fotor APP are different products and have different payment methods.
If you purchase the service from Google store, then you can only enjoy service on Fotor APP. Please contact us at support@fotor.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely ridiculous. I've been using this app as my main photo editor for years. They have taken several of the widely used tools and now make you pay for them. Nothing like snatching from the people who've supported you for years. Not cool. Add new tools and charge, fine. Taking away things we've all used for years - messed up. Time to find a new app! There's hundreds....
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

sorry for the inconvenience. There are many free features and paid features in Fotor. You can use all free features and you do not need to upgrade your account. If you have any other advice or suggestions, please contact us at any time. Please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. Regards.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has gotten worse. I installed the app & gave it the correct permissions to use my photos & nothing happens. Not one photo of mine was detected. I kept getting network error from the app when trying to access my photos. Then I realized that it did find my photos, but all the photo preview is all white empty boxes. You don't know which photo to use unless you tap to open it. Then the app performance becomes slow when editing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, could you provide your device information so we could have a clue to find the exact problem you encountered, any questions, please click ‚ÄúFeedback‚Äù in the app to contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: This app used to be good. Now you can't even save pictures in the free version. It says you can save them for free if you log into google but that's a straight-up lie. The point of editing images is to have the edited image at the end and that very basic functionality is missing. This app is unusable without paying for a subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologize for this inconvenience.This is a bug and we will fix it in this week's release. Thank you for your feedback, please contact us by emai (click Feedback in the app, we will verify the authenticity of your situation), we will send you a one-week membership redemption code.

scraped_reviews.content: From Free to Subscription Fee?! I used this app and loved it for such a long time... Now with the update there's not much you can use unless you pay $5/month. With everything happening in the world I'm not going to pay a subscription fee free an app I use a few times a month. I'd understand a 1 time fee like most other editing apps like After light, but this is ridiculous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, there are many free features and paid features in Fotor. You can use all free features and you do not need to upgrade your account. If you have any other advice or suggestions, please contact us at any time. Please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use does everything fantastic application well done guys. *UPDATE* I've been using this app for at least 7 years as you can tell from my last review and it's been wonderful UNTIL you guys decided to restrict 90% of the features and try to charge us $5 a MONTH for it?? You must be out of your minds. A one-time charge- maybe! But there are dozens of other apps out there that do the exact same thing for free. Bad idea guys.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for this inconvenience.In order to ensure the operation of our R&D team, some of our features need to be paid,hope you can understand. We also have a lot of free features.We provide a 3-day free trial for new users, and you can decide whether to continue the subscription after the trial.We will also continue to update more valuable features.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app when it works. I paid for it, but I haven't been able to use it some days, especially these last few days, because it won't even open. It opens, then closes right away. I restarted my phone, cleared cache, I deleted and re-added the app. Did all the updates and troubleshooting. It's a shame to pay for something you can only use once in awhile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. We have fixed this crash in the latest version. Now you can upgrade to the latest version (v7.4.7.12) to use Fotor. Thank you for your feedback and support of Fotor. If you have additional questions, feel free to contact us through the "Feedback" in the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Fotor is still my go to app, however it would be nice to have the ability to edit multiple photos at once in the same style. Is it a pro feature?? Old review: It's unfortunate that the text in the collages can't be altered as they can be on the computer app. I don't expect all of the features to be here but it sucks that good ones aren't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thanks for your feedback. 

I will report your comments to our product team, please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. 

Sorry for the inconvenience. Wish you a happy day!

scraped_reviews.content: Contrary to description this is not free to use, you must subscribe to even start using, which after 3-day trial is $39.99 per year, no other options. I wanted to remove a blemish but even after subscribing I could not, apparently you have to upgrade to pro for that. Makes me wonder what else they are lying about.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user, so sorry for any inconvenience caused. Please kindly note that you can cancel your subscription anytime during the trial period. Our system automatically renew your subscription if you did not cancel in time. So sorry.
Also, you can contact us at support@fotor.com to cancel it, we will deal with it after hear upon you. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: After all these years, time to move on, sadly. I understand the need for revenue but you can just reserve a consistent number of free filters and features without changing ones that are locked. Seriously annoying. Ads are expected in freeware. And you suddenly locked so many filters and features that we were used to using and happy with!! Also the locked ones are scattered throughout, not just at the end, making it difficult to scroll though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ross,

sorry for the inconvenience.
There are many free features and paid features in Fotor. 
You can still use all free features and you do not need to upgrade your account. 
I will report your comments to our product team, please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. 
Wish you a happy day!

scraped_reviews.content: Been using the app for 3 years. just changed my 5 star review to 2 stars. The most recent update stripped many of the free editing features away and put them behind a paywall. If you are implementing a subscription model, you add new features, you don't take them away from the free version in an attempt to strong arm your users into paying you. You can't even add text to pictures anymore. Really?
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Joseph,

Thanks for your feedback and sorry for the inconvenience.

I will report your comments to our product team, please be assured that we will continue to improve our software to better meet users' needs. 

 Wish you a happy day!

title: SmartNews: Breaking News
description:
We combine the best of quality journalism with expert curation to help you stay informed‚Äîand feel good while doing it. With quality articles from trustworthy publishers, you can easily curate your feed based on your passions and topics that interest you most. 

Discover top news from premium publishers: Bloomberg, The Atlantic, USA Today, TIME, The Huffington Post, Bleacher Report, Quartz, The Verge, LAT, VOX, AP, Reuters, Buzzfeed, Fast Company.

Local 
-Get informative stories from premium publishers based on your location. 
-See the latest local news on government, traffic, weather, politics, school boards, and more.
-Read news about local cultural events, hidden gems, restaurants, family-friendly activities, and your summer farmer‚Äôs market.

Travel
-Discover the best spots wherever you go with location-based news and updates.
-Learn about top travel tips from your favorite publishers.
-Plan your next vacation with trending news on the best destinations, travel hacks, and flight deals before you depart. 

Politics
-  Get prepared for the elections, polls, and debates with stories across the political spectrum from Democrat to Republican.
- Understand candidates, ballot measures, debates, results, and city council elections near you.
-Find voter information, campaign finance stories, verified election reports, and expert election analysis you can trust.

Quality 
-We partner with thousands of trusted publishers for premium, balanced news.
-Our award-winning journalists validate content to ensure it meets our high-quality standards.
- Read trustworthy breaking coverage for your area for free.

Entertainment  
-Get an inside look at entertainment.
-Discover top movies or TV shows with your favorite actors. 
-Follow entertainment topics so you never miss a story.

Sports
-Get daily articles highlighting the latest games, teams, players, and sporting events.
-Set notifications for your favorite teams.
-See breaking news about football, basketball, golf, tennis, soccer, and more.

Health
-Discover the healthcare news that impacts you all in one free app. 
-See what experts say about wellness, aging, and mental health from top publishers.
-Follow stories about pain relief updates, exercise trends, and home remedies. 



***
SMARTNEWS IN THE PRESS

‚ÄúBrowse headlines quickly, customize your channels, and read the news offline. SmartNews is an excellent free alternative to other popular news apps.‚Äù
- CNET

***

Best Mobile App Awards

Best News App, 2023  (US)

***
REVIEWS

‚ÄúBetter than Feedly or Flipboard. Love it!‚Äù Joe C.

‚ÄúMuch better than the new version of Apple News.‚Äù - Donald B.

***

The SmartNews Terms of Service are linked below. Please read and confirm these terms before using our services.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 12/24/2023 - was working, now back to same problems; not loading, can't scroll through a full article, etc. Time to find suffering else for my news. Love the format, but time and again they issue fixes and then articles won't load or take forever to load. And often won't scroll through the entire article. Moving on to something else for my news.

I downloaded this app because I wanted a recap of the news from both sides. As many others have pointed out, the sources are all left leaning. As the developer has pointed out, you can go in and add Fox News and other outlets. However, the fact that right leaning sources are not included by default makes the bias pretty conspicuous to me. Hopefully they can see fit to include both sides by default in the future. If not, I will keep looking. Oh yeah, lots of ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: SmartNews a news aggregator optimized to provide news from both sides. If you'd like a conservative perspective on the news, you can add Fox News or Washington Examiner tabs on our Discover page. The "For You" section on the Top channel will also change to better reflect your interests & help you discover stories based on your reading preferences.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 6/3/22 Unfortunately, I had no option but to uninstall this app today. It's been crashing for the last 48 hours and there is no update to the update that apparently ruined the app. The news available is generally one of the quickest to report. However, the addition of the game ad's is a major drawback since the latest update. If I am interrupted while switching to read something else and a game ad loads, I leave the app. I understand ad's but not for video games while reading the news.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dawn, sorry for this inconvenience. We have fixed the issue on June 5. Please make sure you're using latest version on the Play Store. We are also working to improve our app experience with replacing this ad format soon. In the meanwhile, please check your app is set NO for autoplay video ads.

scraped_reviews.content: Finally fixed the crashing issue, for the most part. But these ads! Last forever, then no matter how carefully you tap the close button, it still takes to to the play store. No way to avoid it. I think they're pumping up the numbers on their advertisements by forcing a click on the ad. Irritating. But yall get one more star than before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for noticing the fixes‚Äîwe‚Äôre glad things are working better now! We hear you on the ads and take your feedback seriously. We‚Äôve made some recent improvements, so if you still notice issues, please report them with a screenshot. Your experience matters!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love it, what's happened? In the last couple of weeks, smart news app has been almost unusable, I miss using it! I click on an article, it never loads. I've uninstalled, wiped the app data, reinstalled. Still won't work. Also, what happened to reader comments? Suddenly gone! I really hope developers can fix what's broken, because SmartNews has become a favorite!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, our engineers have worked to resolve the articles loading issue for Android users. SmartNews app should be back to normal. Please close the app on Android and restart our app. If the issue hasn't been resolved yet, please reach out to us at: https://support.smartnews.com/hc/en-us

title: Taco Bell Fast Food & Delivery
description:
Download the official Taco Bell¬Æ app and your taste buds will officially thank you. Earn points on every qualifying order and reward yourself with free food. Gain access to exclusives only available on the app. Order tacos for delivery or pickup.
 
Features Include:
1. Order and pay ahead for delivery or pickup
2. Customize and save your favorite menu items to make ordering easy
3. Track your order seamlessly on the app to know when it‚Äôs ready for pickup or being delivered
4. Earn points on every qualifying order so your tacos can earn you more tacos
5. Redeem exclusive rewards and special offers only available on the app
 
Terms and conditions apply.

scraped_reviews.content: "uh-oh something went wrong" I get this error nonstop even after reinstalling. Tried ordering online which worked but online doesn't let you use rewards. What a silly problem. App is nonsense. edit: I sent an email to the address listed in the reply. no answer yet. I'm not sure what they can do for my individual account that they cannot do for all the other reviews. treating this 1 by 1 seems ineffective. edit2: the app updated but still is not working.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôre having issues with our app. Please reach out to our team at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com, and we‚Äôll gladly look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: I tried to place an order in the app and it kept giving me an error, it wasn't until the next day when I realized my card was charged all 5 times I attempted to place the order. They were eventually reversed but it reduced my available credit until the charges were credited back. There shouldn't be online exclusive offers if you're not able to order online.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is pretty bad. Rewards aren't available everywhere, not all combos are available everywhere (even though it gives you the option to select it), the app doesn't even work often, and it doesn't automatically update to the nearest location (or mention you're far away) so sometimes you get to the end of creating your order to realize you have to completely change redo your order and choose new options since those aren't available at the other location. Too many problems
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôre having issues with our app. Please reach out to our team at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com, and we‚Äôll gladly look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: Works great most of the time. I can save favorite meals with all the picky details, pay ahead with a saved card, and earn points toward free items. My only real complaint is that when a store is out of something or discontinuing it, the error that pops up does not tell you what to NOT order. And occasionally, the app will decide that the store you are ordering from isn't serving food at all, and no matter what you order, there's an undefined issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll investigate this issue for you. Please send us a note at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is garbage. It is easily the worst restaurant app I've ever used. More often than not, something errors out. Either the checkin or the mobile order, or just adding items. The coupons aren't clear either. It's just a mess, which is crazy since you would think since they over charge for everything, some of that would be put into a competent app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Great until they went passwordless. Now j can't log on. I never get an email. I've been trying for days multiple times. Real shame because i will only ever order on the app. So they're just losing business. *edit* I emailed them and they never emailed me back. I had to pay $5 for the item I usually get for free with my points because all my points are gone and I no longer have access to my account. I'll probably just go elsewhere. The extra step just to log in is insane.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôre having issues with our new login process. Please contact us at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com, so that we can get this resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: Needs the ability to claim missing or incorrect items! App has not worked since the before the oct 1 update. Neither my wife or me can place an order on the app. I've tried it multiple times, multiple locations, both ways of picking it up. Every time it just says "uh oh, forbidden" when we try to place an order. Fix the app. I've cleared the cashe, uninstalled and reinstalled. It's not the many of us who are complaining. You app is trash.FIX IT

scraped_reviews.content: Got a really significant glitch in the app. I have a digital gift card balance... but it won't load that tab to let me see how much is left. scraped_reviews.content: If there were a negative star rating, that's closer to what they deserve. What's the point in even offering customization in the app? It's NEVER actually done to the food. And when the app glitches, which is ALL THE TIME, you get screwed! Sometimes it's out of money. Sometimes it won't add an item. Sometimes you have to drive to A Store That You Didn't select. That's nowhere near where you want to be.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any issues you're currently running into with our loyalty features. Please reach out to Rewards@tacobell.com for help.

scraped_reviews.content: It doesn't really tell you where you ordering from while placing the order, and it doesn't auto-update to nearest location. scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôre having issues with our app. Please reach out to our team at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com, and we‚Äôll gladly look into this.

For the app to be around this long there shouldn't be so many problems with it. Also what did they do to the shell on the Mexican pizza since it came back that it tastes like the smell of clay?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôre having issues with our app. Please reach out to our team at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com, and we‚Äôll gladly look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't understand how an app could have such bad reviews. downloaded the app. used it once. now I get why. 1) impossible to add a credit card. that feature seems to cause an error. 2) the checkout has a field for your zip that had text written over it. 3) finally figured out how to order $30 of food. drove to my taco bell for pickup drive thru. they had no idea why I was there. they eventually found the order and made it on the spot. jfc. why did I jump through all these hoops?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: on multiple occasions since the update, I have attempted to place orders only to have the app double the order. when I attempted to reduce the number of each item by 1, when I got to the last item, my entire order disappeared. then when I went to complain about it, the contact us spot on the app was a blank page.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This doesn't seem right. We want to take a closer look at this for you. Please send a note to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com so we can connect.

scraped_reviews.content: the app is improved in reliability, sometimes it seems about particular restaurant might not work for a short period (like a day or so). on the other hand, the pop ops in the app are certainly annoying. I'm already ordering food from you, and on my way to pay you. stop interrupting me, advertising to me, or trying to up sell me. It very much rubs me the wrong way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm SO upset about the limitations on the Tues drop. I tried 1 minute after! Why would they limit the coupon code? I would come in to buy 1 discounted item and got more items! it would encourage people to come at a less popular day and time. I would have gone to Taco Bell today for that item and purchased, another $10 but now I'm not going at all because the drop expired I'm so upset about it, I won't be going for awhile. App is cool though. I like the rewards
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any issues you're currently running into with our loyalty features. Please reach out to Rewards@tacobell.com for help.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't write reviews often, but this is ridiculous. I wanted to use my birthday reward before it expired, as well as try some of the online exclusive items, but it wouldn't let me check out and still charged my card every time I attempted to. A lot of reviews I'm seeing are saying the same thing. FIX. YOUR. APP!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: App won't save payment methods. No I haven't reinstalled it. If I can't save my card the first time I fresh install an app on my phone for the first time,what's the point? Just use the Doordash app. The app defaults to Doordash for delivery anyways and you're still going to have the same $6 delivery fee (that's not a tip, just the company taking extra money for fun)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It ain't worth it. Trust me. This app glitches my order in 3 separate transactions. First time the coupon is redeemable and applies to the order. but says its been used before you pay. Second time your order says its good to go. but the location doesnt have a trace of your order. 3rd time the payment declines. but you get charged anyways. and charged 2 more times after you close the app. You probably shouldn't eat here anyways. So def heed my warning. stay away from this pisspit of an app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: We have a great time setting up the order, but almost every time we go to submit it gives us an uh oh error with the payment so we have to try again. Today it took 3 tries to get our order to go through 1 time. But our bank account was charged all 3 times but only 1 order went through. This app needs to be fixed! This has been a problem for years!!!! So instead of being charged $35 we were charged over $100. The 2 that don't go through eventually get credited back but that is unacceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologize for any issues you're seeing while on Checkout. Please reach out to us from the email address associated with your Taco Bell account to DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This app always crashes at least 5 seconds after I open it! I have an android s22 in case it's somehow a model issue, but please fix your app! How do you expect to keep customers if your app literally won't work for more than 5 seconds?? Not to mention how much of a headache it is to add a new card for payment, or even just putting in an order. It's a gamble if it'll actually go through or just say there's a network issue despite the internet being perfectly fine. Please fix your app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please go to your Settings app to try clearing the Cache and Data for our app. Afterwards, delete and reinstall the app. If the issue still isn't resolved, reach out to us at DigitalSupport@tacobell.com.

title: TIDAL Music: HiFi sound
description:
With the TIDAL app's extensive library of music, offline music features, and personalized recommendations, TIDAL is a must-have app for anyone who loves music. Whether you're on the go or just relaxing at home, TIDAL has everything you need to enjoy your favorite tracks and discover new music.

Why download the TIDAL music app?

Try TIDAL for FREE: with a 30-day trial, you can experience the difference for yourself

High-quality audio streaming: TIDAL offers high-fidelity audio streaming, providing you with an immersive and rich listening experience.

Huge selection of music genres: The TIDAL music app offers an extensive library of millions of songs and albums across multiple genres, making it easy to discover new music and listen to favorite tracks.

Offline music feature: TIDAL allows you to download tracks and albums for listening offline, without an internet connection (no wifi), providing a seamless offline listening experience that is both convenient and enjoyable.

Discovery and personalized recommendations: TIDAL offers curated playlists, and personalized recommendations based on your listening habits and individual music preferences.

Subscription options: TIDAL offers multiple plan options - with a month FREE trial, making it easy to download, try and enjoy the app.

TIDAL has a range of plans suited to fit your needs. Besides our Individual payment plan, we offer a great value Family plan (you plus 5 family members) and a discounted Student plan.

When you download and try the TIDAL app for the first time, you get access to 30 days of FREE music!

All plans include:
- Millions of songs in HiRes lossless sound quality up to up to 24-bit, 192 kHz and Dolby Atmos
- Ad-free listening, unlimited skips
- Personalized mixes based on your preferences
- Editorially curated playlists 
- Offline mode
- Track and share your streaming activity
- TIDAL Connect, to listen in lossless quality on supported devices

Subscription automatically renews on a monthly basis. Cancel anytime.
Terms and Conditions of Use: http://tidal.com/terms
Privacy Notice: https://tidal.com/privacy

Can I try the TIDAL app free of charge?
You can sign up for a free trial of TIDAL for an ad-free, fully interactive listening experience.

Can I import my playlists from other streaming services I use?
We know the effort you put into curating the perfect playlist. Move your favorite playlists, tracks, albums, and artists from another music streaming service with tidal.com/transfer-music.

Can I download and listen to my music offline?
Yes! To download music for offline listening, you simply need to find the song, album, or playlist you want and select the download button. Once downloaded, the audio files are stored on your device, allowing you to access and play your music without a wifi or internet connection. With offline music, TIDAL provides a seamless listening experience that is both convenient and enjoyable.

Can I try the TIDAL app free of charge?

Can I import my playlists from other streaming services I use?
We know the effort you put into curating the perfect playlist. Move your favorite playlists, tracks, albums, and artists from another music streaming service with tidal.com/transfer-music.

Can I download and listen to my music offline?
Yes! To download music for offline listening, you simply need to find the song, album, or playlist you want and select the download button. Once downloaded, the audio files are stored on your device, allowing you to access and play your music without a wifi or internet connection.
