title: Music Superstar Career Tycoon
description:
Music Superstar Career Tycoon ‚Äì Your journey to fame starts here! üåü

From the creators of Hollywood Superstar and Motorsport Racer Career comes a brand-new music simulator that lets you live the life of a rising artist and build your own superstar career. üé§

üé∂ Choose your style ‚Äì Rap, Pop, Rock, R&B, or Country ‚Äì and drop hit songs that climb the charts.
‚ú® Write your own star story, win fans, and become the most famous name in the industry.
ü§ù Collaborate with your favorite artists in singles or duos and dominate the music box charts.
üè¢ Create your own label, sign talented artists, and grow a music empire that rivals the big three.
üí∏ Go from underground to rich & famous, proving you‚Äôve got what it takes to be the GOAT.

Key Features:

-Manage your music star career step by step
-Compete in the ultimate GOAT ranking system
-Play fun mini-games for song creation and epic concerts
-Build your label and become a legendary manager
-And so much more‚Ä¶

Are you ready to become the next Music Superstar? üåçüé∂

scraped_reviews.content: The game is good for a start but I would like some more updates like you should be able to record, release of song at your own convenient time, one should also be able to release an album, make it more realistic, you should be able to write songs as many as you like and be releasing it at your prefer time, there should be character edition and also to be able to buy luxurious things e.g House, Car, Clothes jewelries. There should be conversation on collab, diss, concert at yr own wish etc

5 hrs into this game! a few play throughs and I gotta say I really enjoy this game. We dont get music career games very often and few are even good but I like this. I feel like this can be the best music career game with a few updates. Here are my thoughts - Social media accounts - Music videos - Upgrade system - Merch/branding - Royalties - Genre crossovers - Tours/Festivals - Option to sign contracts/ Be independent - Viral moments/Viral music videos/Viral performances
Very Good Game but some flaws,you are only able to release 3 songs a year which is not realistic at all,you should be able to make a album and then after 4 years you have to pay again
best music sim ive played so far, but please add the option of making albums, also it seems way too easy to get in contact with big names, really looking forward to how this game goes !!

The game is good but needs more update The chart doesn't look like chart it just looks like hall of Fame Like most streamed song that year just make a good Billboard hot 100 chart for singles and let us create album too and create billboard 200 charts for albums üíôüôè
this game is pretty good but you have to pay for the full version so it's not really worth it, I came in thinking I was gonna get a long gameplay and came out sad, confused, and angry
It is a good game. What it needs to be improve are: (1) it needs album sales (2) the world tour (3) close to realistic with the numbers.
probably this is the best beginning of the game. The only thing that is not fun is you have to do it again and again over and over hope for a nice and fair update
its boring with the half game. Then expects you to buy the game in full version. they should just sell the game in playstore
can you add an ad option where instead of paying for pro we just watch ads for those who can't afford to go pro
Great game but please add different genres like electronic music.
have to purchase inorder to play the game long terrible.

The game is good but cancelled the Real life option
this game is good but can you please make it cheaper some of us are brokeüòÇüòÇüòÇ

it really good and I think you should remove the upgrade to pro and can you guys do football simulation it will be really good and if you guys do football simulation pls don't add upgrade to Pro do ot will be much better and funner thx
the game is good but we should also be able to release songs when we want and making albums,tours character customization if possible all that
damn,it can't even create a song!! fix this
I really like your games so much, and this one is the best. So, I hope to see more updates and to see how far you guys can go to keep me addicted.
Decent game, shame you can only do a couple of years before you have to buy the full game
Not I free game I would give 0 Stars if possible
need to improve

bro y'all really need to stop making us pay for theses games if these games were free and shi y'all would have been one of the best sport game maker on ts app and alot more ppl playing the games‚úåüèæüòÇü•Ä
the game is great but please make Version of Motogp simulator game like the f1 you did motorsports simulator before. thanks

I love the games u make keep up the good work

title: Kick the BuddyÔºçFun Action Game
description:
Looking for a way to relax and unwind after a long day? Or maybe you‚Äôre just looking for a fun game to play when bored? Kick The Buddy is the perfect anti stress game for you! This cool game lets you take a break, have fun, and release some energy in a light-hearted way. Whether it‚Äôs kicking, punching, or tossing Buddy around, this is all about having fun without any real harm‚Äîafter all, Buddy is just a ragdoll dummy!

Why you‚Äôll love Kick The Buddy:

‚Äì Fun & Relaxing: Release stress with funny and simple gameplay. Punch, toss, or stretch Buddy in this anti-stress relaxing toy game.
‚Äì Awesome Weapons: From heavy guns to imaginative gadgets, choose from a huge range of items to create your own fun.
‚Äì Customize Buddy: Make your Buddy stand out! Add cool accessories and give him a whole new look.
‚Äì Offline Fun: Enjoy the game anywhere! It‚Äôs one of the best anti stress games offline, so no need for Wi-Fi.
‚Äì Non-stop Action: Whether you‚Äôre looking for a fun game or want to experiment with ragdoll game physics.
‚Äì Great for Everyone: Fans of boy games for free, ragdoll simulators, and stickman dismounting will love this game!

No need to worry about stress anymore‚Äîjust kick, punch, and stretch Buddy in this funny game. Buddy never gets hurt‚Äîhe‚Äôs just a test dummy ready for action! The gameplay is light-hearted, so it‚Äôs all about having fun without the stress of strategy or tough challenges. It‚Äôs not a killing game, Buddy is here to make you smile, not to be destroyed. You can experiment with toss the buddy, try some cool games weapons, or just have fun with dummy games.

This one of the best destress relaxing games is perfect for:

‚Äì People who want a fun game that‚Äôs easy to pick up and play.
‚Äì Those looking for stress relief games after a busy day.
‚Äì Players who enjoy fun no wifi games to pass the time.
‚Äì Anyone looking for fun games with no wifi for travel or just to chill

Whether you‚Äôre a fan of destruction games, weird games to play, or simply want to kick back and relax with really fun games, Kick The Buddy has got you covered. It‚Äôs one of the fun awesome games that‚Äôll make you laugh and relax at the same time!

So, what are you waiting for? It‚Äôs time to beat the buddy and enjoy some stress relief in this humorous game. No pressure, no rush‚Äîjust pure fun! Download now and see why it‚Äôs one of the funnest games out there.

scraped_reviews.content: Cool for what it's worth.The buddy talks (trash talking to the player, pleading, and whining), which gives incentive to do your best work when it comes to being merciless (as if the coins and rewards weren't enough). There's even the ability to dress him up and also little mini-games for extra rewards. Must have game for all the ones that have a twisted "Inner Child". Only reason it doesn't get "5-‚òÖ's" is because it gives the option to turn on blood effects but makes you pay for Premium for it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We appreciate your interest in our game! We understand that the ads are irritating, but we need the revenue to improve our game. We are doing our best to minimize them as much as possible to your comfort!

scraped_reviews.content: sound settings automatically turn themselves back on without even changing the switch, withing minutes I will have to click it on get another sound to run and click it off again while the sound is running to stop it. which only works for seconds till it starts again. and if you don't purchase the ad block or play offline or with other ad blockers good luck as it's more ads than gameplay. I'm willing to change the review if and when these get improved. at least the sound but I mean cmon

The game itself is really fun and I do remember playing it back then as well. The thing is, any time I click on a new weapon, an ad would pop up. Every time I "knock him out" I would get a pop up or an ad. They made this game more annoying for the player instead of the actual buddy. airplane mode doesn't work either because it would still give you popups about their vip or premium. It's sad to see the game the way it is.

when I was younger and we actually had to buy the game it did have ads but way less and it was a great,enjoyable experience, and a unforgettable experience! but now it's free and as expected it is horrible, gameplay fun but way to many ads, can't even pick a weapon without getting one or two ads every 30 seconds!I wish it could go back to the way it was.

This used to be a fun game, but when I decided to try again I was overwhelmed by new annoying features that don't give you a second to do anything. It used to be a fun game to mess around with, relax, and kill time, but now there's some dumb rewards system, different game modes, making progress to unlock new items every time the buddy dies, and you don't actually get to play the game for more than three seconds at a time before the game stops you. It's just frustrating and slow paced now.

It's sad how bad this game has gotten. I remember when there were no ads, and you could play offline. The craziest thing to me by far is that in this version of the game, there are some weapons not available anymore. Not even a way to pay for them and instead says there comming "soon." Now, this game is a shameless cash grab like most of the trash on the app store. On top of all that, the game has an offline tag, but if you try to play offline, you get nonstop pop-ups stopping you from playing.

I remember back when I first got this game a while back it was one of the best things ever for me, but ever since playgendary bought the game, they have immediately went to ruining it. Every 5 clicks pulls up an ad, and when it asks you if you want to watch an ad to earn something and you click no, half the time it still plays an ad. Half the stuff that used to be in the game is no either locked behind a paywall of 13 dollars a month, or just flat out says "soon" as if it didn't already exist.

The game is 70% ads. Most of the weapons you have to buy in gold (the microtransactions). Then most of the time while you're playing its asking for you to pay for their membership (or even stopping your playing time for an ad). I had this game awhile ago and wanted to pick it up again, but I'd honestly tell anyone that wants to play the game you better just buy it. No point of playing the free version.

Full of ads, as expected. I had fun until I had to watch an ad every minute or so. I don't mind ads that much, but please knock it down a bit. So why 2 stars? I enjoyed the game in the first few minutes and the variety of ways you can torture the buddy is fun, it's just annoying since some of the best items are locked behind a paywall of some sorts. Fun game, but little to no play time, since ads take up most of the time. You also have to pay to have dumb things like blood..? lol

Insane amount of ads and monetization. Basically, if you're not willing to spend real money on the game, don't bother installing it, it's pretty much unplayable. Random ads out of nowhere, everything locked behind real money or ads (you need to buy blood to unlock it...), it's crazy. More than 70% of the game is locked behind money and ads. I get that you want to make money, but this is just greedy...

This game was amazing when it came out, it receives stress, was incredibly fun, and had tons of things to do. Now every time I open the app, I'm bombarded with ads, I get that you need to make money, but I watched 3 ads in a row after killing him, I even bought the diamond membership that claims to remove ads, but it didn't work. At this point just delete it, you've turned it into a horrid piece of garbage to play.

SO. MANY. ADS. The only reason I didn't rate 1 star is because the game is decent to play when I want to pass time, but I have to play on airplane mode in order to actually play it longer than 3 seconds. There are ads on-screen and then every time I even try to touch the guy... boom ad. Even if I manage to do anything, a "gift" pops up, ad... it even makes me watch an ad when I decline. Ugh.

I love this game! Buddy's like my own little stress ball that I can torture at my leisure. Only thing is there are too many ads! I don't mind watching ads to get free stuff in the game, and since I already watch ads voluntarily I get frustrated when it's forced down my throat. Other than that, it's very fun, addicting, and a great stress reliever! I would also like there to be a feature where you can rip his limbs apart. That would be fun!

This game just became worse. These "updates" are destroying the game. Now, buddy dies WAY TO FAST with some weapons, the "present" appears even after I had bought the no ads thing, there are audio problems, and most of the items aren't even available anymore. I was having fun with the earlier versions with tons of things unlocked, and now there is no restore progress option. As of right now, the game is only playable if you buy no ads. If these things are fixed, I will rate much higher.

In the description of the game it says "Relieve stress!" I launched the game and got an ad before the game even opened. I tapped on the buddy after that for 15 seconds and got a reward-another unskippable ad. I tried to buy a cool weapon with my built up "currency" and found that you gotta watch not 1, not even 3, but 5 unskippable ads if you want the weapon. At this rate to play even 10 minutes of this already stupid game would be an hour of ads. Stress reliever my a**.

Add overload. The game is mildly entertaining but there is no real depth to it. Blood cost money but he does not even do much apart from talk and show a few bumps and bruises. Let's talk more about the adds because you will be watching more adds than actually playing this game. Some will actually open to the play store without giving you the option to just x-out. That is bull freaking poop. Now to the good stuff. Weapon choices are a bit fun. Too many adds to obtain a free weapon. Might not be at all worth it. The new interesting plus but also a big minus - cancel out in a way - is the advertisement that interacts during gameplay. That was fun actually. Random pimp shows up on the side and if you got him money pops out. This app will not survive.

This was a great game a long time ago, but it's bad now. There's way too many ads and it crashes alot, and almost everything isn't unlockable so you have to purchase it. A while back they made him easier to kill so you could see more ads which in itself was stupid, and now it plays an ad every time you press a button(it feels like) and I haven't played the 2nd one but it had the same kinda reviews. They are trying to make so much money that they don't care about quality. That's why 1 star.

Why just 3 stars for this game? The game is so full of ads to the point where it isn't even playable. Open the weapon selection and an ad pops up. Get some clothing for buddy and an ad pops up. Kill buddy and deny the ad for a present and what do you get? You guessed it, an ad! It wouldn't be so bad if it wasn't every second that I got an ad but unfortunately it is. Apart from the ads the game is pretty fun and a great stress reliever. The variety of methods to kill buddy makes this game a joy.

This game forces way too many ads. I just played less than 5 minutes and was bombarded by 7 ads... Why? I understand the need for ads, but forcing the every 45 seconds is ridiculous. I want to play the game, not be forced to watch ads like this. Sure, you can skip them after 15-30 seconds after it starts... you get no reward for it, and it's too frequent.

I used to play this game all the time when I was younger and I loved it. (It was one of my favorite games to play) But of course, after downloading it to play it again, it managed to get taken over by advertisements which ruined the fun. When I tried to play this again, most of my "playing" time was just advertisements. And a majority of the weapons now cost gold OR ads. (Which is not cool at all) So, too many ads, can't really play for that long, and this game is now a piece of trash to me.

Generally, this game is really fun. Buuuut, there's just too much ads that fill up the game. Like I would kill buddy but then have to watch a 30 second ad. Idk about the graphics. I guess it's ok just like the gameplay. Also, when I'm in the middle of torturing buddy, an ad just pops up and I have to wait half a minute. One more complain is one of the ads when I have to watch the entire thing and it just shows a minigame. When I play the first level, it baits me into playing the next one.

So much for playing a gane from my childhood. It just throws a bunch of stuff in your face every 5 seconds. Ads for everything and everything you click. This is just a personal preference, but I don't care for the giant KO bar at the top, coins popping out of him, and having to manually pick up the coins. Terrible game. Sad to see it go.

This game is okay, has a ton of adds, and barely gives you any game time between it. They do give you very little to start with, and the rest you have to watch 5-20 commercials to unpock weapons or tools. And, if you're saving your money, you can accidently click something, and you can never get that money back. It took me awhile of watching too many adds, and using the equipment you watched 10 adds for, to get enough money, all for nothing.

Kick the buddy was a legendary game, one I spent genuine hours on when I was younger, and seeing it scrolling through my feed brought back real memories. So I went and downloaded it again and played it, and it played a new little tutorial, but not even 30 seconds in, an ad popped up, in the tutorial. And then I knew, that one of my favorite mobile games as a child, has fallen ill to the greedy ad scheme. I played more, and it was all the same. Absolutely unplayable. Fix your game, foul misers.

The game sucks. WAY too many ads. You cannot progress without constantly watching ads. Also, it's unoriginal. There was a game called Buddyman Kick that has been forgotten. It was made WAY before this one. It's better because it doesn't rely on ads. This game also has too many in app purchases. The first thing you see as you open the app, an in app purchase. Every time you select a tool to use, in app purchases. Need money? Buy it with an in app purchase, otherwise grind forever, and watch a million ads. This is not worth the time or money. Do not download.

Usually when people complain about ads I don't mind it much, but this is insufferable. Every time I kill the buddy (which takes about three seconds), I am presented with a 'free gift' for an ad, but even after waiting five seconds to click the x, I am forced to watch an unskippable ad anyway. The ads take up more than two-thirds of the game.

Way too many ads. Literally every 5 seconds an ad pops up. And in order to unlock more wepons you have to watch even more ads. that is unless you buy their rediculously over priced in game purchases. They have a "premium membership" for, get this, $6.99 a week. That's over $350 a year. I don't even pay that much for my gym membership.

This game used to be fun. Now the whole things an ad. I get a max one minute of game play without an ad interrupting me. I'm literally getting ads for this game WHILE PLAYING IT. I downloaded this game because I thought it was going to be playable. You have to watch ads to unlock rewards they say u earned, and just about every 30 seconds. Now it's only a cash grab and not a fun enjoyable game.

Hello, I would like to let you know that three years ago, your game was amazing, now it's doing a horrible job. The second I redownload the app yesterday and I opened it, it came a lot more annoying ads. Then, I signed up thinking that all my progress will be saved. The worst part is that today, the game froze twice and the third time I opened the app, I lost ALL my progress even when I was still using the same account! Thank you for reading this and I hope you'll fix it. Have a nice day!

Used to play it when I was little and it was fun back then...... but NOW!!!!! I installed it to feel the nostalgia, but when I opened the app i was welcomed by an unskipable 50 second ad and that's not it, there's ads every 20-30 seconds!!!! This is a scam!!! I was literally spending more time on ads than actual gameplay. And sometimes I was getting ads in between actual gameplay, so I actually do not recommend it to no one unless you like ads so fix yalls game!!!

You can watch an ad every 20 seconds, or choose to not play this piece of garbage. Everything about this game is centered around buying in-game currency. The shops are ridiculously expensive, the rounds last 20 seconds each, and after each round there is an unskippable 45 second ad. You will have to suffer through this garbage or watch ad after ad. When you do that, what really is the point of this game anymore? You can bet I wouldn't give this game another minute worth of my life. Horrible game. Don't waste your memory over this waste üëç

Man this game went downhill compared to when it first came out. Can't do a single thing without being hit with an ad. Look at the leaderboard for a recent event and click out of the window... Ad. Click on the menu to look at the different weapons and decide to close it after not purchasing anything... Ad. Unlike other games where they give you the option to purchase no ads, this game feels like it punishes you for not purchasing the no ads mtx. You get an ad every time you take out the buddy...

Absolutely horrible. You have officially out ad'ed VooDoo. Everything is locked behind a pay wall. I can't even turn on blood without paying $6!!!! You people are greedy. I wouldn't mind dropping a few bucks for this game but there is no way in hell i would buy a renewing subscription just to play a time killer mobile game. Ads every ten seconds. I have to watch 10 minutes of ads just to unlock one new weapon. I have to watch ads to unlock my prizes. Conviently placed ads that block thr screen.

I downloaded the game for me and my daughter. The graphics are nice and the Buddy is funny. The ads when the internet is on are incessant, they keep coming. I try to keep it on so we can get the free gold after every 4 minutes of play but the ads can be frustrating, especially for a 4 year old. Everything costs quite a bit so it takes a while to unlock things which is why I have it downloaded on 3 devices. Only problem is that it doesn't always let me save my progress on Google play or it will crash while trying to save. It's a good game mostly. I'd never pay for it but it's nice to have.

This "game" was designed to suck money out of your bank account. It's a scam really. You can maybe get a couple items to use for free like colorful balls to throw... Whoopdeedoo. Other than that you have to get a ton of dollars for items or gold which the dollars can be earned but very very slowly. Some items are earned by watching TEN ads for one item or inviting three friends. They give you 5 spins for the slot machine sure but I won each one and I'm sure I'd lose the spins if I pay for it.

Fun game, as it was a childhood game for years. Though, now that I notice it, the advertisements are unbearable, as a single click results in a 15-30 long ad. And on top of that, certain weapons can only be unlocked by watching a number of ads in a row, and others requiring a premium subscription that requires a payment of 7 dollars a week. Fun game, but please, try harder than that

One of my favorite games. I love to kick the buddy. There is so many weapons and ways to kick the buddy! Also I love the messages well you wait for it to load so the player doesn't get bored. Super stress relieving and funny. My only problem is the ads. I understand that you need to make money some how, but there's to many. like every time he dies there's a ad. It wouldn't be so bad if the ads came up a bit less. And if I turn off my wifi I can't buy anything! But overall 9/10

Downloaded after a few years of not playing. Still have some fun weapons but besides that it's just a money grab, either pay the subscription or constantly watch ads. I honestly think this game makes me more infuriated after playing instead of being an outlet. You became what you sought to destroy and it's sad. At the same time I understand that the devs need money, but the constant ads are not worth playing the game

It's mechanics are of extreme quality, and I must admit I played this for hours! If only there were less ads.. I would play this game 24-7 if there were more features, like mini games or easter eggs. The graphic design is also spectacularly put together, considering this game is free. If I could improve this app in any other way, I would add more outfits at cheaper prices. Please consider my opinion and the opinion of other reveiwers before you buy this game. Thanks for listening to my Ted Talk.

This game is awesome, not gonna lie. But the ADS are outrageous. Right when you go to the items it shows you an ad. Right when you kill buddy, you need to watch an ad to proceed. Sure, you can skip it with the blue button that pops up after a second, but now when you press the blue button, YOU STILL GET AN AD. But other than that, its a FINE game.

I don't know why they have 2 apps that are named differently, but the same game and I was gonna get a higher rating until I found out they do something annoying, you shut your Internet off and tried to play, they keep pushing a pop up that keeps appearing until you turn on your Internet, so ads will appear, so I have decided , I'm just not gonna keep or use it too many ads and they force you to endure them to play a game. That still plays in the background even if the pop up is present.

the issue about this game is just obvious, the limit on the ads, there's way too many. I know I need to pay but you can't get even one ad before you get into the game, and also, you literally made some weapons under construction again which was all apart from the older kick the buddies which is miserable, I rated 2 stars for at least giving effort into them at least.

I signed up for the weekly diamond membership. However, after the initial 3 days, I can't access any of the diamond items. I've been charged, but can't just turn. When I try to, it says I need to sign up for diamond. Then it tells me that I'm already signed up. I got charged a few times for something I couldn't even use. I emailed about this and got no response

This game is horrible!! I wish I could give it no stars, but in order to rate I have to atleast give it one. It has wayyy to many ads!! And everytime I go on the game the screen goes white, and then, it just logs me out! It's so laggy and it doesn't even let me play the game for more than 1 minute before I get ads, on top of ads, on top of ads! This game is so horrifying. I do NOT reccomend.

I like this ap a lot! It's very cathartic! But I'm becoming to find it more frustrating than relaxing. It constantly crashes when I am either about to receive rewards, or right after I each the ads that my rewards, forcing me to constantly close it without getting them. Oh, and now it randomly make me watch 2 ads instead of 1, or just throws one in the middle for the hell of it with no rewards. If this keeps up, I'm just gonna move on to a new game, but I can assure you it won't be any from the ads I'm forced to waste my time watching here.

This game WAS pretty amazing, playing as a kid and watching YouTube videos on the game every day, but now when I go back to it, it doesn't feel the same. Ads are way too reoccurring after doing each task, and it crashes very often. The cost of some items in the game are very unnecessary, and there are a variety of items only unlockable with payment, which is kind of annoying. Nevertheless, this game was great until big issues starting rampaging it's reputation.

The game is great, I used to love playing it. The only thing is, it is ruined by the ads. What could be an amazing game is ruined. Also, everytime there is an ad it crashes right after the ad, making you lose your progress of the 5 ads you apparently have to watch to get a free item. Just fix this and I will download it again.

Unplayable. This game is riddled with ads. Loaded up the game and immediately crashed after the "hi I'm buddy" tag line. Loaded it again and discovered the ad causing the problem is telling you to pay to go ad free. Within seconds of closing that screen, another ad pops up crashing the game. Try a third time and a Little Ceasers ad pops up and the game crashes again. Not worth the hassle.

There's this weird bug. I don't know if y'all have noticed, but there's a game in your ads. It's really distracting me from the constant popups and 'buy-me!' prompts. I get that you can pay to remove ads, but the sheer volume of guff you throw the way of the player makes me want to throw my phone, rather than my buddy, through the window. Color me disappointed if I'm wrong, but maybe you'd get a few more sales if it wasn't so difficult to click through the ads y'all have stuffed into every menu.

The game might be fine, if there weren't just... So... Many... Ads! You want to switch weapons? Watch an ad. Wanna kill the buddy? After you do, you watch an ad! How about when you want to earn certain weapons? You guessed it, another ad! Plus, you have to play and earn in-game money to unlock weapons. Issue is, you spend more time watching ads than playing. So it is really hard to earn those, too. Yes, there is a no ads option, costing $4.99 USD, but the gameplay is not even worth it.

title: BeautyCam-AI Photo Editor
description:
"BeautyCam: Transform Your Photos, Highlight Your Natural Beauty

Discover the power of advanced technology to effortlessly create stunning visuals 
BeautyCam puts professional-level tools at your fingertips:
Multiple camera models replicate the charm of DSLRs, IPhone Cam, and film cameras

title: ASICS Runkeeper - Run Tracker
description:
Together, we run.

The running app designed for all runners. Whether you run/walk, or you finish marathons on the regular, join the ASICS Runkeeper community to connect with runners globally. 

Training plans, guided workouts, monthly running challenges and more will help you run further, run faster and run longer. Set running and training goals, track your progress and share your journey with our community. From your first run to your next 5K, 10K, half or full marathon, the ASICS Runkeeper app can help you do it. Trusted by 5k runners to those running marathons. 
 
TOP FEATURES   
Guided Workouts 
Custom Training Plans 
Monthly Running Challenges 
Activity Insights 
Goal Setting 
Shoe Tracker 
 
OVERVIEW 
‚Ä¢ Guided Workouts: Let our ASICS Runkeeper coaches motivate you through audio-guided workouts for everything from your first 5K to interval training to mindfulness runs.  
 
‚Ä¢ Custom Training Plans: Train for your next race with a personalized training plan‚Äìfrom a 5K, 10k, half marathon or a full marathon. 
 
‚Ä¢ Monthly Running Challenges: Stay motivated with monthly run challenges. Challenge your friends and share your achievements with the Runkeeper community.  
 
‚Ä¢Track Workouts: Run, walk, jog, bike, hike and more. GPS tracking gives you a clear view of your training in real time. Log your distance (miles or km), speed, splits, pace, calories, and more.    
 
‚Ä¢ Set Goals: Have a race, weight, or pace in mind? Our ASICS Runkeeper coaches, training plans, guided workouts, and monthly challenges will help you to accomplish your fitness goal.  
 
‚Ä¢ Track Progress: Detailed activity insights help you see your progress over time. 
 
‚Ä¢ Shoe Tracker: Keep track of the mileage on your running shoes and the app will remind you when it‚Äôs time for a new pair. 
 
ADDITIONAL FEATURES 
‚Ä¢ Running Groups: Create a custom challenge, invite friends, track each other‚Äôs progress, and use the chat to cheer each other on.  
 
‚Ä¢ Audio Cues: Hear your pace, distance, splits, and time as you run. 
 
‚Ä¢ Partner Apps: Listen to music with Spotify and Apple Music integrations, sync with Garmin watches, and connect with health apps like Fitbit and MyFitnessPal so you can track running and fitness with your wearables.
 
‚Ä¢ Indoor Tracking: Track treadmill, elliptical and gym workouts in stopwatch mode. 
 
‚Ä¢  Social Sharing: Share snapshots of your activities, or run club activities, to any app, from social media to messaging platforms. 
 
‚Ä¢ Activity Insights: Track running activities to see how your runs improve and get a full view of your fitness journey.  
 
‚Ä¢ Live Tracking: Share your live location with your approved contacts.  
 
‚Ä¢ Join the running community that helps you get out the door and reach your running goals! Download the ASICS Runkeeper app today.
descriptionHTML:
Together, we run.

The running app designed for all runners. Whether you run/walk, or you finish marathons on the regular, join the ASICS Runkeeper community to connect with runners globally.

Training plans, guided workouts, monthly running challenges and more will help you run further, run faster and run longer. Set running and training goals, track your progress and share your journey with our community. From your first run to your next 5K, 10K, half or full marathon, the ASICS Runkeeper app can help you do it. Trusted by 5k runners to those running marathons.

TOP FEATURES
Guided Workouts
Custom Training Plans
Monthly Running Challenges
Activity Insights
Goal Setting
Shoe Tracker

OVERVIEW
‚Ä¢ Guided Workouts: Let our ASICS Runkeeper coaches motivate you through audio-guided workouts for everything from your first 5K to interval training to mindfulness runs.

‚Ä¢ Custom Training Plans: Train for your next race with a personalized training plan‚Äìfrom a 5K, 10k, half marathon or a full marathon.

‚Ä¢ Monthly Running Challenges: Stay motivated with monthly run challenges. Challenge your friends and share your achievements with the Runkeeper community.

‚Ä¢Track Workouts: Run, walk, jog, bike, hike and more. GPS tracking gives you a clear view of your training in real time. Log your distance (miles or km), speed, splits, pace, calories, and more.

‚Ä¢ Set Goals: Have a race, weight, or pace in mind? Our ASICS Runkeeper coaches, training plans, guided workouts, and monthly challenges will help you to accomplish your fitness goal.

‚Ä¢ Track Progress: Detailed activity insights help you see your progress over time.

‚Ä¢ Shoe Tracker: Keep track of the mileage on your running shoes and the app will remind you when it‚Äôs time for a new pair.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Running Groups: Create a custom challenge, invite friends, track each other‚Äôs progress, and use the chat to cheer each other on.

‚Ä¢ Audio Cues: Hear your pace, distance, splits, and time as you run.

‚Ä¢ Partner Apps: Listen to music with Spotify and Apple Music integrations, sync with Garmin watches, and connect with health apps like Fitbit and MyFitnessPal so you can track running and fitness with your wearables.

‚Ä¢ Indoor Tracking: Track treadmill, elliptical and gym workouts in stopwatch mode.

‚Ä¢ Social Sharing: Share snapshots of your activities, or run club activities, to any app, from social media to messaging platforms.

‚Ä¢ Activity Insights: Track running activities to see how your runs improve and get a full view of your fitness journey.

‚Ä¢ Live Tracking: Share your live location with your approved contacts.

‚Ä¢ Join the running community that helps you get out the door and reach your running goals! Download the ASICS Runkeeper app today.
summary: A running app to track, measure, and improve your fitness.

scraped_reviews.content: I love using this app. However on the Samsung S21+ if you use the workout feature for interval runs it will not let you know your final information and will just go to a white screen. You have to close out and reopen the app in order to see your stats. I have messaged the dev team about it and no response. This has been an ongoing experience they have not fixed. Settings are correct too. edit after doing what was suggested by dev it's still not fixed and I got a generic reinstall message.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for reaching out to us here! It's possible we may have missed your inquiry or are still working to get to it, please reach out to us again here at support@runkeeper.com and we would be happy to help in any way we can!

scraped_reviews.content: The latest update established 60 notifications per day. So the app internally decided that the best way to use this was to use all 60 notifications every day - which meant that it was sending notifications every few seconds during activity. So annoying! I disabled all notifications for the app. Overall, this app is becoming less and less functional.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention, a fix for this has been released! Please update your app to the newest version. Let us know if you have any other questions, our team is always happy to help at support@runkeeper.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Wouldn't think over 10 years later I'd still be using this app. Tracks my "runs" ü§î and walks...can also track weight and set run/walk/bike/swim distance, duration, or consistency goals. Another feature I'd thought I'd never use are the training plans. You'd be amazed at how much more they motivate you...PLUS you can still play your music while they chime in occasionally. When using the training plans (not all are free though üò∂) it still tracks with your regular events.

I'm really torn about my rating as I have been using this app for almost 10 yrs now. There are so many wonderful things about the app, but I don't have space to write it out. I moved to the paid plan from the free plan. I paid for the annual plan last year 2x and had a refund for 1; when my subscription actually ran out, I paid for an annual plan again. I submitted a request to customer service and had an initial fast response, but nothing since and no resolution. I guess this is goodbye.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Delaney, thanks so much for reaching out! We would be happy to help with your subscription, it's possible we may have missed your reply! Please don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com and our team can get in touch with you (please let us know you left a review here so we can find you easily). Thanks so much!

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this app for how simple it was to use. For the last two and half years, this app has struggled to record my runs, walks and hikes accurately. I was going to delete this app yesterday, but saw that it had an update and hoped that would fix the problem. Went for a five miles walk this morning and on the breakdown page of miles to minutes it shows I did five miles, but on the main recording page when you stop your activity it only showed 3.84. I'm going to move on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback, we would love to hear more from you! Please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com so we can gather more information from you, including some more information on your activity settings. This will help solve any difficulties you are experiencing. Thanks so much!

scraped_reviews.content: üö® Bug Report: ü™≤ Not sure when this started but, lately, if I navigate off the RK screen to another app during a workout, it ends the workout. Then, 50% of the time, if I tap 'start' again it will pick up in the same workout again, but not always. I used to be able to put the app in "Keep Open" mode and it wouldn't auto-end the workout, but even that doesn't work. Android Galaxy user. App version 16.15 (no new upgrades available)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for bringing this to our attention, our team would love to look into this for you and help find a solution, please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Good run-tracking functionality, and I like that it allows you to program your own intervals. The guided runs are okay, but I find the trainers talk way too much, to the point where it gets annoying. It also automatically lowers the volume of your music for the entirety of the run and doesnt give you any option of changing it, which is unacceptable IMO.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Josh, thanks so much for your feedback, we are happy to bring these suggestions to our development team!

scraped_reviews.content: I actually paid for this app. Bought it because I want to start running regularly and the My 5k program seemed really useful. I love the coach, Erin, and her voice isn't annoying at all. The issue is that the workouts don't load properly. Currently sitting on my couch (again) waiting for the workout I already did to play through so I can go on my run. Who wants to spend an extra half hour waiting for an app to load in the early morning before a run? Hopefully they resolve this annoying ass issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact support@runkeeper.com and our team will help with unlocking a workout for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for years and in general am quite happy with it. I just do the free version. My biggest complaints is actually the lack of more common feminine issues that can be marked when you note that the run isn't great. Would love to see categories like 'hips' and 'pelvic floor' added to the lineup. Or for all -- 'mindset/mental'. These issues are more impactful in my running than the options currently available.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for this feedback, we appreciate any suggestions for improvement! We have brought this to our team to take a look at- should you have any questions please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com.

scraped_reviews.content: For a free app, I highly recommend this product. I am considering purchasing the pay version, considering how much enjoy (and rely) on this version. I live in a less-than-favorable area currently and there are many hills, and I often venture on small, narrow trails to avoid people. The app's GPS tracks me very well. Recommend.

The app certainly has some nice features. However, perhaps they want users to sign in with Facebook or whatever to monetize their data, but as far as I can tell, if you have a standard account you created with RunKeeper, there is no way in your account settings (either with the app or online) to change your password! Nor is there a way to contact customer support to ask to have your password changed. Seems like a non- trivial security issue to me, which is why I only give them 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at support@runkeeper.com. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I hated it, it made me so frustrated, I would go for a long run, and i would use this to track how far I traveled and how long it would take me, but it would continuously cut me off way too short!! It would stop tracking after .05 miles or even .33 miles for no reason, i know for a fact the problem was not on my end, but I just kept restarting the running tracker and it would still just stop for whatever reason. I'm done with this app, my profile is now filled with runs less than half a mile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I‚Äôm so sorry for the trouble you‚Äôre experiencing. Samsung devices are putting extra restrictions on apps that run in the background like Runkeeper. Please email support@runkeeper.com so we can provide the steps to try to fix this. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: As of late I get message that app is not responding properly. Overall I am pleased with the app, but it's frustrating when i get that error message. And sometimes when it finally "works" it does not keep track of calories burned. Seriously, a 3+ mile run/walk and no calories burned? 05/11/24 - The last few months it hasn't tracked progress on challenges. Asks if I want to join even though I've already joined at the beginning of the month. Very
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback, we would love to hear more from you! Please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com so we can gather more information from you and help solve any difficulties you are experiencing. Thanks so much!

scraped_reviews.content: Been using this for over a year, nothing too serious, just recreational running. Been good to me. Sometimes, the gps does not work properly (e.g. I'll run the same route but it will show different distances), but I don't know if that's a problem with the app or my phone. I reached out to customer service with a question and they were quick and helpful!

This app was working great until about a week and a half ago now it keeps saying it can't find GPS even though I'm running the same exact route that it was tracking just fine for months. The few times that it does start it will stop about 5 minutes in and say that I've completed my run without me ever touching pause or stop. I was happy with this app but its time to find another.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I‚Äôm so sorry for the trouble you‚Äôre experiencing. Samsung devices are putting extra restrictions on apps that run in the background like Runkeeper. Please email support@runkeeper.com so we can provide the steps to try to fix this. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app! I never used to track my runs/walks, just would go based off google maps mileage, but this really gives me all the details I could want (for a free app)! Plus you can look back at your activity and see how your improving. There appear to be even more features in the paid version, but I prefer to run as a hobby though and not get too serious, so again the free version of this app is perfect for me.

Never had a problem with this app, loved it until recently when it stopped tracking my workouts. GPS gets stuck and so does the timer. I have it set to tell me my distance every 5 minutes, now it will tell me sometimes and others it picks a random time that is not in 5 minute increments. Please fix this or I will find an app that works better. And it's not my phone, I've had this phone for over a year and have used this app for about 5 years now with other phones. Never had an issue until now.

Updating my review to only 4 stars since now I have to "Enable GPS"...for YOGA?? Come ON! ...Still using the app and can deal with the little nuances (see above) but I can't seem to find a way to easily see total daily calories burned. It gives a weekly / monthly / yearly comparison but I either have to go into each activity to see burned calories or load my workouts in another app to see my daily calorie burn. Seeing my daily burn keeps me motivated. This app does not. Dropping a star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there - I have attached an article here outlining how calories burned is calculated. I do hope this helps clarify, and if you have any further questions please reach out to our support team at support@runkeeper.com! :)

CALORIES BURNED ARTICLE - https://support.runkeeper.com/hc/en-us/articles/201109676-How-are-Calories-Burned-calculated-

scraped_reviews.content: I use this app every day. The accuracy is really good like within .2 of long runs (tracked myself on a half and it was very slightly lower than the actual distance). I love the statistics and run ranking, they're really helpful for seeing growth. I recommend this app to my friends all the time because it's also on ios and you can see each other's runs. Make sure to change the privacy settings though because the run maps are public by default and very easy to zoom in on.

RK used to be the absolute best running app. Not so much since Asics bought it. It no longer gives audio cues for intervals. It no longer allows you to easily log in from a desktop. It no longer allows you to plan and track your own routes or create your own schedule. You'd think a company that bases itself around running wouldn't remove features that runners would use. I would have even gone for the paid version, but I have zero faith that any of the features that made it good are there. üëéüëéüëé
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, all these features are available within the app. You can set audio cues for intervals by setting distance or time triggers from your Audio Stats or creating a custom workout with your desired intervals. We'd appreciated it if you contacted us at support@runkeeper.com saying you came from this review and our team will be happy to help you!

scraped_reviews.content: Keeps quitting in the middle of a run, often at the same point, around a third of a mile, even though screen is locked. Tried the My First 5K program (It's not, but I've been out for over a year). Because program quits, can't unlock next workout. Too bad, used to really like this app. Also, keeps renewing annual membership by default, which means I paid for a year I didn't use.

I have been using this app for years. Recently it stopped connecting to GPS, but allowed me to continue without GPS. Stopped tracking miles mid run. And now I cannot even connect at all. I'm trying to track runs for my virtual runs and I cannot get in at all. Without this app,, I have no other way to track runs unless i download another app. With that said, when this app is working correctly, I can see my runs, compare times, get coaching, get times per mile during runs. All for free. No ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michelle, the issue you‚Äôre experiencing is the result of a Google Maps service outage. We‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience. Please uninstall the app, clear app cache and app data under device Settings: Storage: Runkeeper, and reinstall the app. This should resolve the issue!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great for beginners but meh for advanced runners. I never invested in any of the paid programs. Just to track distance and time. I thought this app was a great free alternative to anyone who didn't mind running with their phone who didn't want to invest in a watch, But as soon as I began tracking runs over 10 miles consistently the app would crash and delete my activity. I would keep running obviously, but it sucks knowing I don't know how far I ran or how fast I was going.

Really worth trying! I'm a total noob when it comes to exercise. I love the fact that when I'm using the 5k option, if there's a day that I don't feel ready to jump to the next lesson I can keep doing the same one until I feel comfortable to do so. Plus it gives me (imo) a really good feedback of how I do and compares it to past exercises.

This used to be one of my top 15 favorite apps. Customer service was great, but then they were bought out by Asics. The app was fine but slowly seemed to lag. Some vanity/low value-add features I'd gotten used to, like a 5-emoji rating on how the activity went, just disappeared. Once seemed like there were so many features I don't know how I'd learn to use them all, but that ended up being more like some graphs of activity pace over time. But there isn't a way to tag outliers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mark - Sorry to hear this was your experience with Runkeeper. Feel free to contact our support team at support@runkeeper.com and we‚Äôre happy to help anyway we can! :)

scraped_reviews.content: Whatever happened in the last few days... the app can no longer find my husband in my contacts, nevertheless digs out some ancient contacts that I used to have and no longer do. I was able to add him all along until couple days ago. I really wish the app would only let you add people from runkeeper friends list. UPDATE: All got fixed pretty much next day after only 3 stars review. I'm back to being a happy user. I still wish you could only add people from your friends list to your run.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear this! Please contact support@runkeeper.com and our team will assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using runkeeper for at least 7 years now. Up until recently, it has worked perfectly. However, within the last 6 months, runkeeper will intermittently complete a run and log it. Very frustrating as I pay for the app and am typically in the middle of a long run. Really discouraging to be running over 10 miles and realize your runkeeper shut down 1/2 mile ago. Please fix this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Samsung devices are putting extra restrictions on apps that run in the background. Please try disabling both 1.¬†Adaptive Battery¬†and¬†2. Put Apps to Sleep. You can do so via this link--choose your phone type and follow the instructions:¬†https://dontkillmyapp.com/¬†Email¬†support@runkeeper.com¬†if the trouble persists!

scraped_reviews.content: Not the greatest at GPS tracking. I run the same mountain each week and the app doesn't always register the loop correctly. Unfortunately, the app doesn't allow you to manually fix the map so it's not accurate. On one jog, the app missed 1.5 miles. I'll still keep this app, but will be looking for another one which is more accurate (or at least editable).

Bring back the My Stats tables! They're so easy to read at a glance! If you want to add the charts, make that in addition to not instead of! There's a lovely little joy in the ritual of glancing at the screen and seeing how this run fit into an overall week, month, year's movement. It's so not the same to have to scroll through a million different graphs. And why use up space on my screen to show ads for Go - I'm already a paying customer and have been for years and years. What's going on?!?!?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback! We hear you and are working on some updates to address your concerns here. Stay tuned for a new version to update to shortly. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I am at a loss to see the number of people who trouble with the app... it has not been a problem with my very iffy use ... had a glitch a few years ago otherwise I would give it a 5 star rating ... I am pleased with the app and the information it provides ... if you want more details why not see what Garmin has available at the same price!!

So after the first week the app worked great. Loved the intervals and how I could listen to my music. But the 2nd week, it started skipping miles like all of the sudden I went from .40 miles to 2.4 miles in 1 minute. Not possible. The mileage is all screwed up and so then is my average time per mile. I'm in training for my first full marathon and I need voice to tell me my mileage and time per mile. I can't keep looking at my watch.

This has been my go to fitness app for over 5 years. Still the best. I use a couple of other apps to connect with friends, but this is the best, most versatile fitness app. I add my swims, walks, gym workouts, bike rides, every thing. This has most of my workout history since I got serious. Still love it. 8/17/2019. Still love it!

I've been using this app (free version) since 2018. Opened the android app this weekend and have no access to my weekly, monthly, annually comparison, nor my history of stats. I'm disappointed to say the least. I'm not sure even if I pay the annual subscription if I'll get those comparisons. Time to upgrade to a running watch and ditch this app. Enough with the subscription business model for everything. I won't buy it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback, our team has heard your concerns and has made some changes to our ‚ÄúMe‚Äù tab! Please update to the newest version and if you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com, we would be happy to go over this with you! Additionally, check out our article about our "Me" tab on our help centre!

scraped_reviews.content: Installed to log mile times. Constantly stopped tracking, so I looked at my phone after not hearing updates to see that it hadn't tracked anything and the app telling me to give them money for pro. Terrible experience Edit: Tried again, still doesnt track activities correctly. It doesn't matter how the GPS is doing if it randomly decides to stop the activity whenever it wants anyways. Choose this app if you want to spend more time looking at your device than exercising. Anything is better
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Austin, thank you for bringing this to our attention! Our team would be happy to look into any GPS issues you may be experiencing, please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com and we can gather some more information from you to help. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: edit activity doesn't let you edit anything useful. I accidentally entered 148 miles instead of 1.48 miles, and there was no way to change it. I tried clicking edit activity from the summary page, but the only thing you can change is how you feel about the run and other minor things. Ultimately, I had to delete the entry and just reenter everything. A pretty big oversight for something that is supposed to keep track of your runs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matt- thanks for your feedback, we would love to look into this more and have let our development team know as well. Please reach out to us at support@runkeeper.com with the activity date this occurred on and we can look into this more.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app, but I just can't stand the way it handles audio. Even with the audio stats turned off, the app makes a sharp, painful clicking noise into my headphones periodically during an activity, even with headphone volume at a reasonable level for a podcast. When I have tried audio stats, it's always so much louder than my music or podcast, to the level of being painful. It's almost as if the developers haven't really used the app.

This app keeps all my records and it's easy to operate. For some reason the audio queue is not working. Looked into all the resolution offered (all notifications are on and all the volumes are up) but I still can't hear any queues. Took away another star because the routes are pointless. You don't see the trail while you run, which doesn't make sense if it's a new route.

** STILL not working. this is ridiculous!!! Since mid September the app has stopped tracking mid run - which is VERY frustrating. I never had this issue in the past. I keep having to have the screen on and even then when it refreshes it is not calculating distance correctly. This is a vital feature and throws off distance and pace! I have been using this app for 6 years and really don't want to have to switch because all my history is in this app but it's getting really frustrating!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our developers have resolved the issue. Please reach out to support@runkeeper.com with an email address associated with your Runkeeper account for further app assistance. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Tracks sporadically. Mileage off by up to .35 of a mile on the same run. Sometimes freezes at the beginning of a run. It keeps offering me to upgrade, but I'm missing my goals 'on paper's due to poor mileage tracking. I can't get excited about paying for something that isn't accurate. Lots of potential, and useful for a free app, but I need to know that it will work properly to pay for the service. Update: Audio stats no longer work, and there is no way to report an issue from the app.

I've been using this for two years and a month ago my miles for this week started showing up in the prior week. Reinstalled, cleared cache...no solution. Also, some times it takes several minutes to open a screen. Update: 5 years into using runkeeper and it's much more refined and works well. There problems I had in the past are in the past and have been resolved.

I deleted the app and reinstalled. It has nothing to do with GPS! The app quits. Love it! USED TO.... Not sure what happened but around the 10-mile mark, it just stops. I ran a half marathon and at 10.9 miles, blank screen and no more voice cues. Cleared cache, nothing helps. This has happened several times. Not sure if it's because I use my camera on the runs, lose cell service, or other apps interfering. SUCKS!!! I'm trying to get my run times down and I have no idea. Please fix!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there - I definitely get why this would be frustrating. Check out this article for troubleshooting tips to reset your GPS! :) - https://support.runkeeper.com/hc/en-us/articles/201109406-How-to-Get-the-Best-GPS-Results

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I did what others said to do to fix the crashing problem and now it works like a charm. Turn off other unneeded programs, clear the cache on Google and other high memory use apps, and regularly clear the cache on Runkeeper itself. Runkeeper also reached out to me after seeing my earlier review. It is still a great app to track my runs -- very user friendly, great mapping, nice stats. I have years of data on it. I use it every time I run and highly recommend it. Past: Like some others, I have used this app for years and recommended it. Lately, though, it cuts off in the middle of my runs. Unless there is a fix soon, I'll be looking for a new running app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry for the trouble! Sounds like you're experiencing a known issue - please email support@runkeeper.com so we can troubleshoot this and let you know when we have a fix. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The auto detection doesn't work. I hike 12 miles and it only recorded 2. Other than that a great app I used it almost daily. 5/9/17 for 3 weeks this app has been responding too slow. It takes a couple minutes to start and it takes a couple minutes to pause or even stop tracking. I figured it was my old phone so to be safe I reinstall the application and it seemed to work as new. The only issue is that it didn't uploaded my last seven tracks. If I was missing 2-10 miles I wouldn't care but I am missing about 60 miles. I already email tech support and I'm waiting for their response. Either way it's a great application and as long as it works I will keep on using it.  4/2/19 About a year ago, I upgraded my phone and it fixed the slow response. That is no longer an issue. I am still iffy to try auto detection but I should tested on a short bike ride.  I am wondering if I can go on to people's profile and download their route to guide me?

Highly disappointed in this app. I've been looking for a replacement for Endomondo, and I thought I found it with this app. It seemed promising, especially with all the stats it presented when going on a run. Unfortunately, I had occasional issues with GPS. It would either start off at 0.25 miles when I had only run for like 20 seconds, or I would run for over half a mile and yet it would only record a 0.19 mile run. I know my phone isn't the issue or settings with this app. Just the app bugs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear about that! Please reach at support@runkeeper.com with your email address associated with your Runkeeper account and our customer support team will help you out with any tracking issues. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I upgraded to Pro, at which time they made changes.. I don't like that I cannot access my training programs to plan my schedule ahead. I feel like I am stuck with very little and the investment was not worth it. I have used Runkeeper for SEVERAL YEARS, and have absolutely loved it, even the free version, which I recommended to everyone. This more recent update is just frustrating. I also like to do more than one training program at a time at certain points of the year, and I cannot. *HATING!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear this! You should be able to view your plan's scheduled workouts. Please contact support@runkeeper.com and our team will assist you. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Does not track position very well. If you run on trails, it cuts corners, shortening the distance it says you ran, as well as slowing down your average pace. There appears to be a map feature where can snap your run to the roads you ran on, but this does nothing for trails, even though you can see them on the map... Consistently has bugs, some minor, some major. Major bugs being that my run stops tracking .1 miles or so into my run, unknown to me until I finish. Most recently I lost audible status updates. Both seem fixed now. Don't pause and resume your run, you will lose time and distance in your tracking, very annoying.

I am very satisfied. I've tried a number of highly rated running apps, but i wanted a free app that would give me audio queues for intervals. You have to pay for advanced intervals, but it has several basic ones and you can create custom ones to set your own goals. I wish it was compatible with my Fitbit, but I'm getting increasingly frustrated with Fitbit anyway. I'm used runkeeper on and off for 10 years now and will likely continue to use it forever.

Great app..would be nice if there was the ability to issue challenges with friends and track each other's progress. As far as individual use, I'm putting my Garmin watch away. This is far superior!! Update: 8/2020 app is now terrible, i can't keep it going. Keeps shutting down mid run and when I restart it I get random stats spoken from the voice. Will be removing if its not fixed soon. So glad I didn't waste money on the paid version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Samsung devices are putting extra restrictions on apps that run in the background. Please try disabling both 1.¬†Adaptive Battery¬†and¬†2. Put Apps to Sleep. You can do so via this link--choose your phone type and follow the instructions:¬†https://dontkillmyapp.com/¬†Email¬†support@runkeeper.com¬†if the trouble persists!¬†

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: I've been using Runkeeper since May 2014. I have to not recommend it to new users. It used to be an awesome app. However I now categorize it as a "Dead" application. No updates, no changes, no response to bugs that have plagued the software for years. I bought a Garmin and found a much better tracking solution and excellent integration with third party support. Example: If you want to log a stopwatch, or even a timed activity(like elliptical) you have to enable GPS tracking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brad, thanks for your review! We want to help improve your experience. Please contact our support team at support@runkeeper.com for troubleshooting tips. I have also attached an article here outlining how to track indoor/timed activities on Runkeeper: https://support.runkeeper.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000819046-Tracking-Indoors-On-Android.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 5/5/20: customer support reached out to me right away. Amazing service! I have loved my runkeeper app. It has been accurate to almost the second on my races, milage accurate and I love the way it keeps track of my run history. The last 2 weeks it has been shutting itself off or just losing gps and not picking it up again. My runs have been recorded as 1/4 mile for 1 hour, or 1/4 mile for 15 minutes. It's very annoying. I updated to the paid version this am and it did the same thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I‚Äôm so sorry for the trouble you‚Äôre experiencing. Samsung devices are putting extra restrictions on apps that run in the background like Runkeeper. Please email support@runkeeper.com so we can provide the steps to try to fix this. Thank you!

title: Monzo - Mobile Banking
description: Meet the debit card that helps you save. With one app to manage all your finances, in real time. Monzo Pro is $10 a month. Open an account in a few minutes. THE DEBIT CARD THAT HELPS YOU SAVE Get cash back rewards on your debit card with Monzo Pro. Get cash back instantly: withdraw, spend or save it.* NO STRESS SAVINGS With Monzo Pro, earn more interest with our best savings rate of 3.75% APY. Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive 2.00% APY.‚Ä† Every month, earn interest on top of what you save. Set goals for your savings and we‚Äôll help you work towards them. Automatically contribute a portion of your paycheck towards your goals. Turn your spare change into savings with automatic roundups. ALL YOUR MONEY, ONE APP Link your other bank accounts, credit cards and savings accounts into Monzo.* Get money saving insights across all your bank accounts and credit cards.* Get paid early with direct deposits.* No ATM fees from us, ever. And no ATM fees when you stick to the 38000+ MoneyPass ATMs. SERIOUSLY SECURE Your money is eligible for up to $250,000 in FDIC pass through insurance.** Anti-fraud systems that help keep your money safe, without adding friction for you. Protect your money with Touch ID, Face ID, and PIN. *Monzo Pro subscription may be required to access certain features. Fees and terms apply, see monzo.com/us for more details. Monzo‚Äôs Savings Jar Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is as of May 19, 2025. The APY may change at any time. Registered address: Monzo Inc, 447 Sutter St., Ste 405 PMB1025, San Francisco, CA 94108 Monzo is a financial technology company; not a bank. All banking services and deposit accounts are provided by Lead Bank or Sutton Bank; Members FDIC. The Monzo Personal and Joint Debit Card is issued by Lead Bank or Sutton Bank, Members FDIC, pursuant to licensing by Mastercard International Inc. See Terms and Cardholder Agreement for more details. ‚Ä†As of June 18, 2025, you'll earn 3.75% APY (Annual Percentage Yield) with a Monzo Pro subscription and 2.00% APY for Monzo Base users. No minimum deposit needed. These rates are variable and may change. The interest comes from us, not Lead Bank or Sutton Bank. Your total Savings Jar balance is capped at $100,000. Monzo isn't a bank. Banking services and debit card are issued by our partners, Lead Bank or Sutton Bank, Members FDIC. **Funds held in the Monzo deposit accounts are held with Lead Bank or Sutton Bank; Members FDIC, and funds aggregated across all deposits held at the member bank are eligible for up to $250,000 in pass-through insurance in the event Lead Bank or Sutton Bank fails, if specific deposit requirements are met, and your card is registered. You can find your sponsor bank in your cardholder agreement in the app. FDIC insurance does not protect funds in the event of Monzo‚Äôs failure or from the risk of theft or fraud. See FDIC Prepaid Cards and Deposit Insurance Coverage. Certain conditions must be satisfied for pass-through FDIC deposit insurance coverage to apply, which you can learn more about on fdic.gov. Monzo Pro is an optional, monthly paid subscription membership program. Subscribers will be charged every month. Once enrolled, subscribers have access to Monzo‚Äôs highest APY, cashback rewards, exclusive upgraded benefits and access outside of Monzo‚Äôs basic offerings. Please see Terms on monzo.com/us for more details.
