summary: Online bank account with no fees: Spend, save, & manage your money.

scraped_reviews.content: Had an account for a couple weeks now and I liked them. Customer service was prompt and I liked the app. At least I liked them until today when they completely closed my account without explanation. I cannot get an answer and cannot reopen my account. I gave all my legal and correct info and completed all the verifications and did everything I was supposed to. I'm really disappointed but oh well.

Sometimes, a bank shouldn't act like a startup. It's INSANE that (for what is clearly a cost-cutting measure) they make it impossible to actually talk to customer support. Calling directs you to the app, the app directs you to a chat, the chat directs you to an article which, after you say "this doesn't solve my problem", they just say "thanks for the feedback!". This is supposed to be a bank. It should 100% just be contactable without needing to prove the extent of your issue. INFURIATING

The app doesn't work, I can't progress to opening an account. I get sent a magic link to my email, then get a page saying "sorry about this... Something's gone wrong" it's been like that for a month I spoke to customer service who were supposed to arrange a call back to fix things and never heard anything. I tried calling again and went down a phoneline rabbit hole that doesn't accept non customer calls.

Signed up for Monzo Plus to get to see all accounts in one place but sadly it has been badly implemented. If you want to change the category of a transaction you have to do it one by one for all transactions from the same merchant. Other similar apps allow you to select one and gives you the option to then apply it to all past and future transactions from that merchant. It is a big pain in the butt. Will be cancelling Monzo Plus as soon as the 3 months is up.

Won't let me create an account because it doesn't show my address on the list and no option to add manually. Forums say to check with royal mail as they use their database. No issues finding my address on there. Seems a common issue according the forums. Not being able to offer me an account hasnt stopped the daily marketing email and messages tho.

As a bank, they're fine. No major issues in 5 years. They really need to do more UX testing on the app though. I'm tech-proficient and I find myself clicking around on various tabs trying to find/do basic things. It's not intuitive at all. I've been using it for years and I still couldn't tell you where half the stuff is if you asked me.

I have a personal and joint account. Both were quick, easy and simple applications. The app itself is very intuitive to use when moving, paying or requesting money; you can open several instant access savings accounts and savings pots in a couple of clicks - a doddle for budgeting; get paid a day earlier is so helpful as is the countdown to cancel a payment if made in error. Highly recommend for easy banking that is almost stress free.

Used to love monzo, really easy to use and great at getting my money easily. But now I'm getting told that on the 30th of November the app won't be on my device? do you expect me to pay out a bunch of money for a new phone just to access my own bank account? this is ridiculous. It's near Christmas time where this matters the most and I'm having to work out how I'm going to manage my payments all because you can't be bothered to keep the app on a larger scale of devices. Really disappointing.

The Best Banking App I've EVER Used (and I'm only on the FREE plan!) I only switched to Monzo a couple of months ago, and honestly, I am completely blown away! Monzo is miles ahead of my old bank - Santander. The app is incredibly intuitive and fast. Everything just makes sense. The biggest game-changer for me has been the Pots feature. Being able to instantly separate money for bills, savings, and spending has finally given me complete control over my finances.

It was pretty good until it locked my account for sending money to myself in another bank account. The security and anti-fraud system is very substandard. Also their "chat" feature is just useless pre-scripted AI that takes you round in circles.

Monzo's transaction processing has slowed down significantly, with transfers that were once instant now frequently delayed. This impacts users who rely on quick payments and undermines the overall experience. It's important for Monzo to address this issue promptly, as delays in seeing spending can affect shopping enjoyment. As someone who shops in different shops for a better deal, this can be worrisome. Overall I do really love Monzo it's really easy to use

The app works fine, relatively easy to use use, but they hid a cool feature that I liked to use. It's a way to see your spending over your pay period. I get paid every 4 weeks, so it's really useful and now they're removing it on December 21 for the Trends view which is pretty much useless for my pay period it's managed based on a 30 day period only

Scam Bank. Easy to put money in. Very hard to take money out. They wouldn't let me buy anything on my account. Rang customer services and said if it happens again to call and they'd sort it out immediately. Called them after it happened and they did nothing. It's been 6 days and still no update from them despite me asking over and over. Fed constant lies from their team. Avoid and use a proper bank!

I had an issue at the till, which instructed me to complete the setup. I was offered two options from the wallet: using the Monzo app or calling the bank. I tried the Monzo app several times, but nothing was offered to complete the setup. So, I chose to call the bank. Still, the automated response said not to call about Apple or Google Wallet, so I ended up deleting the card and then reactivating it.

So apparently after so many years toghether and the best bank I've had they would cancel your account as soon as they see you on holiday because apparently you can use this bank only if you live in the UK. Ye that just shattered all my expectations about this bank and revealed what was truth all along that's not a good bank overall. Dot bother invest into this worthless bank üëç

Not the bank for you if you want easy access to your money. They seem to think every transaction is scam and block it. To unblock your account, you have to go through an interrogation by one of the fraud team, who seem unconvinced by anything you tell them, then just label it a scam. Maybe if I was new to this planet I might need this level of scrutiny, but this just seems way too over the top for me.

Absolute piss take. Got locked out my account for no reason and then they lie to you and say they are a real agent when it's clearly AI. Unreliable and completely unhelpful. You can't talk to anyone if you need help and you will get no response if you email with a complaint or an issue. Would not recommend this bank to anyone.

The numbers on my card have all rubbed off and I am struggling to pay contactless. Monzo want to charge ¬£5 for a replacement card, I dispute this. They sent me a message saying they would send a card out with no charge, as I'm not at fault, and asked for confirmation of my address. Gave them this, then they retracted it apologised for being told wrong information and that they will be charging for a replacement as the card was damaged by me. unacceptable!

Locked out of my Monzo account for 2+ days after a phone reset. Stuck in endless ID checks (videos, PIN recovery, selfies) that support confirms are fine but the system keeps rejecting. I‚Äôve reinstalled the app, updated my phone, and sent extra verification via email, but still no access. My card is blocked so I can‚Äôt use my own money ‚Äî extremely stressful and unacceptable. Customer care while polite are unable to resolve this. Switching over immediately!

amazing!! I love monzo so much they're so helpful with anything like refunds. you can also get cash back, and you can split your money into savings pots and you earn interest on your savings. you can also use monzo abroad with no charge at all. It's also so easy to set up. I will never change to any other bank.

I've had monzo for ages, but there is one thing that's bothered me since I've had it. some subscription that doesn't show up on monzo scheduled to keep on leave my account without me able to stop the transaction going through

I am having major problems trying to open my account. It asks me to add my e-mail and then it asks me to open my e-mail. I get nothing. I send e-mails to them and they ask me to send some Photo ID. I get a reply that they cant accept it because I've sent it from my mobile. I then can't download the app on my Lap top. My daughter has an account and she has never been asked for her email. So, why can't I get into my account!!

It was my favourite banking app until they closed my account with no reason, and they could not tell me the reason for closing it. I knew that something was dodgy about Monzo. thank you Monzo for doing that to a daily customer who use the app!!.

Monzo's banking service continues to beat competitors. This app responds to customers without delay implementing rapid change on customer queries and resolving problems at faster pace than corperate competitors. no long waiting periods and unnecessary hassles. The majority of the features are also in your hands, I highly respect Monzo for all they do. thank you for making banking easier for many users.

Used to have a Monzo account and it worked well. Closed it and a couple of years later decided to try them again. App stuck on error message saying something is wrong and we don't know what after clicking link in email. Will bank with someone else instead.

After using them for 3+ years, closed my account today. In 3 years no interaction with them, all digital. Then yesterday had a fraudulent transaction on my card and blocked it, filed a fraud report. After providing all information they needed, they asked me to provide proof that I contacted the merchant (it was a fraudulent charge as I was not at the merchant). I don't reward stupidity and hence closed my account. This is all we need to know with such banks, the day you have to interact with the

I've been a happy Monzo customer for a while now, and I just wanted to share my positive experience! Monzo's app is super user-friendly, making it easy to manage my finances on the go. I love the real-time notifications, budgeting tools, and instant spending alerts. It's helped me stay on top of my spending and savings goals. The customer support is top-notch too! I've had a few queries, and their team has always been super helpful and responsive. üëè

Simply superb. I can't begin to write how much monzo has saved me. I'm a Monzo advocate among my family and friends. So many unauthorised payments declined on my behalf, forgotten subscriptions that would have renewed automatically without my knowledge, but for Monzo. Help when I'm cash trapped. Card freezing immediately it's needed and a new card arriving next morning, OMG. Monzo has been my only bank for the past three years and I haven't seen a reason to open another.

Unlike most major bank's apps, this one actually works. Everything is quick, easy and intuitive to use, with lots of useful features. Best bank/banking app I've used, great products including flex, and getting paid early is a nice touch as well.

The app works really well almost all the time and makes most tasks easy. There are loads of features to help you save. They also got a refund from a company that only offered me a ¬£5 voucher for a ¬£40 service they didn't deliver. No international spending fees either which can be a lifesaver when travelling. Best banking app and account I've had so far. 10/10.

terrible customer service, I closed my account, and now am trying to get in contact with support to reopen my account so I can get my money out of the bank that just got sent to it for some reason even though its not open and should've been deferred and I'm getting nowhere such a terrible company. Just essentially stole my money terrible company.

Very poor IT systems. I requested Monzo to transfer 20 direct debits from my main bank account with another high street bank. Unfortunately, due to a 'bug' in Monzo's systems they cannot transfer direct debits automatically, so expect me to write to 20 companies to transfer them. It is concerning that Monzo can't resolve a bug for such a simple process. It therefore troubles me what other more serious flaws their systems have, if they are unable to support the basics.

Overall experience with the app is good. HOWEVER. Monzo is lying to you. They say that you will earn ¬£50 by referring a friend, they fail to mention or indeed make any sort of reference to the fact that it is luck of the draw. You can receive 10,20, or 50 pounds. Not the ¬£50 that was advertised. Not even misleading, it's lying to you when you refer people. Do not refer your friends to this expecting ¬£50, they WILL NOT give it to you. Shameful.

Monzo makes looking after your money easy, with simple instructions,simple enough for even the less tech savvy of us, I love the fact I can put all my bills into payment pots so I can really see what I have to spend each month, the security features are excellent too.

really dissappinted. they charged me to take cash out. I explained to tge agents how i had an unlimited allowance for my first widthrawal, but they just wouldn't listen and will just read of their blogs.. i thought this bank was different but looks like it's just the same as the others.. all is well until you have a problem.

it so much easier to manage my bank with Monzo. it easy to use and has nice ui and the features I need. banking, investing, saving and business accounts. overall, the best for my usage. thanks for making this app.

brilliant banking, amazing customer services too, will always recommend... after needing a new bank card and to change my email address for the app, they advised 3-5 working days for the card and 24-48 hrs for them to be able to confirm my selfie of me and my ID, to enable me to access the app again, my card came the following day and they sorted my access to banking app in less than 6 hours! thank u and well done monzo!

wouldn't advise using monzo if you are looking to do a side online hustle, they froze my account and it's been frozen for 6 weeks now. luckily is not my main account because I wouldn't of been able to access any money will definitely be closing my account if they ever finish what they are doing

This app is the best I've used. I've been a customer since 2019 and now have five products with them. The fees (if they have any) are reasonable and everything is clearly worded. Payments, repayments and transaction activities are also very clear. I honestly recommend these to everyone I meet! The cha-ching really is a conversation starter too! I have taken a star off for the customer service wait time. It takes on average 6 to 8 hours to respond and once they respond at 2am!
pretty good except..... unable to delete archived pots so that's quite annoying, also it starts the Android game engine for some reason? I had to go into the games app and remove it from the list.

been using it for about 2.5 years so far it's an incredible app. If you use it responsibly and ethically Monzo isn't shy to give a load of big credit, it's been an awesome ride with them i hope they keep up this trajectory without any major downsides.

love this bank. was a bit wary at 1st, but it's fantastic. my daughter recommended monzo. It's so easy to use weather paying bills or sending money to family, saving and the choice of investment opportunity. definitely give monzo a chance you won't be disappointed. use u-switch and no need to stress over switching banks it's all done for ouy

Unbelievable useless customer service. had my transfer blocked because they called it scam (even if I wanted to get scammed thats still my money so I thought - my decision) they freeze all account to run extra checks for 48 hours without my involvement... god knows.. they are asking my neighbours probably .. and of course if they reply below this to contact them on email address to discuss it.. I did already, same thing ü§ó
huge restrictions and a large commission when withdrawing cash from an ATM without a commission. The bank is very disappointing. I really liked it before
I am 74 and have tried all the banks. Monzo is the best by far. They go the extra mile and think of the extra things that make all the difference making banking stress free.
I haven't been able to get past the identification part to open account even though I did everything correctly. I am uninstalling the app.

easy to apply for the bank account, easy to use the app on my phone and everything is just very helpful for the customer. I wouldn't use anyone else and I'm always telling friends they should get a Monzo account.
A super fantastic bank. Amazing features in the App. Very easy to use. Other banks wish they could be like Monzo !!! Highly recommend getting a Monzo account.Even their cards are funky & snazzy.
good online banking app but I still don't know how much i get charged when I withdraw over ¬£400 from cash machines in less than a month!

still excellent app, but could I sugest to add a setting to turn on/off the card pin when trying to open the app? The experience is that slows down opening the app and if there is no network available I can't open at all, pin should still be required for other operations.

title: Fox News - Daily Breaking News
description:
Stay informed with 24/7 access to the latest headlines and expert analysis on the reports of today with the FOX News App, your leading source for breaking national and international stories. Get daily coverage and live updates on politics, weather, stocks, business, sports, smart tech, health, and more with expert perspectives and new, in-depth reporting.

Get your news, however you want: 
WATCH LIVESTREAM OR ON-DEMAND VIDEOS. Enjoy your favorite FOX News tv shows while browsing the smart app, with picture-in-picture viewing. Your world, reported live‚Äîwith all your favorite shows:
-	FOX & Friends‚Äîthe #1 morning show on cable
-	Special Report
-	America‚Äôs Newsroom
-	FOX News Sunday

GET BREAKING NEWS WITH ALERTS. Receive real-time notifications about today‚Äôs hottest topics

SHARE, SAVE, & COMMENT ON ARTICLES. Read, save, share, and comment on any news article that matters most to you, with on-demand slideshows, vibrant photo galleries, and more. Search and stay alert with topics, including:
-	U.S.
-	Politics
-	Opinion
-	Entertainment
-	Sports
-	Lifestyle
-	World 
-	Science
-	Tech
-	Media

-	Weather

LISTEN TO YOUR NEWS. Listen to, share, and save podcasts from FOX News. Plus, check out ‚ÄúRecommended Stories‚Äù based on your listening history. 
-	FOX Across America
-	Hourly Newscast
-	FOX News Rundown
-	FOX News Radio
-	Listen live with ‚ÄúWho‚Äôs on Now‚Äù 

PLAY GAMES. Your news app just got more fun. Solve quick puzzles and games with the Mini Crossword, 5 Across, Stack and Match, and the Crazy Crystals Game. Or, put your vocabulary to the test with the Daily Crossword or Word Scramble. 

KEEP UP WITH YOUR FAVORITE PERSONALITIES. 
-	Steve Doocy
-	Ainsley Earhardt
-	Brian Kilmeade
-	Lawrence Jones 
-	Bret Baier 
-	Bill Hemmer
-	Dana Perino 
-	Shannon Bream
-	Jimmy Failla
-	Martha MacCallum
-	Jesse Watters
-	Laura Ingraham
-	Guy Benson
-       Lara Trump
-       Will Cain

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA. The FOX News App connects you directly to trending stories, your favorite shows, and top personalities on X, Facebook, Instagram, and more. Get e-news by turning on FOX News notifications on your social media apps. 

ANDROID TV: Stream live and on-demand news on your Android TV. Watch live shows, hear from your favorite personalities, create a watchlist, and get recommendations on what to watch next. 

We may work with mobile advertising companies and other similar entities that help deliver advertisements tailored to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices, and to opt out in mobile apps, see http://www.aboutads.info/choices/. You may also download the App Choices app at http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices

Privacy: https://www.foxnews.com/privacy-policy

We may work with mobile advertising companies and other similar entities that help deliver advertisements tailored to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices, and to opt out in mobile apps, see http://www.aboutads.info/choices/. You may also download the App Choices app at http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices

Privacy: https://www.foxnews.com/privacy-policy
summary: Watch the latest daily US & world reports live, with national & global updates

scraped_reviews.content: Won't allow me to see news stories from notifications. It keeps giving this error every time: unable to connect, check your connection, Refresh! My connection is FINE! And when I tap refresh, it always goes to the previous story that I've already read, never to the one I was trying to see! I see from their responses to similar reviews that they are aware of the issue and they keep saying that they are working to resolve it, but OBVIOUSLY they are not because this has been going on for months!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand how important it is for notifications to work reliably. We know this issue has been ongoing for some users, and while it's actively being worked on, your experience shows we still have work to do. Thanks for calling it out‚Äîwe‚Äôll make sure your feedback is shared with the team to help prioritize a fix.

scraped_reviews.content: Broken. Since they started with ads it's a nightmare. You try to open content but the ad server lags, it can't show you the content so nothing. Useless notifications. You click on a notification and it takes you to the app main screen with no sight of anything tied to the notification. It's just to get clicks and ad revenue before they even link an article to a news event. Yes, it's completely ridiculous and absurd for a news app to run ads like this, but they could have done it way better.

Keeps crashing! very frustrating to use. It has become cheesy and slow. There are more fluff pieces than ever before, and when you click on a story, they take forever to load. Sometimes, you are redirected to another listing of stories and have to go through the list before finding the story you had clicked on the first place. I end up just leaving the app entirely!

One of the worst apps I've seen. frequently when opening the app, it just sits there with a blank screen. I can select videos, then go back to home and it works. Also, frequently, wh en I zoom in on an image, it will not go back to normal size. I then have to totally close the app and re-open to get it to work. Thirdly, when I click on some links within an article, then go back, the text size goes to smallest and I have to re-set the size to large. All-in-all, it's a very poorly designed app.

I received so many Breaking News notifications, I had to turn them off completely. Too many ads throughout the app; they make it so hard to read the articles. The App frequently crashes, and closes. Everytime I click on the link to view Instagram content, I get an error for an unknown URL scheme. these issues continue to happen whether I am signed in or not.

App automatically closes itself in the middle of reading an article.¬≥¬≥ Keeps saying "unable to connect". Each article has a commercial that's longer than the article. It forces you to have to sit through a 30-second advertising clip just to watch a 10-second video. Too many commercials. What makes bad is you have to watch the same commercial over and over and over again. Fox dont care anyway. We told fox news about this, but they dont care..

The app is amateur and big brother all in one. constantly logging in is nothing but big brother data mining. And from a conservative outet?!!! It is constantly running broken links, won't allow copying text for sharing, and videos will.not orient to landscape view. For an organization that is doing so well (thank you) it would seem you could invest a little bit in making your app actually work well.

Horrible app. I have to log in (even though I don't log out) every day in order to comment. It's very jumpy as you're scrolling. The full-page ads don't always have an X to cancel the ad, and I have to completely exit the app and go back in to read an article. Seriously, Fox, this app has been horrible for years. I'm about done with it, and I'm a huge Fox news fan! I expect better from Fox. update..9/26/25 I didn't think it was possible but it just keeps getting worse. Does Fox even care?

Problems with "Failure to load" notice that reboots the app and starts back at the 1st article, was report in February and March, 6 months later and still no improvement. This seems to have gotten worse on some days making it difficult to read other articles and it doesn't matter if I'm at home with a weak 4g signal or at locations where I have a strong 5g signal. I will begin reviewing other news apps to avoid the aggravation.

You may have to sign in again and again. Even then, you will likely get taken around in circles having to go back to your email to get it done. I have never seen or heard of another app that is so frustrating. I am dumping the app, it's not worth playing with, but I still have to keep signing in to read certain articles. I get most of what I need from the NYPost app, so it's no big deal. Google News and AP work good.

I can't post in the comments section after I write a comment. the (post prompt) is hidden at the bottom of my screen below the keyboard. it appears as a ghost prompt for lack of better words. I've tried everything. At first I thought the app was not recognizing that I'm using a phone and not a pc. or it wasn't recognizing I have an android and not an iPhone. maybe fox has blocked me from sending comments, but why? one star until the problem is resolved. I'm ready to delete the app. so frustratin

This used to be a great app, but sometimes the entire story doesn't come through and you have to go to the website to read the missing paragraphs. Also, every third or fourth time I open it up, even though I'm signed in, it says I need to sign up to post. It also switches headlines when I finish reading one article and back to read the other on I was interested in, it disappears to be replaced by something else. I've uninstalled the app and pinned the website to my phone. It's easier that way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your detailed feedback‚Äîwe truly appreciate it. We‚Äôre aware of the concern with missing article content, comment sign-in prompts, and headlines changing unexpectedly. Our team is actively working on improvements. We‚Äôre glad you found a workaround in the meantime, and we hope to win you back to the app soon!

scraped_reviews.content: If the videos you're watching gets minimized and you bring it back to normal it will kick you out of the video. If you're lucky it will start over. Also it buffers too long to start. Only video app that seems to do it. This is the worst streaming app I've seen. 8/5/25 I see after update I still cannot bring up videos. The only positive thing I can say is that I'm not paying for it.

It shows that I'm signed in but will not let me post comment. It says "sign up to post comment"? Then, it says failure. This happens half the time, very frustrating. I guess I'm going to delete app again and wait a few months so they can fix the problem. UPDATE, Tried months later (10/14/25) no good the post button is faded out and cannot post. deleted the app and will not go online to watch either. I'm done!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We're currently revamping our comment feature to improve your experience. During this time, you may notice some hiccups. We appreciate your patience and will announce once the update is complete. Thanks for sticking with us and giving us this feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: All of a sudden, way way too many ads popping up. also they are hard to close the ad as they hide the "X" or make you figure out how to get back to the news. also every story seems to have an ad after it and often it's the same 1 or 2 over and over. I like Fox. I don't like the constant barrage of ads. probably have to look for other options like Newsmax.

2 stars for notifications and content. Unfortunately, there's nothing else good to say. Been using the app for many years and it was amazing at first. Now the ads are so big they leave 5 lines of text visible at most. This is such a basic and easy issue to fix.... I refuse to create an account for them to SELL my info so I cannot read all the articles or make comments. Quality and bias of content is also getting just as bad as the competing nutjobs, just in the opposite direction.

Can't comment on android. Been going on for months. I've uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times, and still no good. Let's me type a comment, but the POST button is grayed out. Tells me to sign in, but I am signed in. When I sign it again, it does the same thing. Works fine on my laptop signed into the same account. Horrible app if you want to comment on an android.

Can't post comments in the app while signed in. The POST button appears in the lower right corner and is grayed out even with a comment loaded in the box. Can post as normal while on a computer. Reloaded the app on an android twice. Signed out and signed logged back in. Cleared the cache on the phone. Restarted the phone a couple of times. Still cannot post in the comments section. The profile icon shows but the POST button remains grayed out. I can up/down vote.

Why so many adds all of a sudden? they make the screen jump around the article as they load. Plus, who wants to deal with the same amount of adds to close so they can read a article in the news as playing a game!? really like the app.....really hate the new pop ups. Won't take long for me to start hunting a better experience.

Generally good. but it isn't perfect. For instance, I don't care for the" stories" that are posted as "news", just to get you to click on their adds. I don't like the little tricks they use to make you look at their ads, the hidden or purposely disguised "next" buttons etc. I also don't care for the intentional "sexualalized" content to try to get the clicks...

I can no longer post a comment or reply to another comment on a news article. When I try, the "Post" button at the bottom right of the screen is greyed out. At other times, the greyed-out button reads, "Sign Up To Post." I am signed in, and the app shows me as signed in. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and created a new account. Nothing has corrected the issue that started about one to two weeks ago, after the app was updated.

Not enough space here to address Issues. Sent emails to Fox as requested, but they never respond. Ads keep getting worse, it's like a 3-Ring Circus to read article between ads, and pop-up. The list grows: Can't stay logged in, can't change font size, can't see other's reactions to my comments. Finally uninstalled, now using website. Still have ad 3-ring Circus, but I can adjust font and read. Also, need to transcribe videos, can't hear, want to read! MOVING TO NEWSMAX!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the difficulties you're experiencing with commenting and posting, and we'd like to get to the bottom of this. Please tap here to email us at AppStoreReviews@fox.com, and include ‚ÄòComments‚Äô in the subject line. Your feedback will help us get this resolved for you and others!

scraped_reviews.content: Full of bugs and glitches. I have to uninstall and reinstall regularly. Can‚Äôt open articles, can't log in to comment, can't access external links in articles, etc..... Uodate: This App is complete garbage. It continually prompts me to log in even though Im logged in. I can log out and back in, but the issue comes back not long after. Pathetic.

Used to be good. Now it gives me an " An error occurred. Refresh page and try again" pop up when I click a like or dislike button. Also, why do I have to keep signing up to post? I'm already signed in! Get better IT people to fix it. Update 7/10/25 Still no improvement. Still have to incessantly sign in to post comments. I've Uninstaller and going with the OAN app. See ya, Fox. I'm done
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We're currently revamping our comment feature to improve your experience. During this time, you may see errors with likes and sign-in prompts. We appreciate your patience and will announce once the update is complete. Thanks for sticking with us!

scraped_reviews.content: I don't want to, but I'm going to have to turn off notifications. If the notification takes me anywhere when clicked, it's an older story (not the one notified), but more often than not it just goes to a blank blue screen... Worst part is, the story usually isn't in the list of stories so you can't even just scroll to find it after. This issue happens 100% of the time with notifications. Very frustrating.. No updates available in the play store for a potential fix.

For almost 1 year I haven't been able to post a comment. Although I'm signed in, I get the 'sign up to post' button, which is inoperable. Then I back out and the app reflects an error message, then freezes. SO frustrated! UPDATE 12/17/24 - Nothing has changed. Still can't post comments, can't click the 'sign up to post' button, and still get an error message telling me to refresh the page, which leads to the app freezing up. Really despise this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you bringing your concerns regarding the commenting functionality to our attention. We are currently looking into these matters to provide a resolution. Your user experience is paramount to us, and we are committed to resolving this efficiently.

scraped_reviews.content: The app was working fine until yesterday. All of a sudden the years or articles I saved, thousands, gone. No record of any of the years of researching and documenting news stories, gone! It's like they erased years of history. Now, when I try to save an article, the app crashes and has to restart. I want my saved items back and the ability to save articles again!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Tom! We've informed the team and will address it.

scraped_reviews.content: Didn't believe I could drop this to 1 stars, yet here we are. First off, your use of pop up adds in the app now is sickening. You should be able to afford running a completely free news article app. Secondly, I don't know what you all did, but earlier this year the app will just randomly lose connection if you leave it and then come back. Or if you don't completely close out the app and open up a breaking news notification it will just load till it times out. Seriously, you all need to fix this!

I've had this app on my phone for a very long time, I think since they started it. The advertisements are getting out of hand because when I want to view a story I missed, there is a 30 second add before it and there is no possible way to skip it. When I go onto the next news story I want to view, either the same add comes up or another 30 second add. To tell you the truth, I just deleted the Fox news app off my phone and going to Newsmax. Add a skip button and I'll come back. Thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reaching out, Ray. We‚Äôre sorry to hear our ad playback has compromised your experience with our app. We‚Äôve passed along this feedback internally. Thank you again for your honest feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: No matter my views, I always like to do research on things instead of just taking my information from one source. Lots of Fox News coverage and articles are heavily biased, which was sad to see. The videos attached to articles kept glitching, so I couldn't even see what was happening. Instead of leaving where you left when exiting an article, you are automatically taken to the top, and then have to scroll down to the article you just read. Sad to see these things when the app just got updated.

App used to be great, but over the past month or so several (at least 6-8) articles will not open. At least half have been articles under the weather header, other times it's just something I think would be fun to read. Today it was about a food recall from a store I shop at! To add insult to injury I have never found the articles that won't open in the app on the website. Also, in the same time frame, inline ads will automatically start playing audio when you scroll past them. VERY ANNOYING!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre aware of the issue with certain articles not opening and are working on a fix. We‚Äôre also looking into autoplay ads with audio. If possible, email appstorereviews@fox.com with your device info and a few headline examples. We appreciate your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: I do like the app. It never crashes, easy to navigate, good layout, important information at a glance. However, I have to lower my score due to their tracking option...there is no option. I turned off tracking permission in my Settings when I got my new phone, and now I get a mandatory tracking prompt or I can't use the app. I have had this app for many years so I don't recall this being a mandatory installation requirement. Regardless, it appears it is now. Need Optional Tracking please.

1st-You can not change anything about your profile from this app. As a matter of fact, I have zero clue where to go to do so. 2nd-There is no way to return to your comments you have posted, unless you spend time scrolling and are lucky enough to find it. 3rd-There are no notifications when someone responds to your comment. 4th-When reading a comment and having to select 'read more', the comments will auto collapse at random, leaving it impossible to read the full comment. Fix your garbage app..

Reading article on a Samsung Galaxy phone. I set the font size at the top of the page. Formerly, the font size would hold everywhere in the app. Lately, when I click a link, accidentally or intentionally, then return, the font switches to the smallest font, which is unreadable for me. This appears to be a regression bug introduced by an update to the app client or server.

While reading a comment that requires the user to select "read more", every time a new comment is posted and the page refreshes, the comment that's currently be read automatically collapses (i.e., as if the user selected "read less"). If there are many comments being posted simultaneously, this makes it impossible to finish reading the comment. The app should keep the selection persistent until the user changes it. Very annoying.

The biggest problem of this app is how useless it is. The majority of things on the app just use the integrated browser, so what's stopping me from just going on the website? Plus, the ads are crazy. It takes a mile of scrolling through ads just to get to the comments. You could also get less ads on YouTube than this app, so again, what's the point of the app? The clickbait titles are also frustrating. Click on an article, and you get another with a different title.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your frustration and appreciate your detailed feedback. Our team is working to improve the in-app experience and ensure more consistent navigation. We‚Äôll share your concerns with our developers‚Äîthanks for taking the time to share your thoughts!

scraped_reviews.content: I like FoxNews and trust them more than other MSM, that's why I keep returning. However, this app is horrible! It is not user-friendly or intuitive. Ads will pop up randomly promoting other apps, then often very difficult to close. Sometimes i end up having to go into google play to actually close it because the "x" doesn't work. It keeps signing me out of the app, which is needed to post comments. Then it doesn't let me sign in and i have to uninstall and reinstall about once a week.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're actively investigating your concern and are determined to find a resolution. Could you please email us at appstorereviews@fox.com with any screenshots or video recordings of the issue? This will greatly aid our efforts. We appreciate your cooperation and patience!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love the app, not it's full of pop up ads, and asked for an email address to read some of the articles. All this has made the app feel cheap. It's supposed to be a professional news app, now it's no better than a cheap freemium game that punishes you the longer you use it. Com'on Fox News, you're better than this, or at least I thought so.

Fox News program on Android is absolutely terrible! The changes they've made in the last few months requiring logging in when it says my name in the account, Posts fail to load, now coming up slow and line spacing is off when selecting to post. I've deleted and reinstalled, cleared cache, you name it, I've done it. And its not my connection! STILL NOT FIXED
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You've clearly taken all the right steps, and it‚Äôs frustrating that things still aren‚Äôt working. Your comments are being escalated to our team, and if you're willing, please email us at appstorereviews@fox.com with your device details so we can look into it more deeply.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be decent. Now, the ads are just rendering the app annoying. It wasn't good enough that the ads were on every page in multiple forms. Now, we have pop-ups to create more revenue for Fox. You can't pass by some ads without opening just by touching to scroll. It was a good run. I used it for years, but now there are better options for those who want news without being harrased by extreme and ridiculous ads.

Why did you take away the ability to zoom on pictures? I used to be able to click on a picture and zoom in for more detail. Now you include text that keeps us from zooming in. I already read the text and wanted more detail from the photo. Some detail too small to see on cell phones. I just downloaded the Epoc Times app. Maybe they will be better. I usually started every morning out looking at the Fox News app. Who was the brainchild that made these changes?

CONSTANT ASSAULT BY ADS! Fox is doing nothing to fix this junk. Ads in foreign language take over the screen. Unusable ! Suddenly, as you're in the middle of viewing something it locks up your phone with some sort of ad in a foreign language and there's no way to make it go away. Have to leave and do something else. Can't post anything either. Message at the bottom of every page after you get done typing that says login. You can't though. Error when you click on the button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that our ad experience has affected your experience with the Fox News app. We've passed along this feedback internally. Thank you for taking the time to review!

scraped_reviews.content: I thought people were exaggerating when I heard how buggy this app is, but to my surprise it was far worse than I could have expected. It loaded pretty quickly, but froze any time I tried to click onto a different story. It got to the point where it was eating so much data that it crashed my phone and had to restart it multiple times. Tried deleting and redownloading, nothing helped. Will be getting my news from better sources! Do not download this app if you want your phone to work!

Recently, I noticed when I was in the middle of reading an article or comments at the bottom of an article, that a full page ad would pop up and stop me in my tracks. I'd have to exit out of the app, then get back in, and try to find where I left off. I ended up deleting the FoxNews app from my phone for about a week, to give it a rest (while reading Daily Wire and CNN articles to stay aware of current events). I'm giving this app another chance, but if the full page pop-up ads resume, I'm out

I'm having to reinstall this app because now every time I try to like or comment on an article I get a button that says "please sign up." I click the button and nothing happens. I'm already signed up...I've had a Fox app account for YEARS. Fox has the worst commenting platform of any news app I use! Most of the time I can't get my comments and notifications to show up, or if they do the app won't let me view them. Y'all need to switch to Insticator, which is the platform Daily Wire uses.

The actual news content is great but I would gladly pay for an ad free version to get rid of the ads and Sponsored Stories after each article. The "stories" are full of scareware, clickbait, ripoffs, and garbage. As a news outlet, you should be ashamed of yourselves for presenting this steaming pile of advertising disguised to look like real news to your readers. Other than that, notifications are buggy and sometimes just flat out stop working. Please have a better app soon.

This app is a joke. It works better when you do the free preview for 10 minutes, rather than when you sign into your provider. Then, it just locks up, and if it does work it's nothing but adds. I have Uninstalled & re-installed so many times now I've lost count. It's the only way to make it view live TV. BEST ADVICE... Don't even sign into this thing and just keep doing a free 10-minute preview. That way you can at least view live TV. And what's up with business? That doesn't even open!

Sucks. I was getting so much junk on fox's news app that would make impossible to read. Games would pop up full page and I couldn't get rid of it , and so many ad it was beyond annoying.dp deleted and though if I re download that would solve problem. Now in order to read a story you have to give your email address. Not fricking way!! I'll get my news elsewhere until you can clean up you grimly, greedy hands!!! So much for trust and free and balanced.

Update: I just uninstalled it. I've had this for years, but I'm not going to put up ads everywhere so much so that one can't see the news for the greed. Latest version is junk. A gaming ad will pop up, make an obnoxious sound, and command your attention for about 15 seconds before you're allowed to close it. The ad overlays in articles is frustrating, and getting transferred over to ad is too easy to slip up if you've got big fingers.

The app is so loaded up with garbage that it takes forever to load. When it does load, they have configured in such a way that you can't scroll up without touching on an ad. even when you manage to open an article to read, you get inundated with ads. I've pretty much stopped using it. I like Fox News, but it's just major overkill with the ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience. We‚Äôre sorry to hear the app's performance and ad placement are making it difficult to use. We understand your frustration, and your feedback is being shared with our team as we work to improve speed, layout, and overall usability.

title: WeightWatchers Program
description:
WeightWatchers is the #1 doctor-recommended weight-loss program‚Ä†. Our app just got some NEW upgrades, and it‚Äôs now even easier to follow, easier to stick with, and more effective.

Lose 3.5x more weight*- and keep it off with unique solutions for every body. 

- Our proven Points program is the foundation of what we do. Get customized food plans and nutrition guidance to fit your needs. 
- Maximize your results with coach-led Workshops where you will get expert live support. 
- Access a personalized prescription medication plan, if eligible, and get 1:1 check-ins from a dedicated clinical Care team. 
- NEW! Meet with a Registered Dietitian for easier, tailored meal planning.

Trusted by millions, personalized for you. 
All members get access to our easy-to-use, award-winning app. Here‚Äôs a preview of some of our features, including NEW ones to help you track even faster and easier:

- Food, fitness/activity, water, and weight trackers 
- NEW! Use your camera to track meals and their Points¬Æ value
- NEW! 350+ ZeroPoint, no-track foods 
- NEW! Automatic macro tracking of any food you eat  
- Barcode scanner to find the Points¬Æ value of any packaged food
- What to Eat guides help you make healthier choices when dining out or cooking at home
- 11,000+ recipes and a database of 450+ restaurants
- NEW! Generate Points¬Æ value totals for any recipe on the internet
- My Progress provides a weekly report to help you see what‚Äôs working and what to improve
- Access to an exclusive, members-only social network. 
- 24/7 live WW coach chat

Download the WW app now and get a free trial today! After your free trial, your plan auto-renews monthly unless you cancel before the trial ends.

MEMBERSHIP TERMS

Privacy Policy: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/privacy/policy
Terms of Service: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/termsandconditions/onlineplus-coaching

‚Ä†Based on a 2023 survey by Cerner Enviza of 500 doctors who recommend weight-loss programs to patients.

*Based on a 6-month randomized controlled trial (n=376) that compared participants following WW to those given standard nutritional guidelines alone. Palacios et al. 2024. Manuscript under review. Funded by WW International, Inc.

summary: Weight Loss and Better Health

scraped_reviews.content: overall it's a good app. Fairly easy to track foods, though if I type "baked salmon" I get 5 brand names of baked salmon before I get just plain salmon is beyond me. I cook my own foods and it's amazing how many brands I have to scroll thru. I wish I could connect the app to my Samsung watch which tracks my activities soooo much better than Google Fit on my phone. I always have to correct the steps and 80% of the time the app can't connect to Google Fit (I think it's Google's issue)

I wish there was still a web-based option for entering data. The app is glitchy. For example, when I add an item to track it, it doesn't show up and count the points. I have to refresh the screen or close the app and reopen it. Entering recipes and foods is more challenging. The bar code scanner is finicky, it's hard to scan and choose at the same time without the app losing the item. Also, I try to search for a food by the exact name the app used on an earlier day, and it doesn't come up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We do apologize for the troubles. Please know that engineers are working hard on these glitches and to improve the app experience.

-WeightWatchers Customer Care

scraped_reviews.content: I love weight Watchers and I love some of the new features such as being able to import recipes from the internet. That said, there are also some frustrating parts. For example, I've come back to weight Watchers after quite a while away. It won't let me update my starting weight; so, I'm unable to accurately see my total weight loss without manually calculating it. Also, while the recipe import feature is great, I found that it can be somewhat inaccurate and imports ingredients not instructions.

This is much better than it was 4 years ago. My only complaint is that tracking weight can be tedious with the scroll wheel. You have to hit it just right in order for it to scroll, or you may accidentally close it and start over. I also don't like that it starts me off at 200 every single time I go to weigh in. I wish it would just start at my previous weight so I didn't have to scroll a bunch. A typed option would be nice too.

This is a disappointing experience. The search is terrible and unintuitive. It does not reliably return results from what you've selected in the past. When you try to add a meal to save it for regular use, there's no barcode scanning feature and even if you type the name of the item exactly, sometimes known items just don't come up in the search. I cannot believe that a global organization this prevalent in the diet space can't do better with their app. Beware if you are thinking about WW.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:

We are sorry for any inconvenience. Please make sure to update your WW App and your Android system to the latest version and restart your device. If you are still having trouble, please copy/paste the next link to fill out the form for assistance http://bit.ly/3UxR46L.

-WeightWatchers Customer Care -

scraped_reviews.content: The app is easy to use and has lots of built-in food items. One thing that would make use of the app faster would be having a voice option when searching for foods rather than relying on typing in the information. Tracking food has definitely helped me stay focused on weight loss.
