scraped_reviews.content: So I have this weird issue with the app... Somehow, once or twice a week, the audio appears to drop in volume by about 50%, very noticeable thru Bluetooth connection with my car, and the problem persists until I reset my phone. This has been going on forever. The app then works perfectly for a few days until the audio issue pops up again. It gets very annoying to have to randomly reset my phone just to get a music app to work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephanie, sorry for the volume problem. May I ask if you have turned on the equalizer? Please turn it off and try again. We are so sorry for the inconvenience caused by it.

scraped_reviews.content: This is what a music player should be. It doesn't try to sell you music, it doesn't try to get you to subscribe to a streaming service, it just let's you play the music on your phone, create and modify play lists, and has a simple single-purchase to remove ads. The only files it cares about are your audio files, so no requests to access your call history or calls or any other permissions that are irrelevant to just enjoying your music, even when you don't have a Wi-Fi or data connection.

My go-to music player: simple, accurate and easy to use. You can make playlists, or just select music for your current listening (my process). Plays .mp3 and .FLAC files. Update: Something must have changed. I can't get this player to do what I want it to, namely play in the sequence my music is organized in. I have selections of however many 'songs', but the system won't play them in order. Instead, it takes 'songs' from one piece to the next and plays them out of sequence. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Patrick, thanks for your feedback. Did you click the "Shuffle" button on the "Songs" page? If you do, the songs will play in random order. Please check this. If the issue persists, please send us a description of the problem and the automatically attached logs via "Feedback." Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: honestly this app works really well. I love customizing my playlists and adding all different album covers for my songs. I got the ad free version but I used it first with ads for a day and they don't cause any issues. ilI was still able to make everything customized with the free version. I would say that buying the premium version is optional because the free version doesn't restrict that many features. only a few background photos and some odds and ends but it doesn't limit the core function.

This app is great!!! üòÉ I have over 650 songs downloaded on my android phone and with a bit of file management and good design on the app makers part, everything has a cover and I can quickly locate all my songs! There's a tiny bug with how the cover search works now, but if you put the cover image in a folder of songs, all the songs will gain that image as the cover!

I really liked this player cause it works just like the one I used to use, but *better*, that is until the last update where the 'change the cover' feature says my browser needs updating. I've updated my browser as much as it'll go and it still doesn't fix it. also the ads being shown at the bottom of the screen continuously make me hit them on accident and enter another tab because it takes away my button bar in the app, I haven't seen or found an option to change that, but it would be nice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user, we're sorry for the inconvenience. We need revenue from ads. The other issue is caused by a change in Google's search server. Our technical team is actively working on resolving this issue. Please try changing your cover by selecting an image from your local gallery. Thank you for your understanding and patience!

scraped_reviews.content: They have both full screen ads that come out of nowhere, and far more egregiously, a permanent banner ad across the very bottom of the screen, AND they autohide the navigation buttons on the bottom of the screen, making you swipe up to go back or exit the app--but since almost every other app doesn't hide those buttons, you're way more likely to hit the ad by mistake, since it's exactly where the navigation buttons normally are. It's extremely user-unfriendly design.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ewan, sorry for the inconvenience. Our app is free and we need ad revenue. Hope you understand us. And the decision to hide the navigation buttons was made to optimize the layout and provide more space for the function keys. Sorry for the inconvenience and we will optimize it. Best regards.ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: just got it and it's great so far! i do wish it didn't have gen ai stuff for the suggestions, and i really hope for a feature soon where we can delete (or at least hide/customize) the categories and playlist sections. would also love a "pin playlist" feature. Sound is clear and interface is great! i also like that i can add my own album covers and rearrange the song order. ads are there but not terrible, and $7 to take them out completely isn't bad at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Veronica, thank you very much for sharing your experience and suggestions for improvement. Would you like to be able to customize tabs like "Playlists" and "Folders" and remove default playlists like "My Favorite Songs"? Please tell us more and we will continue to improve based on your feedback. Thanks in advance!

scraped_reviews.content: Randomly stops playing and way to many ads. Updated response: You know exactly what ads I'm talking about, don't act like they're just pop up ads, some of them are scam websites that redirect you out of the app and into a browser to collect your data. Also after the most recent update, unable to change the cover. I would give zero ‚≠ê's if I could. This app used to be great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Duran, we are sorry for ads, but to run this free app we need revenue from them. Hope you can understand us. And could you please send us the description of the music stopping problem and the auto-attached log through "Settings-Feedback" next time the problem occurs? Thanks in advance.üôèüåπ

scraped_reviews.content: so far, so good. Switched over after my dependable music app was no longer dependable. one thing I noticed straight away is it doesn't have a toggle to quickly scroll down a massive playlist, you just have to keep flicking until you reach what you want. would be handy I'm a future update. also would love to be able to put a bookmark in a playlist. I use it for work and don't want to reshuffle and repeat songs. like to continue on the playlist.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user, we've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: I never give reviews on apps much, but I got tired of paying for a music app that makes you download music but you don't own it yourself like Spotify or Pandora. So, I decided to download MP3 music on the SD card. I needed a Media player, so I gave this one a try and I love it. love the equalizer and the fact it gives you your lyrics to your songs. I love the new backup feature. If you need a good a great media player with awesome features and simple settings I recommend this app.

I used to use Muzio but ditched it when it became unusable after a recent update. So, I downloaded this player which feels much like the Muzio of old. I love this player for it's ability to handle extra long song lists and custom album art. My only complaints are: When you press the back button with the intention of going back to the beginning of a song the app instead takes you to the previous song; And at times, it seems to repeat a song regardless if you have Repeat Off selected or not.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan, thank you for your feedback. The ‚óÄÔ∏è‚ñ∂Ô∏è buttons are used to switch songs. You can drag the progress bar to replay the current song. Regarding the playback mode issue, could you please send us a description of the issue and the automatically attached logs via "Feedback"?

scraped_reviews.content: I installed and bought this thinking it would be a good replacement for my old player and I was happy until I decided to make a playlist. Why would you prevent a song being added twice to a playlist. This makes me so mad that I would give a 0 star review if I could. I think what bothers me the most is that it actually tells you the song is added when it is not. Whoever decided to add this weird feature without giving the option to turn it on or off, thanks for nothing!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Augie, thanks for your suggestion. This feature is currently not supported. We will consider it seriously and continue to optimize to provide you with better service. Best wishes!

scraped_reviews.content: It is better than 85 to 90% of the music apps since my new phone didn't have a default music player and I had to download one. After trying a half of dozen this is the closest one to providing me what I want. It still needs to let you combine folders and do better editing and filing but still way better than the others and would currently suffice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bryant, thanks for your review. We will work harder to bring you a better experience.üòÅ If possible, could you give us 5 stars? We would appreciate it. Thanks in advance and have a good day!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Almost all ads are unobtrusive, with only a small banner and minor pop-up now and then that blocks the screen when you start the app. Music playing is uninterrupted and highly customizable for different types of sound, which was SO COOL to discover, and the premium price for a lifetime purchase is less than ten bucks. 100% worth it, one of the best music apps I know. If you're looking for music files, check Bandcamp or other sites like it. This app rocks, I've been looking for one like it.

I appreciate the need for ads in a free program. However, the consistent use of ads that lock up the app, making it easier to reboot the app, may not be effective. Unlike other ads, there is no "x" or "close" button for a long period of time. A period so long that it is much quicker to immediately cancel the ad and reboot the app without viewing any of the advertisements.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brian, really sorry for the ad problem. After a few seconds you could click the "x" or "close" button in the corner of the ad page to close them. This app is free so we really need revenue from ads. Sorry to disturb your usage. We will continue to improve the delivery of ads. Yours sincerely.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I tend to get an ad now and then and it's always skippable or short. Another thing I love is how everything is super organized! There's only one problem I really have, you can't change the order of songs in an album. I have to download all of the songs in a specific order. This is a problem because sometimes, one file will download faster than another, but it's fine, because of the Playlist tab!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user, thank you so much for your feedback. We will take it into full consideration and continue improving our app. It is because of you that we can become better. Best regards!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: App kind of feels like it's more optimized for users with phones without a "swipe up" feature to exit/close the music player. Any time I try to exit, it's either, opening the play back up or tapping on the ad at the bottom and it taking me to some website. Its annoying in that part, but the apps good for having offline music to listen to if you have some songs downloaded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ross, thank you for your feedback. Hiding the navigation bar is to give the app more space for action buttons. We don't intend for ads to affect your experience. We apologize for the inconvenience and will continue to improve. Thank you for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: Not the flashiest but, it works for my needs. It allows me to shuffle songs that I have downloaded onto my phone & play them without any ads interrupting the music. There are ads that will pop up as you navigate the UI as well as an ad banner at the bottom of the screen but, that doesn't bother me as I am more than happy that it will stream my download music with no ad interruptions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Paul, we are sorry for Ads. Music Player is free, so we need to display ads to survive. We will improve in the future and we will try to keep the Ads from interfering. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is pretty good, I've gotten a lot of use out of it and for the most part I'm able to manage my songs with ease but there are a few things that could be done to improve it. Firstly, sometimes I find it easier to sort through my songs with a quick glance at the cover images, but in this app most of my songs don't have one so I have to manually apply it and don't have access to most of my photo ablums where they are stored. Secondly, can a song's runtime be shown next to the artist name?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sebastian, thank you so much for your feedback and suggestions. We will take it into full consideration and continue improving our app. It is because of you that we can become better. Best regards!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded this to replace Muzio now that that app is completely useless. Sucks that this doesn't work with Android Auto, but it's good for throwing on a playlist or artist shuffle. Organization is a little weird, but I like that it puts your artists with the most songs at the top. Easy tag editor. Room for improvement, but it's the best player I can find at the moment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sara, thank you so much for your feedback. We will take it into full consideration and continue improving our app. It is because of you that we can become better. Best regards!üåπ

scraped_reviews.userName: For the love of Josh Tigger Bear
scraped_reviews.content: After coming here from Muzio player, I am very suprised with how good this app is so far. The fact that I can change the cover for an album and it automatically applies it to songs is perfect. I do wish that there was an option to remove the rounded edges for the albums and songs, I'm not a big fan of the look. I also would like the option to put photos for artists. I like that the ads are less invasive and that it has a lot of built in themes, keep up the good work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user, thank you so much for your feedback and suggestions. We will take it into full consideration and continue improving our app. It is because of you that we can become better. Best regards!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Been using for 5 years now, plays in the background perfectly. Recently saw a new feature that let's you back up Playlists if you ever lose your data. Loving it. I would suggest this for anyone who wants to save money by deleting Spotify. You just have to download songs onto your phone, the app doesn't let you browse songs by itself, you have to download them onto your phone. Great app, never spent a penny on Spotify because these guys are great.

I got this player as a replacement for Muzio when that app got too annoying. I had switched to Muzio when the default music app from Google lost its Recently Added playlist. I add about three hours of music a week, and this player does what I want it to (use the Recently Added to listen to that three hours, then play everything on Random) simply and easily. I did have an issue with very short songs not showing up, but there was a way to change that in the settings, it was just hard to find.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Erik, we have ignored small clips by default. Please click "Settings - Scan Music", unselect "ignore duration less than 60sec or 30sec" and "ignore size less than 50K or 1000K". After scanning, please check if the small clips appear. Best wishes!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: The only thing that could make it better would be if they had the ability to change the time indicator on the playhead. It would be nice to be able to swap / cycle through different options - like showing the remaining time, rather than the current time progress, and the total length of the media. This doesn't matter for songs, but for podcasts, or other long form content, it would be nice

I mostly love this app but I'm confused as to why my songs restart from the beginning when I attempt to unpause them after any amount of time. I'd like to resume from where I'd paused, as is the function of most pause buttons. Besides that it is also sometimes difficult to navigate or leave the app without changing the song I'm currently listening to, which is also frustrating. Other than those irregularities, the app is quite good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rayet, so sorry for the issue. Could you please send the description of your problem and the auto-attached log through "Settings - Feedback" at xmusicplayer.feedback@gmail.com next time it occurs? It will help us locate and fix it faster. Thanks in advance.üôè

scraped_reviews.content: Liking the app so far, and that ads haven't been very intrusive. So long as they stay that way, the app will go strong. I do also have a suggestion, about adding covers to songs. Would it be possible to allow browsing from files instead of just recent photos? I have some albums I want to ascribe certain images to, and it makes it pretty inconvenient. Not worth lowering the rating, but a worth note suggestion in my opinion.

The app is great üëç, just that I have a few problems which make it a 4 and not a 5. 1. My shuffle button to shuffle songs after the last song is played doesn't shuffle anymore (well it does but not the same way it doesn't reshuffle after the last song ends and bit been like that since it broke and even with the new updates it's still it not fixed 2. it adds more storage when I edit song descriptions with the app (not sure if its just my phone). Overall, Great app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user! Thanks for your feedback and for enjoying our appüòä. We‚Äôre sorry for the issues you‚Äôve encountered with the shuffle and storage. Please send the description of your problems and the auto-attached log through "Settings - Feedback" next time they occur. Thanks in advance.üôè

scraped_reviews.content: Easy listening! I found an old ipod shuffle that had some rare myspace tunes that had independent artists, bands, etc. on it and wanted to transfer the songs. Itunes sucks and just wouldn't let me transfer anything. So I did all the conversions to mp3s and just emailed the songs. The app easily picked up the downloads and wah-lah, the tunes are playing!

As simple && easy to use this app is, it is extremely irritating that the AD bar is located fully across the bottom of the screen. This wouldn't be an issue if the app didn't force full-screen && allowed my home screen buttons to function without having to attempt to swipe up (in order to display them for half a second) && instead clicking that stupid AD bar EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. They could simply place the AD bar across the top, underneath the notifications bar, but of course they choose not to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mary, so sorry for the ads. Music player is free, so we need to display ads to survive. We will keep improving our app and bring a better experience for you. Thanks for your understanding.üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Works well, but the ads have increased and had to pause for like 20 or 30 secs before you can access. I can live with the ads, as long as I can clear it out after 5 seconds, the x is hidden in the upper right corner, press the arrow, then the x appears and able to clear. I used this after Google music app dropped and overall, have been happy with this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Terence, really sorry for the ad problem. After a few seconds you could click the "x" or "close" button in the corner of the ad page to close them. This app is free so we really need revenue from ads. Sorry to disturb your usage. We will continue to improve the delivery of ads. Yours sincerely.

scraped_reviews.content: I have the paid version, and yet the playback is very inconsistent. this only started happening in the past year or so. when playing a song and either choosing to skip, change the volume, etc. there is a huge delay. something like thirty seconds or so, the song will keep on playing despite pushing various buttons to stop, skip, or change the volume. very irritating, but having the lyrics displayed is convenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Victoria, we'd love to resolve the problem. Could you please send us the description of your problem and the auto-attached log through "Settings - Feedback" next time the problem occurs? It will help us locate and fix it faster. Thanks in advance.üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: The music app that I WAS using required access to my phone calls which is a Red flag to me so I deleted it. What I relied on that app for was the tag editor since most of the songs I listen to need to be edited. This app is a great substitute for that previous music player. However, unless I'm not seeing it, I wish this app's tag editor could edit the track number and disc number. Once/if that gets implemented, it's worthy of 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joe, thanks for your feedback. This feature is currently not supported. We will consider it seriously and keep working hard to provide a better experience for you. Please stay tuned!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: this is a great music player. I gave it only 4 stars, because it misses a very useful (for me) functionality. the possibility to define before running the media scan, the root directory from where to scan, for instance the music folder. I do not want all my podcast and audio books to be included in the scan.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi dear user, thanks for your feedback. You could click "Settings - Scan Music - Select Folder" to find the folder of the audios you don't want to scan, and re-scan after unselecting the folder of the audios. Then they will not appear in the app. Please give us a five-star rating if it helps.üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Really loved it at first. I could add an image to the cover album or song. it was great, until one day I opened it up went to play a song and it wouldnt work. I messed around with it till I managed to play the next song in the list, but once that ended it just wouldn't work again. very disappointed. I really liked this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Talia, we apologize for the inconvenience. Please restart your phone and try again. If the problem still persists, please click "Settings" - "Feedback" in the app to send us the problem description and the auto-attached log. Thank you for your help.

scraped_reviews.content: This is my first night but I'm truly enjoying it so far. I downloaded it in hopes of having access to music when off grid. Fingers crossed this is the solution. I struggled to figure out how to pull ripped CDs to my phone. Once I downloaded this app it was all "Sunshine and Roses". Again, fingers crossed this is the solution for music off grid! üôè

Came from Muzio Player after it went down the drain. This is a great alternative! It feels like an earlier Muzio Player with better features and much less ads/intrusive elements. Highly recommend! The only thing I'd like to see implemented currently is the ability to sort playlists by name, number of songs, etc.

It's kind of manipulative how this app automatically drops your navigation bar when open and places an ad there. Ads are fine, tricking users in to opening them by playing off of our muscle memory is not. Maybe this was an oversight or I'm wrong about the developer's intentions. Either way I'm sick of opening ads when I'm just trying to get to my home screen. Other than that, it works well. I can't stress enough how annoying this is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Grier, Sorry for the inconvenience. Our app is free and we need ad revenue. Hope you understand us. And the decision to hide the navigation buttons was made to optimize the layout and provide more space for the function keys. You can swipe up from the bottom of the screen to bring up the navigation bar. Best regards.ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: Having a lot of playback issues on this app. It keeps playing the previous song even if you've skipped it, or it'll continue to play on top of the other. It doesn't respond properly to the play/pause. It's just extremely laggy when it comes to actually playing the music. It's not even syncing up with my headphone commands. Sometimes it doesn't even respond to them. That's my only issue, however it's a big issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Meghan, so sorry for the issues. Could you please send the description of your problems and the auto-attached log through "Settings - Feedback" at xmusicplayer.feedback@gmail.com next time they occur? It will help us locate and fix them faster. Thanks in advance.üôè

scraped_reviews.content: This app is amazing! I love that you don't get many ads, and you're allowed to play what you actually want. However, I do wish there were a few more features. Such as: -Different types of themes -Being able to full screen the song cover -Being able to comfortably slow down a song/pitch it up without too much glitching(this might also be a problem with a song flie don't worry!) - The lyrics to songs being highlighted in real time/and scrolling Other than that, it's perfect!

The app is good but I'm going to deduct a few stars. for starters, I keep having issues importing my music playlist. it either doesn't do the entire playlist or does a bad job reorganizing it. I've tried to backup and restore but it didn't work. I manually had to reorganize my playlist. NEXT... I've requested to have the rewind button to be optional and I've heard nor seen anything. I want to love this app but I need to see improvements. The good news is it's a 1 time payment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Viggie, thank you for your feedback. You can the find fast forward and rewind buttons on the left and right sides of the song progress bar on the playback page. Regarding the playlist issue, could you please send us a description and a screen recording of your operation to our email address xmusicplayer.feedback@gmail.com? Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: great for those who like to download their own music instead of Spotify/apple music. It can show ads sometimes, but it won't play anything during your music. also a sleep timer, which works pretty well for me. if you want to listen to something you don't have, you can even search it up on YouTube through the app to listen to it (as long as you have data ofc) 5/5 would recommend. :-)

I've been loving this music player, and I recently upgraded to the premium plan. However, I encountered an issue where my initial purchase wasn't recognized after the upgrade, and I was asked to pay $8 again. While the amount isn't the main concern, transparency is crucial. I'd appreciate it if the developer could ensure that subscriber accounts are accurately tracked and reflected after upgrades. Despite this hiccup, this music player remains one of the best I've ever used.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cheleh, sorry for the problem. Please confirm that the account you logged in to the Google Play store for purchase is correct and log out other irrelevant accounts. Then please clear google service cache and open our player and try again. Hope this helps.

scraped_reviews.content: this was the only mp3 app i used for years. i downloaded this a long time ago and it was great. but they sold out and now the ads are placed in the most intrusive places. Its now just like every other geedy trick-for-click apps out there. Find a better app, this one has been sold and isn't supported anymore. AI could write a better app with like 3 line of prompt. Shame on the development team.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Danielle, sorry for the unpleasant experience. Our app is free, so we need to display some ads for revenue. We will try to minimize the interruptions of ads, and you can also upgrade to the premium version to remove them. Thanks for your understanding!üòä

scraped_reviews.content: for the most part this app is great. few ads, and nice options. what I can't tolerate is that everything stops it from playing, except when I receive texts. play a game, app stops. see an ad, app stops. get a call, app stops. get a text, nothing. I've missed way too many messages because of it. I will have to uninstall and find something else. pitty.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shamus, sorry for the ads, but to run this free app we need revenue from Ads. Hope you could understand us. And some other apps will send audio usage requests to the system and cause the song to stop playing. We are really sorry for the inconvenience and we will try our best to improve.

scraped_reviews.content: This app ignores disc numbers, so if you try to listen to a multi disc album. For example, "Jeff Wayne's Musical Version of The War Of The Worlds Collectors Edition" (5 Discs), the tracks are played in the wrong order. I had even ensured the track names were all preceded with numbers to prevent this, but this App just ignores them. Time to find a new player that can actually do the job.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi David, sorry for the problem. Could you please send the description of your problem and the song files to us at xmusicplayer.feedback@gmail.com? It will help us reproduce your problem and fix it. Thanks for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely love this app. I use it to listen to audiobooks, and even when I close it, it remembers where I was in it, so I don't need to memorise at which hour I stopped listening. Ads are unobtrusive, and only upon opening the app. An image ad and a banner at the bottom. Absolutely satisfied. Great job. You can also skip 10 seconds ahead and forward. Everything you could need, truly

Still awesome, with great service! But,i have two, "problems". Before,when i wanted to choose a cover for a song, it would directly take me to my gallery and i could choose a picture from there which was easier. Why does it go to SD card now. Second,i would really appreciate if you could add a feature to copy our playlist to the app somehow or at least save the titles because if i change it from the SD card the file becomes unusable. It's a drag to change titles and covers for all of 1000+songs
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nevena, thank you so much for your feedback and suggestions. We will take it into full consideration and continue improving our app. It is because of you that we can become better. Best regards!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app to download my music and i can assure you, this is the best one for sure! The ads are not a problem, and plus, you can change the cover and name for your musics too, create lots of playlists, and even custom the background of the app and change the musics a bit with the equalizer. Anyways, i recommend it with my heart!

No bells or whistles with this app, just a great, solid, reliable performance, which was exactly what I was looking for! Easy to use, simple to include or exclude folders, no gripes at all! love having an affordable one-time charge to not have to deal with ads rather than ANOTHER subscription! You guys rock!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lisa, thank you for your support. Hope you continue to enjoy our app. If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to tell us. We would love to hear from you!

title: YouTube TV: Live TV & more
description:
YouTube TV is now the exclusive home of NFL Sunday Ticket. Watch every out-of-market Sunday game* on your TV and supported devices. Learn more: https://yt.be/nflsundayticket

Watch cable-free live TV. Download to watch & record live TV from 100+ networks, including local sports & news, as part of your monthly membership. Cancel anytime.

+Cable-free live TV. No cable box required.
+Stream major broadcast and cable networks, including CBS, FOX, NBC, NFL Network, HGTV, TNT, AMC, and more, including your local sports & news channels.
+Watch on your smartphone, tablet, computer, and TV
+Cloud DVR without DVR storage space limits. Each recording will be stored for 9 months.
+6 YouTube TV accounts per household. Everyone gets their own login, recommendations and DVR.
+Monthly pay-as-you-go membership; cancel anytime.

Over 100 networks are available in YouTube TV:

BROADCAST
CBS, FOX, NBC, NFL Network, PBS, and more

SPORTS
CBS Sports Network, NBC Sports RSN (regional), NFL Network, Golf Channel, SEC Network, and more

ENTERTAINMENT & LIFESTYLE
AMC, Animal Planet, BBC America, BET, Bravo, Cheddar, CMT, Comedy Central, Comet, Cozi TV, Decades, Discovery, E!, Food Network, IFC, Investigation Discovery, HGTV, MotorTrend, MTV, Oxygen, Paramount Network, Pop, Smithsonian Channel, SundanceTV, SyFy, TBS, TCM, TLC, TNT, Travel Channel, TruTV, TV Land, USA, VH1, WE tv, YouTube Originals, and more

NEWS
BBC World News, Cheddar Big News, CNBC, CNN, HLN, MSNBC, and more

KIDS
Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, PBS Kids, Universal Kids


Availability:
YouTube TV is available nationwide in the United States.

For more information, please visit our Help Center.

Your membership will automatically continue for as long as you choose to remain a member. Your membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign up. You can easily cancel anytime, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings on the device.

Terms of service: tv.youtube.com/tv/terms
Paid terms of service: tv.youtube.com/tv/paidterms
Privacy policy: tv.youtube.com/tv/privacy

Enjoy cable-free live tv now!

*Commercial use excluded. Locally broadcast Fox and CBS games, Sunday Night Football on NBC, select digital-only games and international games excluded from NFL Sunday Ticket.

Watch cable-free live TV. Download to watch & record live TV from 100+ networks, including local sports & news, as part of your monthly membership. Cancel anytime.

+Cable-free live TV. No cable box required.
+Stream major broadcast and cable networks, including CBS, FOX, NBC, NFL Network, HGTV, TNT, AMC, and more, including your local sports & news channels.
+Watch on your smartphone, tablet, computer, and TV
