summary: Solve epic match-3 and merge puzzles to create perfect homes for adorable fish!

scraped_reviews.content: This was advertised as a game that cares for an aquarium, but its really a matching puzzle game. it also puts you into "expeditions". while exploring was kinda fun at first, the puzzles became more and more difficult as I got closer to 200. maybe im dumb, but I think I should be able to get good matches within a couple tries. personally, I dont want to spend 2 hours and 30 tries on the same level because my rng has been shite
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôve enjoyed exploring Fishdom. We hear you on the challenge of higher levels and getting good matches. Your thoughts are valuable and will be shared with the team to help improve future updates. üê†

scraped_reviews.content: Good idea, generic but the theme is slightly different. However, this game will make you want to go beat up the company's owner or throw your phone into the wall. And I am saying that because in some levels number of moves given is DELIBERATELY much lower than what you would need to finish the level. It applies to almost all the levels marked as "hard", "super hard", and sometimes to "challenge" levels (but not as often). They are designed to make you do micro-purchases for diamonds.

Been playing for ages, but recent updates are terrible. I can rarely get through the easy levels in one try all the sudden. often taking multiple days of tries. And I play too often, not just a couple times per day. üôÇ Boosters, whether free or paid have been downgraded. I have always bought the season pass for the benefits and to support the dev. But they are basically useless now. It just isn't fun any more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello üêü

Thank you for your feedback. Some levels can be harder than others but we assure you it‚Äôs possible to pass each of them. Just don‚Äôt give up!

We hope, you will stay with us üíô

scraped_reviews.content: The game is pretty fun. I like the fish and accessories you can get for the aquariums and the side events and mini games are fun. However, it's mostly a match 3 puzzle game, which I didn't realize because the preview for the game isn't that. It is almost like false advertising. The game they show is actually one of the mini games that hardly comes up. I thought I was downloading one game but got another. It's still fun though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there , we're sorry to hear that your Fishdom experience didn't meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback on our ads, please refer to the AppStore for a more descriptive explanation of Fishdom. We hope you'll give Fishdom another chance and continue to enjoy the game. We wish you a wonderful day! üèÑ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

scraped_reviews.content: First, I really like the many aquariums, adventures and match 3 puzzles. I have spent some money to get energy for the adventures when I get stuck on a hard puzzle. Second, I am disappointed that the fish eating everything and growing game is not anywhere In Fishdome. They should change the app picture and ads. I kept this game on my phone because I liked that plot, but I have yet to encounter it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there üëã

Thank you for sharing your thoughts on our game. We'll be sure to send your feedback on to our developers and marketing team. Thank you. üêü

scraped_reviews.content: Have played for years. Rewards decreased, and you can expect to be stuck on games/levels for days unless you are willing to spend money. The developers always say every level can be won - no, every level can be won if you spend money. Also, stop advertising the mini games - i have not seen one for over a year. As others have said, i used to pay $2.99 to activate the season passes, but $9.99 is ridiculous. Fishdom used to be a 5 star game, but with all the changes, even 2 stars is too many. üòí

This would be a 5, but there are kinks...while the new additions that can be earned are AWESOME, you dont have enough lives to complete a level. , unless u buy..the first or 2nd miss, not too bad, but everything gets taken away and stuck on one level for 3 days!! frustrating! so maybe this will be a once in a while type of game. I noticed if you dont come back for a few days, you are able to reset weapon #s + are able then to defeat the lvl and move on! you are even given xtra lives!! coming 5!

The fun doesn't last long. Started back playing after I stopped for a couple years. I see why I stopped. Once you play well for too long weird stuff starts to happen. They pass off harder levels as normal. Pieces you need to clear don't start showing until you've almost lost or not all. They try to force you to waste diamonds or spend money. I thought support had gotten better but suddenly they want screen recordings when they know the game glitched.

the mini games in the adds r deceiving they are nothing like what you show. the levels half you have to pay cash if u want to pass them or be stuck for days on end till you get enough diamonds to pass the level. I get it, it's supposed to be challenging but to the point you have to pay to pass when this is supposed to be a free to play game is ridiculous

The last few updates have taken all of the fun out of this game. You have no control over where you can go or what you can do. Mostly all the levels are hard meaning there is no easy even if it's labeled that way. The new cards that need to be won for prizes are too complicated and don't add anything enjoyable. Lately playing this game makes me feel like a trained monkey going through a maze doing what they want me to do.

This has been my go to simple game for years. I've happily spent some cash here and there to support the developers... that said, I'll no longer spend a penny in they're favor. Over the last 6 months or so, the game has at least two bugs that don't go away... The first bug is when I first log on to play, im immediately notified that im losing a life, and begin with only four... Also, the option to pick powerup doesn't appear.

This was never the game that they advertised, first it was supposed to be a move and eat kind of game, then it turned into a aquarium game, once you downloaded it, with a matching game element, then they added on expeditions, it got bloated and the rewards got really cheap, especially as of late. Now they require me age in when it's an e for everyone, just to play.

I'm not enjoying the updates. not all of your players are 10 years old. Those of us at the top levels (17,000's) don't need huge graphics. Also, after I pick extra lives, don't immediately ask me to get more. Lastly, $10 is too expensive for the extra perks. Lots of us purchase it less. Many of my team members who were avid players have pulled back or stopped entirely. I've been playing since COVID started. Finally had a fantastic team of people. Now, many of them got frustrated and don't play.

This game was actually fun to play. You took away extra "bombs" to help and the gems are harder to get. I can play the same level of a game for 30 or minutes without winning. It's so frustrating. I WILL NOT buy any gems because it still won't help to win a level. Horrible way to treat players!!! I would of given you zero stars if I could! Bring back the old way of playing!

this latest update is practically unplayable. every obstacle that's been added in the last few updates requires multiple hits and matches and to add insult to injury now in the latest they've even added ones that require up to 7 hits (ex. the target/shark box thing)+ even worse take them away (lightbulb boxes). they've been headed this way for awhile and it's just gotten absurd. all the power ups won't help you. been playing for years and this is easily the worst state the game has been in ever.

Really disappointed in this game recently! It took 9 valuable diamonds away without my permission. There is no actual support to get someone to respond. This is theft! And prices have gone way up! Also, the "rewards" are WAY less than they used to be. They keep taking away more and more, making play too expensive and frustrating to play. I thought games were supposed to be fun. Lost 2 stars on this rating!

Not all changes are good... I have been playing this game for a very long time and it has been one of my favorites. I like that the developers have been updating. However, one change has definitely decreased my satisfaction with this game - they have increased the team capacity from 30 to 50. As a team leader, this has completely decimated my ability to craft an active team. We are down to 26 members and with the flood of available teams, we are getting no new players. Bad move, Fishdom.

EDIT: This game cheats. It ignores moves intended to break up bricks or tiles, rewards and diamonds will disappear. It's addictive, but there's too many rewards to keep track of and there's a glitch that's caused me to lose my power ups twice now. Some of the levels are so unbelievably hard you can't beat them without power ups. EDIT 2: Now I'm seeing my lives go to 0 as soon as my unlimited lives runs out, as in I'll have unlimited lives, it runs out during a game, I lose and my lives are 0
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Jen üòä

We are sorry to hear that you came across the issue you called out above with the missing rewards. Could you please contact us from within the game so that we can gain access to your game logs and fix this problem?

Thanks üíö

scraped_reviews.content: This game cheats, and is designed to simply take your money. Boosters do not work as advertised, and levels are intentionally designed to be unbeatable, which forces you to either spend money or lose. Don't waste your time or your money. If you want to play a game where you can actually play without spending money, I recommend you try the Harry Potter game. I've been playing a few hours a day for months without spending anything at all.

I have enjoyed playing this game for a while now. I even started buying the season pass. But when the price went up, the levels got harder to beat with using all the boosters. For the past few weeks, I've been playing the same levels over again. I also can't feed my fish in 2 tanks. I've contacted support & their bot assured me I was not playing the same levels and have not received any feedback on feeding my fish. I am stuck on the same level with no coins or gems. Waste of time for no fun.

I really like the game but am disgusted by the game as well . The game is designed to make you spend money if you want to get anywhere . It's got nothing to do with luck or skill when it comes to passing a level ( just depends on when the game decides you have wasted enough time yet ) The worst part is when those cute little fish turn into playrix pimps trying to get you to notice the sales that are nothing but a rip-off .

This game is such a fun, fast, satisfying game. My daily stress and fatigue disappear, like when playing solitaire, only much more engaging. I just want to keep playing. It is just as satisfying as playing cards with a friend (almost). HOWEVER, it costs too much! I know this game is rigged to take more money. I wouldn't mind giving up some change every so often, but, I added up my monthly game cost: $23-5 dollars a month! Way too much spending for a game! The prices should be scaled back.

I'm a long-time player. Recent changes to the game have ruined it. I'm deleting it. Google 'why are Fishdom players leaving the game'. Total shameless money grabbing developers. It's actually feels like they're trying to drive players away and their obliging. Homescapes is a much better game. I used to buy the pass every month now, it's a waste of money. Luckily, if you can get halfway through it. I'm wondering if AI has anything to do with Fishdoms' downfall. It certainly is no fun anymore.

Started playing this game as a way to earn credits for another game. The game is a pay-to-play game. One of the worst I've seen. You will quickly stall out your progress if you are not constantly buying the items needed to move through the levels. The aquariums you build seem useless. The matching puzzles eventually seem rigged for you to lose at higher levels, and the story/quest part of the game, slows to a crawl unless you open your wallet and pay-to-play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mark, we appreciate your feedback on Fishdom. We hope you discover something that aligns more with your preferences. Thank you for sharing your thoughts! üê† Wishing you a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: Boosters are now 1 Bomb, 1 Lightning, and 1 Dynamite. It used to be 2 Bombs, 1 Lightning, and 1 Dynamite/Lightning combo. The levels have increased in difficulty to the point where skill no longer matters. If you're on a level that the only thing to clear it is bombs and the game doesn't give you the chance to get them, you're done. Not to mention that each level seems to have four to five different tasks that need to be done in 20 or less moves. This is another game destroyed by greed.

I've been playing Fishdom every day for over 2 years now and have enjoyed this challenging game. However, the newest changes (reducing power ups, getting rid of the 3 extra moves, making the games much harder, and charging) have ruined this game for me. I no longer enjoy it and am actively looking for another game to play. Fishdom is losing a great customer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Darlene! We're sorry to hear the recent changes have been disappointing for you. We're always working to improve the game and some updates are necessary to support exciting new features and events in the future. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts!

scraped_reviews.content: Game is rigged. no strategy required. As long as you keep feeding it diamonds (money), you will progress. Otherwise, prepare to wait days to finish a single level, until they decide you've waited long enough and give you the moves that allow you to beat the level. They control the moves (power ups) in a level, there is no being good at this game. It is all in control of the developers.

the prices for seasons started at $3.00, the $5.99, then $6.99, nows it's $9.99!! Absolutely greedy of an online game that i spend money on in app purchases and the prices just keep going up. If i uninstall this game I take nothing with me...no rewards or money back, nothing. So pretty much I've spent a lot of money on this game, and all you want is more

Getting worse and much more expensive. I've played this game off and on for a few years. The prices have shot up to unreasonable for extra lives, play time, etc. The levels have gotten harder to beat and when you finally get a "super lightning," it doesn't go as far as it used to. They also took away the match game and now it's all just the boring quests.

This game used to be a lot of fun but now you've taken away the # of boosters we could win and now they've made the game impossible to beat certain levels (the reason I don't pay for extra energy anymore) . On some levels it might take 40 plays before you beat it.. Don't waste your time or $$$ with this game, it has become nothing more than a scam. There are plenty of other games you can play.

Recent update (June 2025) lowers my rating. Players have to manually click on the lower right corner gem icon to receive gem bonuses throughout the game instead of automatically receiving them as before. This can and will at times really change the progress of the play of the game. If this doesn't change back, then may not continue playing. There are plenty of other games out there to choose from.

I have been playing this game for a while. Initially, it was fun and challenging. Now, half of the easy levels have you using your entire arensal of weapons in hopes of beating it. I just used everything in my arsenal to try and beat an "easy" level and still couldn't do it. I believe it has been made to where you have to purchase to advance in levels. I am done! I'm deleting this app today!

never gave such a low rating ... usually can find the fun, good, or meaning to an app.... this game is only fun if you buy your progress... it's made so difficult that's you'll be stuck on levels until it's decided you can move forward. when that time comes, the games makes it foolproof and you still have turns left... but if not, you can be on the same board for a week or more. it's despicable to say the least
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dijuan, thank you for your review. We appreciate you sharing your experience with Fishdom. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we‚Äôre grateful you took the time to express it. Wishing you a wonderful day! ‚òÄÔ∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I have been playing this game for a long time and it has been my favorite! HOWEVER, since the most recent update I have not liked the changes made. The helps after beating a level have been downgraded, and the number of things to beat per level has increased, some to a ridiculous amount. I don't understand why the creators found these changes necessary.

I have been playing this game for years. with each update, it gets harder and harder to get diamonds and boosters. I have spent money and you also get way less than you used to. Now the newest update took 2 bombs to 1. And you no longer get the dynamite and lightning as 1 booster. The easy levels are almost now impossible to pass. Used to be my favorite game, but I think I will finally be deleting it.

I used to love this game when winning was free. Now!? Nada, too expensive to continue playing an algorithm designed to make money. The changes you've made have not addressed the glitches that have cost me coins and "Free" play. I tried to give benefit of doubt but after being stuck for 3 days and having to, basically, buy my freedom to keep playing. Well, that situation has motivated me to send this review. You game used to be cool but now, pay to play sucks.

Used to be a fun game, but now an expensive game. Recent changes made boosters less effective, and more expensive. More expensive to buy gems and boosters, more expensive to buy a pass, etcWinning levels requires multiple boosters and still using gems to finish. 1bomb instead of 2, dynamite that no longer includes lightening, and boosters reduction at the start of each level that are also reduced. More expensive to play overall, and the greed is well overcoming the fun.

ok well I was really enjoying it Playing everyday. so then I get to level 135 and it is practically impossible I never had such a hard time trying to pass a level some levels took me days but never weeks. I feel as if they expect you to purchase coins diamonds etc to pass this level. Because it's literally impossible . I'm not going to continue playing this game anymore . It just seems to me this levels not gonna be passed until I make a purchase . So goodbye Fishsom.

False advertisement. Every ad I've ever seen for this game shows the play style being eating fish with numbers above their heads and that's only a.ino game that SOMETIMES pops up. This is a match three game. Seriously, what is wrong with you using fake ads?? People love match three games, just advertise that, you liars. I'm only playing this until I earn my credits for another app, and then I'm deleting it and never coming back.

This game has completely gone downhill!! I have been playing fishdom for years, but the recent updates have made it not fun anymore. For the first time in several years I will be looking for a new game to fill the boredom moments. Not sure who came up with all the new updates, but they have managed to lose one loyal gamer.

Getting worse and worse. Used to love the game but the latest updates keep making the game harder to play. They keep downgrading rewards including the available power-ups as well as sea shells?!! Why? Not a good way to treat your players. You've already removed the mini games which were fun and a great way to get easy rewards, and now the power-ups have been diminished plus even the regular levels are now ridiculously hard and the harder levels are even harder to clear.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for sharing your thoughts. We‚Äôre sorry the latest update did not meet your expectations. Your feedback is important and will be shared with our team as we work to improve the experience. Thanks for playing Fishdom! üê†

scraped_reviews.content: they added way too many side quests to the game. it feels more like a chore than play. there's card collecting, some fish task, a treasure hunt (which I enjoy), alongside others. logging in to play results in 15 mins of your free play being eaten up while you are clearing all the tasks. I get the extras are optional, but it's hard to ignore the 6 different notifications on the screen. I would enjoy if they rolled back one update.

Update: May 2025. It has gotten worse! I'm ready to quit. I really like this game, but it's frustrating to play the same level 50 times without clearing it. Be prepared to spend a lot to proceed through the levels. Too hard and expensive since upgrade. Have been playing 7 years of with Gold Ticket about once a month. Now it's 2 to 3 times a month. Disappointing.

I've been playing this game over a year and I enjoyed it. I thought the fish tanks were cute. I beat multiple levels each day. if I was stuck on a level it was only for a short while. they've recently revamped the game. limited the number of power-ups you can use in each game. Now I can't get any where, even with power-ups! if you aren't winning, you aren't earning points, coins or power-ups. I don't normally like leaving reviews but I'm really frustrated and will be uninstalling this game.

I've been playing for a couple of years now. Why did the newest update take away the dynamite/lightning combo? Also, when on a winning streak now, instead of getting a lightning power up, you get two mini dynamite instead? Also, you changed it from getting 2 bombs to only 1 bomb? I like the game as it's challenging, but these are terrible upgrade decisions. It made the game way more challenging, even on easy levels. Hopefully, they change this back to somewhat normal.

Playrix has recently issued one of the most cynically predatory updates I've ever seen in a game. They basically rewrote the entire gameplay to introduce a large number of new obstacles, which require multiple explosions (not matches, but explosions) right next to the obstacle or objective. On top of that, they put obstacles in front of obstacles in front of obstacles, requiring far more boosters, in exactly the right spot. It's all to force you to spend more money to have a chance to win.

I am a long time player. I understand price increase. but you also cut boosters. I get more of the hard levels than regular. a lot of the regular levels are multi. I miss the seasonal aquariums and the rooms. the Expeditions are just repeat. this latest update third time y'all have cut boosters. it is obvious that all y'all are interested in is making money. as for the mini games I have yet to come across one. I'm a level nine.

I've played this game for over 4 years. Over that time, any kind of mini-game or side game has disappeared except for the "Expedition" and that's all we've had since August of 2024. So boring now. I'm far enough advanced that I only get a New Aquarium to use every 3 months or so. The price of all the "In-App Purchases" has gone up and up. I'm using up my earned rewards and then leaving a game I've loved because of greed on the part of Playrix. So very disappointed in what this game has become.

Update. Reducing to 1 star. The game is now almost entirely luck versus skill. Even the adventures require no thought -- the game will lead you on the right path. Most games are so easy you almost cannot lose. Then some games are so convoluted that you have to keep trying until the game lets you win -- which might be a week! For example, the games with fences are almost entirely games of luck. The field is too small to "control your fate".

title: Likee - Short Video Community
description: Likee is a free original short video maker and sharing platform worldwide. Likee brings short videos, video effects, and creative tools into one easy-to-use application. With powerful personalized feeds and editing tools, you can easily discover viral trends, capture flawless videos, and express your creativity. It‚Äôs time to showcase your talents and explore content you love on Likee! We have over 100 million users worldwide. More and more people choose Likee for fun, self-expression, and joining a vibrant video community. Download Likee to discover a bigger world of creativity! Why Likee? Viral Videos & Creative Content Worldwide Choose from endless categories: music, dance, makeup, art, DIY, news, movies, and more! Powered by smart recommendations based on what you watch and like, Likee tailors content just for you. Think of it as your daily dose of short video inspiration! Trending Sounds: Dive into our massive music library with trending tracks like tik tik, tik tak, or local hits from tik tok, rednote, clapper, musically, dubsmash, and fanbase gallery! Learn & Grow: Get life hacks, laugh with creators, and stay ahead of trends. Join challenges like #Cattax ‚Äì snap a selfie, show off your cat, and share your style! A Global Short Video Community Millions of talented bloggers, vloggers and video creators like you have already joined Likee! Follow your favorites, collaborate, and connect through creativity. Easily migrate content from other platforms (TikTok, Instagram, etc.) with just a few clicks. Popular Special Effects Short Video Maker and Editor Various video effects, face filters and editing tools on Likee to help you make cool videos with little effort. SuperMix: Transform photos into pro videos with effects like Face Morph, Astral Travel, and MV styles. Stickers & Music: Customize videos with funny stickers, colorful filters, and trendy beats. Beauty Tools: Try makeup styles in seconds or change backgrounds with Sketch, Glitch, and Vintage filters. Join the Movement Every day, millions of creators ‚Äì including youtube stars, tiktok icons, instagram influencers, rednote artists, fanbase talents, musically pros, facebook celebs ‚Äì publish videos, collaborate, and engage with trends. Discover content spanning music, art, and even popular games as pubg, ff, ml and so on. Now Join Likee community and explore more than you like. Connect With Us Instagram: @likee_official_global Facebook: @likeeappofficial

Likee is a free original short video maker and sharing platform worldwide. Likee brings short videos, video effects, and creative tools into one easy-to-use application. With powerful personalized feeds and editing tools, you can easily discover viral trends, capture flawless videos, and express your creativity. It‚Äôs time to showcase your talents and explore content you love on Likee!

We have over 100 million users worldwide. More and more people choose Likee for fun, self-expression, and joining a vibrant video community. Download Likee to discover a bigger world of creativity!

Why Likee?
Viral Videos & Creative Content Worldwide
Choose from endless categories: music, dance, makeup, art, DIY, news, movies, and more! Powered by smart recommendations based on what you watch and like, Likee tailors content just for you. Think of it as your daily dose of short video inspiration!

Trending Sounds: Dive into our massive music library with trending tracks like tik tik, tik tak, or local hits from tik tok, rednote, clapper, musically, dubsmash, and fanbase gallery!

Learn & Grow: Get life hacks, laugh with creators, and stay ahead of trends. Join challenges like #Cattax ‚Äì snap a selfie, show off your cat, and share your style!

A Global Short Video Community
Millions of talented bloggers, vloggers and video creators like you have already joined Likee! Follow your favorites, collaborate, and connect through creativity. Easily migrate content from other platforms (TikTok, Instagram, etc.) with just a few clicks.

Popular Special Effects Short Video Maker and Editor
Various video effects, face filters and editing tools on Likee to help you make cool videos with little effort.

SuperMix: Transform photos into pro videos with effects like Face Morph, Astral Travel, and MV styles.
Stickers & Music: Customize videos with funny stickers, colorful filters, and trendy beats.
Beauty Tools: Try makeup styles in seconds or change backgrounds with Sketch, Glitch, and Vintage filters.

Join the Movement
Every day, millions of creators ‚Äì including youtube stars, tiktok icons, instagram influencers, rednote artists, fanbase talents, musically pros, facebook celebs ‚Äì publish videos, collaborate, and engage with trends. Discover content spanning music, art, and even popular games as pubg, ff, ml and so on. Now Join Likee community and explore more than you like.

Connect With Us
Instagram: @likee_official_global
Facebook: @likeeappofficial
summary: Global short video platform: epic effects, trending videos & vibrant community!
